+5.1 每秒法术伤害

en: We Will Not Fall!
cn: 坚不可摧

en: Increases the attack damage and spell damage of all towers in range.
cn: 提升范围内所有防御塔的攻击伤害与法术伤害。

en:
Increases the attack damage and spell damage of all towers in 400 range by 0.5% for each percent of lost lives. If the team has more than 100% lives, towers will deal less damage!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02% more spell and attack damage
cn:
传送门每损失1%生命值使400范围内所有防御塔的攻击与法术伤害提升0.5%。若传送门生命值超过100%，防御塔造成的伤害将降低。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02% 攻击伤害与法术伤害

en: Dark Shroud
cn: 暗影帷幕

en: Towers in range have 10% of their attack damage output stolen by Shadow. Shadow deals stolen damage as [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage.
cn: 范围内防御塔10%的攻击伤害将被阴影窃取，并以[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]伤害类型返还。

en:
Towers within 300 range have 10% of their attack damage output stolen by Shadow. This tower then deals that damage back at its original targets in the form of [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage. This damage cannot crit.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% damage dealt
cn:
300范围内防御塔的10%的攻击伤害被阴影窃取，该防御塔会以[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]伤害类型对原攻击目标返还此伤害。此伤害无法暴击。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 造成伤害

en: Arcane Aura
cn: 奥术光环

en: Towers in range have a chance to replenish their mana.
cn: 范围内防御塔有几率恢复法力值。

en:
Towers in 350 range have a 10% chance to replenish 10% of their total manapool when casting an ability that costs mana. Cannot retrigger on the same tower within 5 seconds. This effect will also proc off Harby's [color=GOLD]Arcane Orb[/color] attacks, without the retrigger restriction.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+0.2% maximum mana replenished
cn:
350范围内的防御塔在施放消耗法力值的技能时有10%几率恢复10%最大法力值。同一防御塔5秒内无法重复触发。该效果对黑曜毁灭者的[color=GOLD]奥术法球[/color]攻击同样生效且无触发间隔限制。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+0.2% 最大法力值恢复量

en: Lightning Charge
cn: 闪电充能

en: Towers in range have their spell damage increased.
cn: 提升范围内防御塔的法术伤害。

en:
Towers in 250 range have their spell damage increased by 20%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% spell damage
cn:
使250范围内防御塔的法术伤害提高20%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 法术伤害

en: Lightning Charge
cn: 闪电充能

en: Towers in range have their spell damage increased.
cn: 提升范围内防御塔的法术伤害。

en:
Towers in 250 range have their spell damage increased by 35%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% spell damage
cn:
使250范围内防御塔的法术伤害提高35%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 法术伤害

en: Demonic Edict
cn: 恶魔敕令

en: Whenever a tower in range casts a spell on a creep, this tower fires an extra projectile and increases mana regeneration of casting tower. Doesn't include AoE spells
cn: 范围内防御塔对敌军施放单体技能时，该防御塔发射额外弹幕并提升施法者法力回复。

en:
Whenever a tower in 400 range casts a spell on a creep, this tower fires a projectile from the casting unit to its current target, dealing [color=GOLD][2 x caster goldcost x spell cd][/color] spell damage. The casting tower also has its mana regeneration increased by 100% for 3 seconds. Doesn't include AoE spells.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% mana regeneration
cn:
400范围内防御塔对敌军施放单体技能时，该防御塔从施法单位向其当前目标发射弹幕，造成[color=GOLD][2 x 施法者价格 x 技能冷却][/color]点法术伤害。施法者同时获得100%法力回复提升，持续3秒。范围法术不触发此效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 法力回复

en: Moonlight
cn: 月光宁静

en: Reduces the spell resistance of nearby enemies and increases their vulnerability to damage from [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color], [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color], [color=6495edff]Ice[/color] and [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color] towers.
cn: 降低范围内敌方单位法术抗性，并提升[color=66cdaaff]星辰系[/color]、[color=ff4500ff]黑暗系[/color]、[color=d2b48cff]寒冰系[/color]及[color=32cd32ff]风暴系[/color]防御塔对其的伤害。

en:
Reduces the spell resistance of enemies in 800 range by 15% and increases the vulnerability to damage from [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color], [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color], [color=6495edff]Ice[/color] and [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color] towers by 10%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.45% spell resistance reduction
+0.3% vulnerability
cn:
使800范围内敌方单位法术抗性降低15%，且受[color=66cdaaff]星辰系[/color]、[color=ff4500ff]黑暗系[/color]、[color=d2b48cff]寒冰系[/color]及[color=32cd32ff]风暴系[/color]防御塔的易伤效果提高10%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.45 法术抗性降低
+0.3% 易伤效果

en: Strong Wind
cn: 强风

en: All creeps in range are affected by [color=GOLD]Strong Winds[/color]. Creeps are slowed and will receive periodic damage.
cn: 范围内所有敌人都会受到[color=GOLD]强风[/color]影响。敌人被减速并受到周期性伤害。

en:
All creeps in 900 range are affected by [color=GOLD]Strong Winds[/color]. Every second a creep is under this effect, it loses 3% of its movement speed and it is dealt 10% of towers attack damage for every 1% of movement speed it is missing. Slow effect stacks up to 15 times. Slow effect and damage is doubled for air units.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08% slow
+5 damage per 1% slow
cn:
900范围内的所有敌人会受到[color=GOLD]强风[/color]影响。每受此效果影响1秒，敌人移动速度降低3%，每降低1%移速，增加所有防御塔对此敌人10%的攻击伤害。减速效果最多叠加15层。对空中单位减速效果和伤害翻倍。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.08% 减速
每 1% 减速 +5 伤害

cn: 攻其不备

cn: 根据被攻击敌人的剩余生命值提升范围内防御塔的攻击暴击几率。

Increases the attack critical chance of towers in 175 range by 0.25% for each 1% hp the attacked creep has left.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01% attack crit chance
cn:
被攻击敌人每剩余1%生命值，使175范围内防御塔的攻击暴击几率提升0.25%。

en: Steam Power
cn: 蒸汽动力

en: Increases attack damage and attack speed of towers in range. Consumes mana.
cn: 提升范围内防御塔的攻击力和攻击速度。消耗法力值。

en: Increases attack damage of towers in 450 AoE by [color=GOLD][6 x power level]%[/color] and attack speed by half this amount. In order to sustain this, the engine consumes a lot of mana. Mana regeneration is reduced by [color=GOLD][10 x power level x squareroot(towers powered)]%[/color]. If the mana of the engine reaches zero it will deactivate itself for 120 seconds. Does not stack with other Steam Engines!
cn: 提升450范围内防御塔[color=GOLD][6×能量等级]%[/color]攻击力，以及该数值的一半的攻击速度。为维持运转，蒸汽机会消耗大量法力值，法力回复降低[color=GOLD][10×能量等级×√(受能防御塔数量)]%[/color]。当蒸汽机法力值归零时将休眠120秒。不可与其他蒸汽机叠加。

en: Bloody Experience
cn: 浴血经验

en: Nearby towers receive experience every time they crit with an attack.
cn: 附近防御塔每次暴击时获得经验。

en:
Every tower below 10 level in 250 range receives 1 experience every time it crits with an attack. The amount of experience gained is base attack speed and range adjusted. Level cap does not affect the Shaman himself.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 level cap every 5 levels
cn:
250范围内10级以下的防御塔每次暴击时获得1点经验。经验获取量按基础攻速和射程加权计算。等级上限对本防御塔自身无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每5级 +1 等级上限

en: Gift of Nature
cn: 自然馈赠

en: All nearby towers have a chance to entangle creeps. Entangled creeps are immobile and suffer spell damage over time.
cn: 附近防御塔有几率缠绕敌方单位，被缠绕单位无法移动并持续受到法术伤害。

en:
All towers in 175 range will receive a [color=GOLD]Gift of Nature[/color]. When a gifted tower attacks a creep there is a 10% attack speed adjusted chance to entangle that creep for 1.2 seconds, dealing 700 spell damage per second. Does not work on air units or bosses!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% chance 
+35 additional spell damage
cn:
175范围内所有防御塔将获得[color=GOLD]自然馈赠[/color]。受到增益的防御塔攻击时有10%攻速加权后的几率缠绕目标1.2秒，每秒造成700点法术伤害。对空中单位和首领无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 触发几率
+35 额外法术伤害

en: Revenge of Souls
cn: 复仇之魂

en: This tower gains permanent bonus attack damage and experience every time a creep dies near the tower.
cn: 每当有敌方单位在附近死亡，该防御塔永久获得攻击力与经验值。

en:
This tower gains 6 permanent bonus attack damage and 1 experience every time a creep in 1000 range dies.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3 damage per kill
cn:
每当有敌方单位在1000范围内死亡，该防御塔永久获得6点攻击力与1点经验值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3 攻击力

en: King's Authority
cn: 王者威仪

en: The Lich King rules over every creep in range. Every creep leaving this range will be punished and suffer spell damage.
cn: 巫妖王统御范围内的所有敌方单位。任何离开此范围的单位将受到之前每秒累积的法术伤害。

en:
The Lich King rules over every creep in 900 range. Every creep leaving this range will be punished with 500 spell damage for every second it was under this aura's effect.
If a creep dies in this area of authority, the spell damage that didn't get dealt is stored. The next creep to then leave the Lich King's area will be punished with [color=GOLD][stored damage x 0.5][/color] spell damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+20 damage per second
[color=GOLD]+[stored damage x 0.04][/color] spell damage
cn:
巫妖王统御900范围内的所有敌方单位。任何离开范围的单位将根据其受光环影响的时间，受到每秒500点法术伤害。
若敌方单位在领域内死亡，未结算的伤害将储存。下个离开领域的单位将额外承受[color=GOLD][储存伤害 x 0.5][/color]点法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+20 每秒伤害
[color=GOLD]+[储存伤害 x 0.04][/color] 法术伤害

en: Soul Revenge
cn: 魂之复仇

en: Hits 3 random creeps with dark powers, dealing spell damage.
cn: 用黑暗力量轰击3个随机敌方单位，造成法术伤害。

en:
Hits 3 random creeps in 875 range, the first one suffers 200 spell damage, the second one suffers 400 spell damage and the third one suffers 600 spell damage.

en: Lunar Grace
cn: 月神恩典

en: Smites a target creep dealing spell damage. There is also a chance to stun the creep and make it more vulnerable to spells.
cn: 惩戒目标敌方单位，造成法术伤害，并有几率将其击晕且使其更易受到法术伤害。

en:
Smites a target creep dealing 50 spell damage to it. There is also a 12.5% chance to empower the smite with lunar energy dealing 50 additional spell damage, stunning the target for 0.3 seconds and making it receive 12% more damage from spells for 2.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 inital and chanced spell damage
+0.5% chance
+20 initial damage at level 15
+3% spell damage received at level 15
+0.1 seconds stun at level 25
cn:
惩戒目标敌方单位，造成50点法术伤害。同时有12.5%几率灌注月能，额外造成50点法术伤害，击晕目标0.3秒，并使其在2.5秒内多承受12%法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 法术伤害
+0.5% 触发几率
15级时+20 基础伤害
15级时+3% 承受法术伤害
25级时+0.1秒 击晕时长

en: Time Field
cn: 时间力场

en: The Manipulator creates a field of time that inflicts future spell damage upon creatures around him.
cn: 时域操纵者在周围展开时空领域，对领域内敌方单位施加未来法术伤害。

en: The Manipulator creates a field of time that inflicts future spell damage upon creatures around him dealing 1500 damage every second for 10 seconds. This ability benefits from the buff duration bonus of [color=GOLD]Time Twist[/color].
cn: 时域操纵者在周围展开持续10秒的时空领域，每秒对领域内敌方单位造成1500点法术伤害。此效果受[color=GOLD]时光扭曲[/color]的增益状态持续时间加成。

en: Shock
cn: 震荡波

en: Slams all creeps around the target, dealing spell damage and stunning them.
cn: 轰击目标周围所有敌方单位，造成法术伤害并使其眩晕。

en:
Slams all creeps in 250 AoE around the target, dealing 1250 spell damage and stunning for 2 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+185 damage
cn:
轰击目标250范围内的所有敌方单位，造成1250点法术伤害并眩晕2秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+185 伤害

en: Cloudy Thunderstorm
cn: 阴云雷暴

en: Summons [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color] which strikes random creeps in range, dealing spell damage.
cn: 召唤[color=GOLD]阴云雷暴[/color]轰击范围内随机敌方单位，造成法术伤害。

en:
Summons [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color] which strikes random creeps in 1000 range every 0.4 seconds with lightning. Each strike deals [color=GOLD][current mana x 0.5][/color] spell damage and costs mana based on the target's size and the damage dealt. The storm ends when this tower's mana falls below 1000, or no creep comes within range for 4 seconds.
 
This ability will also activate automatically when this tower's mana reaches a set threshold, as determined by the [color=GOLD]Adjust Autocast Threshold[/color] ability. You can check current threshold in Tower Details.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02 damage per current mana
cn:
召唤[color=GOLD]阴云雷暴[/color]每0.4秒用闪电轰击1000范围内的随机目标。每次轰击造成[color=GOLD][当前法力值 x 0.5][/color]点法术伤害，并根据目标体型与伤害量消耗法力值。当法力值低于1000或4秒内无目标进入范围时雷暴消散。

此技能会在法力值达到[color=GOLD]调整雷暴阈值[/color]设定的阈值时自动激活。当前阈值可在防御塔详情中查看。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02 当前法力值伤害系数

en: Adjust Thunderstorm Threshold
cn: 调整雷暴阈值

en: Adjust the percentual mana required for [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color].
cn: 调整[color=GOLD]阴云雷暴[/color]的触发所需法力百分比。

en:
Use this ability to adjust the percentual mana required for [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color].
 
You can check current threshold in Tower Details.
cn:
使用此技能调整[color=GOLD]阴云雷暴[/color]的触发所需法力百分比。

当前设定阈值可在防御塔详情中查看。

en: Thornspray
cn: 荆棘喷射

en: This tower releases thorns from its back, dealing [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage to every unit in range.
cn: 该防御塔向周围发射尖刺，对范围内所有单位造成[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]类型的攻击伤害。

en:
This tower deals 30% of its attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage to every unit in 800 range around it. A creep hit by [color=GOLD]Thornspray[/color] receives 11% more damage than it did from the previous [color=GOLD]Thornspray[/color], if hit again within 1.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 40 times.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Save mana to amplify the effect of this ability.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% base damage
5% chance to doublecast [color=GOLD]Thornsprays[/color] at level 15
3% chance to triplecast [color=GOLD]Thornsprays[/color] at level 25
cn:
该防御塔对800范围内所有单位造成自身攻击力30%的[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]类型的攻击伤害。被[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]命中的敌方单位若在1.5秒内再次被命中，承受的伤害将比前次提升11%，此效果最多叠加40层。

[color=GOLD]提示：[/color]节省法力值可强化此技能效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 基础攻击力
15级时5%几率双重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]
25级时3%几率三重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]

15级时7%几率双重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]
25级时5%几率三重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]

en: Thornspray
cn: 荆棘喷射

en: This tower releases thorns from its back, dealing [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage to every unit in range.
cn: 该防御塔向周围发射尖刺，对范围内所有单位造成[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]类型的攻击伤害。

en:
This tower deals 30% of its attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage to every unit in 800 range around it. A creep hit by [color=GOLD]Thornspray[/color] receives 11% more damage than it did from the previous [color=GOLD]Thornspray[/color], if hit again within 1.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 40 times.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Save mana to amplify the effect of this ability.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% base damage
9% chance to doublecast [color=GOLD]Thornsprays[/color] at level 15
7% chance to triplecast [color=GOLD]Thornsprays[/color] at level 25
cn:
该防御塔对800范围内所有单位造成自身攻击力30%的[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]类型的攻击伤害。被[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]命中的敌方单位若在1.5秒内再次被命中，承受的伤害将比前次提升11%，此效果最多叠加40层。

[color=GOLD]提示：[/color]节省法力值可强化此技能效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 基础攻击力
15级时9%几率双重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]
25级时7%几率三重施放[color=GOLD]荆棘喷射[/color]

en: Charge
cn: 充能

en: Applies a buff to target tower which increases attack speed.
cn: 为目标防御塔施加提升攻击速度的增益状态。

en:
Applies a buff to target tower which lasts 10 seconds, it increases the attack speed of the tower by 25%. Every second this buff will grant an additional 5% bonus attack speed.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% base attack speed
+0.1% bonus attack speed
cn:
为目标防御塔施加持续10秒的增益状态，初始提升25%攻击速度，此后每秒额外提升5%攻击速度。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 基础攻击速度
+0.1% 额外攻击速度

en: Demonic Fire
cn: 魔焰诅咒

en: Places a debuff on a creep. When a tower damages the creep, there is a chance to permanently increase the damage it takes from [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers.
cn: 对敌方单位施加负面状态，受到攻击时有几率永久提升其承受[color=ff4500]火焰[/color]防御塔的伤害。

en:
Places a debuff on a creep for 7 seconds. When a tower damages the creep, there is a 20% chance to permanently increase the damage it takes from [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers by 3% (1% for bosses).
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08% damage (on non boss)
+0.04% damage (on bosses)
cn:
对敌方单位施加持续7秒的负面状态。当其受到攻击时，有20%几率永久提升其承受[color=ff4500]火焰[/color]防御塔的伤害3%（对首领为1%）。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.08% 伤害增幅（非首领）
+0.04% 伤害增幅（首领）

en: Wind Shear
cn: 风切变

en: Increases the attack speed of a tower and gives it a chance to cast [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] on attack. [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] deals spell damage.
cn: 提升防御塔攻击速度，并使其攻击时有几率施放[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]。

en:
Increases the attack speed of a tower in 300 range by 10% and gives it a 25% attack speed adjusted chance to cast a [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] on attack. [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] deals 100 initial spell damage and hits up to 3 targets dealing 25% less damage each bounce. Effect lasts for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% attack speed
+4 spell damage
+1 target at level 20
+0.1 sec duration
cn:
提升300范围内防御塔10%攻击速度，并赋予25%攻速加权后的几率在攻击时施放[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]。[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]造成100点初始法术伤害，最多弹射3个目标，每次弹射伤害衰减25%。效果持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 攻击速度
+4 法术伤害
20级时+1弹射目标
+0.1秒 持续时间

en: Maledict
cn: 巫毒诅咒

en: Witch Doctor jinxes all units in range with [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] which deals spell damage to the target.
cn: 对范围内所有单位施加[color=GOLD]巫毒诅咒[/color]，根据受诅咒期间受到的总伤害结算法术伤害

en:
Witch Doctor jinxes all units in 800 range with [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] which will deal spell damage to the target after 8 seconds. The damage is equal to 15% of the total damage received by the target while [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] was active. [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] stacks, with each stack adding 3.5% additional damage. If [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] is purged it deals double damage. This ability is unaffected by Buff Duration.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.14% damage per stack
cn:
巫医对800范围内所有单位施加[color=GOLD]巫毒诅咒[/color]，8秒后根据目标在诅咒期间承受的总伤害的15%造成法术伤害。每层诅咒叠加将提升3.5%最终伤害。若诅咒被驱散则造成双倍伤害。此效果不受增益状态持续时间影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.14% 每层伤害增幅

使1000范围内所有防御塔攻击速度降低10%。每有一个受影响的防御塔，加速器的法力回复提升2点/秒。效果持续8秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.1% 攻击速度削弱
+0.04 法力/秒

en: Freezing Gust
cn: 寒霜风暴

en: Casts a buff on a tower in range, doubling the effect of [color=GOLD]Gust Aura[/color].
cn: 对范围内防御塔施加增益，使[color=GOLD]风暴加持[/color]效果翻倍。

en:
Casts a buff on a tower in 800 range, doubling the effect of [color=GOLD]Gust Aura[/color] and increasing that tower's damage against air units by 10% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.05 seconds duration
+0.8% damage against air
cn:
对800范围内防御塔施加增益，使[color=GOLD]风暴加持[/color]效果翻倍，并在5秒内提升该防御塔对空伤害10%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.05秒 持续时间
+0.8% 对空伤害

en: Siphon Essence
cn: 精髓虹吸

en: Stuns nearby towers and steals their damage.
cn: 眩晕附近防御塔并窃取其伤害。

en:
Casts a buff on a nearby tower, if that tower tries to attack in the next 5 seconds it will be stunned for 2.5 seconds and this tower will deal [color=GOLD][stunned tower's DPS x 3][/color] as [color=7fffd4ff]Essence[/color] damage to the target of the buffed tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-0.02 seconds stun duration
cn:
对附近防御塔施加增益效果，若其在接下来5秒内尝试攻击，将被眩晕2.5秒。本防御塔将对该增益目标的攻击对象造成[color=GOLD][被眩晕防御塔秒伤 x 3][/color]点[color=7fffd4]精髓[/color]类型的伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.02秒 眩晕时长

cn: 精髓虹吸

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.02秒 眩晕时长

en: Sparks
cn: 星火迸发

en: Increases spell damage and spell crit chance of a nearby tower.
cn: 提升附近防御塔的法术伤害和法术暴击几率。

en:
Increases the spell damage for a tower in 500 range by 15% and it's spell critical strike chance by 10%. Lasts 7.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% spell damage
+0.1% spell critical strike chance
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
使500范围内防御塔法术伤害提升15%，法术暴击几率提升10%。效果持续7.5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 法术伤害
+0.1% 法术暴击几率
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Sparks
cn: 星火迸发

en: Increases spell damage and spell crit chance of a nearby tower.
cn: 提升附近防御塔的法术伤害和法术暴击几率。

en:
Increases the spell damage for a tower in 500 range by 20% and it's spell critical strike chance by 12.5%. Lasts 7.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% spell damage
+0.2% spell critical strike chance
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
使500范围内防御塔法术伤害提升20%，法术暴击几率提升12.5%。效果持续7.5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 法术伤害
+0.2% 法术暴击几率
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Eruption
cn: 凤凰爆发

en: Explodes all creeps affected by [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
cn: 引爆所有受[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]影响的敌方单位。

en: Explodes all creeps affected by [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color], triggering the [color=GOLD]Phoenix Explosion[/color] ability. [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] debuff expires after explosion.
cn: 引爆所有受[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]影响的敌方单位，触发[color=GOLD]凤凰爆燃[/color]效果，引爆后[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]负面状态消失。

en: Eruption
cn: 凤凰爆发

en: Explodes all creeps affected by [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
cn: 引爆所有受[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]影响的敌方单位。

en: Hammer Fall
cn: 战锤天降

en: Summons a hammer which falls from the sky and deals AoE spell damage.
cn: 召唤从天而降的战锤，造成范围法术伤害。

en:
Summons a hammer which falls from the sky. The hammer deals 10000 spell damage to all units in 600 AoE and stuns them for 1 second. Each of the player's storm tower in 2500 range loses 10% attack damage for 6 seconds but increases the spell damage of the hammer by 5%. Can gain a maximum of 100% bonus damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% damage from towers
cn:
召唤一柄从天而降的战锤，对600范围内的所有单位造成10000点法术伤害并眩晕1秒。6秒内2500范围内每座玩家的风暴防御塔将降低10%攻击力，但使战锤的法术伤害提升5%。最多可获得100%伤害加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 来自防御塔的伤害

en: Choose Modification
cn: 法球切换

en: Cycle through modifications.
cn: 切换法球效果

en:
Cycle through modifications. Selected modification will be used as target for [color=GOLD]Apply Modification[/color] and [color=GOLD]Remove Modification[/color] abilities. Note that you must apply modification after selection to make it active.
 
[color=ROYAL_BLUE]Slow[/color]: 8% for 5 seconds; costs 20% missile dmg
[color=DARK_SEA_GREEN]Silence[/color]: 5 seconds, 50% chance; costs 40% missile dmg
[color=ORANGE_RED]Health Regeneration[/color]: -10% for 5 seconds; costs 25% missile dmg
[color=TAN]Armor[/color]: -6% for 5 seconds; costs 25% missile dmg
[color=MEDIUM_PURPLE]Spell Vulnerability[/color]: 12% for 5 seconds; costs 25% missile dmg
[color=LIME_GREEN]AoE radius[/color]: +50; costs 15% missile dmg
 
You can check current modification status in Tower Details.
cn:
循环切换法球效果。选定效果将作为[color=GOLD]选定法球[/color]和[color=GOLD]移除法球[/color]的操作目标。注意：需在选定后应用法球才能生效。

[color=ROYAL_BLUE]减速[/color]：5秒内减速8%；减少20%飞弹伤害
[color=DARK_SEA_GREEN]沉默[/color]：5秒沉默，50%触发几率；减少40%飞弹伤害
[color=ORANGE_RED]生命恢复[/color]：5秒内降低10%生命恢复；减少25%飞弹伤害
[color=TAN]护甲[/color]：5秒内降低6%护甲；减少25%飞弹伤害
[color=MEDIUM_PURPLE]法术易伤[/color]：5秒内承受12%额外法术伤害；减少25%飞弹伤害
[color=LIME_GREEN]范围半径[/color]：+50；减少15%飞弹伤害

当前法球效果可在防御塔详情中查看。

en: Apply Modification
cn: 选定法球

en: Applies modification to [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] if the tower has enough damage left.
cn: 为[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]附加特殊效果（需保留足够伤害量）。

en:
Applies currently selected modification to [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] if the tower has enough damage left.
 
Multiple different modifications can be applied at the same time.
 
You can check current modification status in Tower Details.
cn:
若此防御塔剩余伤害量充足，将为[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]附加当前选定的法球效果。

可同时应用多种不同类型的法球效果。

当前法球效果可在防御塔详情中查看。

en: Remove Modification
cn: 移除法球

en: Removes modification from [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] and refunds the damage used.
cn: 移除[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]已附加所有效果并返还扣减的伤害量。

en:
Removes currently selected modification from [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] and refunds the damage used.
 
You can check current modification status in Tower Details.
cn:
移除[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]当前选定的法球效果，并返还对应消耗的伤害量。

当前法球效果可在防御塔详情中查看。

en: Love Potion
cn: 爱情药剂

en: The Witch throws a love potion on the target, applying a slow and increasing target's item chance.
cn: 女巫对敌方目标投掷爱情药剂，施加减速效果并提升其物品获取率。

en:
The Witch throws a love potion on the target, slowing it by 25% and increasing its item chance by 20%. The potion lasts 7 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.38% slow
+0.3% item drop chance
cn:
女巫对敌方目标投掷爱情药剂，使其减速25%并提升20%物品获取率。药水效果持续7秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+0.3% 物品掉落几率

en: Release Energy
cn: 能量释放

en: Deals damage to the target and stuns it.
cn: 对目标造成伤害并使其眩晕。

en:
Deals 4000 damage to the attacked creep and stuns it for 3 seconds (1 seconds on bosses).
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+150 damage
cn:
对被攻击的敌方单位造成4000点伤害并眩晕3秒（对首领眩晕1秒）。

en: Release Energy
cn: 能量释放

en: Deals damage to the target and stuns it.
cn: 对目标造成伤害并使其眩晕。

en:
Deals 12000 damage to the attacked creep and stuns it for 5 seconds (1.75 seconds on bosses).
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+450 damage
cn:
对被攻击的敌方单位造成12000点伤害并眩晕5秒（对首领眩晕1.75秒）。

+450 伤害

en: Thunderstorm
cn: 雷霆风暴

en: Zeus releases a mighty thunderstorm, this thunder storm strikes creeps in range and stuns them.
cn: 宙斯召唤强力雷云，轰击范围内敌方单位并造成眩晕。

en:
Zeus releases a mighty thunderstorm, this thunder storm strikes creeps in 1000 range for 2500 spell damage and stuns them for 0.5 seconds (20% chance on bosses). There is a maximum of 20 lightning strikes.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+125 damage
+1 lightning strike per 5 levels
cn:
宙斯召唤持续10秒的雷云，对1000范围内的敌方单位造成2500点法术伤害并眩晕0.5秒（对首领单位20%几率触发眩晕）。最多进行20次闪电轰击。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+125 伤害
每5级+1次闪电轰击

en: Stim
cn: 兴奋剂

en: This marine uses a stim, increasing its attack speed and decreasing its attack damage.
cn: 陆战队员使用兴奋剂，提升攻击速度但降低攻击力。

en:
This marine uses a stim, increasing its attack speed by 150% and decreasing its attack damage by 50%. This buff lasts 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08 seconds duration
cn:
陆战队员使用兴奋剂，攻击速度提升150%但攻击力降低50%。效果持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

en: Energy Conversion
cn: 能量转化

en: Spawns 3 chain lightning orbs that fly around the Converter. Orbs deal spell damage and stun nearby units.
cn: 生成3枚环绕自身的闪电法球，造成法术伤害并眩晕附近单位。

en:
Spawns 3 orbs that last 12 seconds flying around the Converter. Each orb deals 1500 spell damage per second to random units in 650 range. Additionally, the orbs have a 25% chance every second to cast a [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] that deals 1500 initial spell damage and hits up to 4 targets dealing 25% less damage with each bounce.
 
Units hit by the [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] are stunned for 0.8 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+75 orb damage
+1 orb spawned per 5 levels
cn:
生成3枚持续12秒的闪电法球环绕自身。每枚法球每秒对650范围内的随机单位造成1500点法术伤害，并有25%几率施放[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]造成1500点初始法术伤害，最多弹射4个目标，每次弹射伤害衰减25%。

被[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]击中的单位将眩晕0.8秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+75 法球伤害
每5级+1枚法球

en: Lightmare
cn: 闪电梦魇

en: Summons a storm cloud which attacks units in range, dealing spell damage.
cn: 召唤雷云攻击范围内单位，造成法术伤害。

en:
Summons a storm cloud which attacks units in 1500 range. Every 0.33 seconds the cloud attacks up to 3 targets with forked lightning. Each lightning deals 1300 spell damage. [color=GOLD]Lightmare[/color] lasts 10 seconds and does not benefit from buff duration stat.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+52 spell damage
cn:
召唤持续10秒的雷云，每0.33秒对1500范围内至多3个目标发动分叉闪电攻击，每次造成1300点法术伤害。此效果不受增益状态持续时间属性影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+52 法术伤害

en: Sunlight Burst
cn: 日耀冲击

en: Stuns all towers and creeps in range.
cn: 眩晕范围内所有防御塔和敌方单位。

en:
Stuns all towers and all enemies in 1000 range for 1.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02 seconds
cn:
使1000范围内的所有防御塔和敌方单位眩晕1.5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02秒

en: Recreation Field
cn: 重塑区域

en: Set up [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color] at a chosen location.
cn: 在指定位置部署[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]。

en: Set up [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color] at a chosen location. Creeps walking over [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] will sometimes get transported to [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color]. Field has 250 AoE.
cn: 在指定位置部署[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]。经过[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]的敌方单位有几率被传送至重塑区域。区域范围为250。

en: Corruption Field
cn: 腐化区域

en: Set up [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] at a chosen location.
cn: 在指定位置部署[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]。

en: Set up [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] at a chosen location. Creeps walking over [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] will sometimes get transported to [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color]. Field has 250 AoE.
cn: 在指定位置部署[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]。经过此区域的敌方单位有几率被传送至[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]。区域范围为250。

en: Equips the tower with concussive bombs.
cn: 为防御塔装备震荡炸弹。

en:
Equips the tower with concussive bombs. Each attack slows all the creeps in a 250 area around the target by 15% for 4 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% slow
cn:
为防御塔装备震荡炸弹。每次攻击将使目标250范围内的所有敌方单位减速15%，持续4秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 减速效果

+0.4% armor reduction

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 护甲削弱

cn: 为防御塔装备烟雾炸弹。

Equips the tower with smoke bombs. Each attack silences all the creeps in a 250 area around the target for 1 second.

en: Impenetrable Darkness
cn: 绝暗领域

en: Shrouds a creep in darkness, slowing it and converting attack damage it takes into spell damage.
cn: 用黑暗笼罩敌方单位，将其减速并将所受攻击伤害转化为法术伤害。

en:
Shrouds a creep in darkness, slowing it by 40% for 5 seconds and reducing the damage it takes from attacks by 95%. [color=GOLD]Impenetrable Darkness[/color] also deals 1000 spell damage per second.
 
When [color=GOLD]Impenetrable Darkness[/color] expires, it will deal spell damage equal to 75% of all the damage it received during the effect. This damage can't be a critical hit.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+40 damage per second
+1% damage on expire 
+0.8% slow
cn:
用黑暗笼罩敌方单位5秒，减速40%并减少95%所受攻击伤害。期间每秒造成1000点法术伤害。

当[color=GOLD]绝暗领域[/color]结束时，将结算作用期间承受总伤害的75%转化为法术伤害。此伤害无法暴击。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+40 每秒伤害
+1% 结算伤害
+0.8% 减速效果

en: Dimensional Link
cn: 维度链接

en: Creates a link between this tower and the target tower.
cn: 在本防御塔与目标防御塔之间建立能量连接。

en: Creates a link between this tower and the target tower. This tower will now monitor any spell damage dealt by the linked tower to creeps within 2000 range of this tower. If the linked tower is sold, replaced or upgraded the link will dissolve.
cn: 在本防御塔与目标防御塔之间建立连接。本防御塔将监测被连接防御塔对2000范围内敌方单位造成的所有法术伤害。若被连接防御塔被出售、替换或升阶，连接将解除。

en: Will of the Undying
cn: 不朽意志

en: The death knight empowers himself by draining the power of nearby towers.
cn: 死亡骑士通过汲取附近防御塔的力量强化自身。

en:
The Death Knight decreases the base attack damage of all towers in 200 range by 10% and loses 50% of his remaining mana to increase his base damage by 15% for each tower affected for 5 seconds. Only towers that cost at least 1300 gold are affected by this spell.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% damage absorbed
cn:
死亡骑士降低200范围内所有防御塔10%基础攻击力，并消耗50%剩余法力值。每影响一座防御塔，自身基础攻击力提升15%持续5秒。仅影响价格不低于1300金的防御塔。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 伤害吸收率

en: Morph: Might
cn: 属性变换：力量

en: Activates [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color].
cn: 激活[color=GOLD]属性变换：力量[/color]。

en: Activates [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color]. As long as this buff is on this tower gains 2% base damage and loses 2% attack speed on every attack, up to a maximum of 50 times. Removes [color=GOLD]Morph: Swiftness[/color] and resets its bonus when activated.
cn: 激活后，每次攻击提升2%基础攻击力并降低2%攻击速度，最多叠加50层。激活时将移除[color=GOLD]属性变换：敏捷[/color]并重置其增益。

en: Morph: Swiftness
cn: 属性变换：敏捷

cn: 激活[color=GOLD]属性变换：敏捷[/color]。

en: Activates [color=GOLD]Morph: Swiftness[/color]. As long as this buff is on this tower gains 2% attack speed and loses 2% base damage on every attack, up to a maximum of 50 times. Removes [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color] and resets its bonus when activated.
cn: 激活后，每次攻击提升2%攻击速度并降低2%基础攻击力，最多叠加50层。激活时将移除[color=GOLD]属性变换：力量[/color]并重置其增益。

en: Adapt
cn: 形态适应

en: Stops the effect of morphs.
cn: 停止属性变换效果。

en: Stops the effect of [color=GOLD]Morphs[/color], leaving the current [color=GOLD]Morph[/color] buff on the tower. Using the spell again removes [color=GOLD]Adapt[/color].
cn: 停止[color=GOLD]属性变换[/color]技能效果，保留当前形态的增益效果。再次使用此技能将移除[color=GOLD]属性变换[/color]状态。

cn: 过载电池

en: Starts attacking very fast until out of mana, dealing spell damage and applying [color=GOLD]Frost[/color].
cn: 高速攻击直至法力值耗尽，造成法术伤害并施加[color=GOLD]霜寒[/color]效果。

The tower attacks creeps in a range of 1200 every 0.2 seconds till all mana is gone. Each attack (or try to attack) costs 10 mana, deals 300 spell damage and applies [color=GOLD]Frost[/color].
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] this ability does not trigger any 'on hit' effects.

en:
The tower attacks creeps in a range of 1200 every 0.2 seconds till all mana is gone. Each attack (or attempt) costs 10 mana, deals 300 spell damage and applies [color=GOLD]Faerie Fire[/color].
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] this ability does not trigger any 'on hit' effects.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+12 spell damage
cn:
每0.2秒攻击1200范围内的敌方单位直至法力值耗尽。每次攻击（或攻击尝试）消耗10法力值，造成300点法术伤害并施加[color=GOLD]精灵之火[/color]。

[color=GOLD]注意：[/color]此技能不会触发任何「命中时」效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+12 法术伤害

en: Sacrifice
cn: 献祭

en: This tower loses a portion of its attack damage to boost the DPS of a nearby tower.
cn: 牺牲本防御塔部分攻击力，提升附近一座防御塔的秒伤。

en:
This tower loses 100% of its attack damage to boost the DPS of a tower in 500 range by 30% of its total attack damage for 6 seconds. This buff has no effect on towers of the same family.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% bonus damage
cn:
本防御塔失去100%攻击力，使500范围内一座防御塔的秒伤提升本防御塔总攻击力的30%，持续6秒。不能对同类型防御塔生效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 伤害加成

en: Soul Chill
cn: 灵魂寒颤

en: Deals spell damage and slows units in a small area.
cn: 对范围内敌方单位造成法术伤害并减速。

en:
Chills the souls of all creeps in 250 AoE of the target, dealing 50 spell damage and slowing them by 5% for 4 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 damage
+0.2% slow
+0.02 seconds duration
cn:
冻结目标250范围内所有敌方单位的灵魂，造成50点法术伤害并使其减速5%，持续4秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 伤害
+0.2% 减速效果
+0.02秒 持续时间

en: Mystical Trance
cn: 神秘冥想

en: Buffs a tower in range, increasing its spell damage and trigger chances.
cn: 强化范围内一座防御塔的法术伤害与触发几率。

en:
Buffs a tower in 500 range, increasing its spell damage and trigger chances by 25%. Lasts 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2 sec duration
+1% spell damage
+1% trigger chances
cn:
强化500范围内一座防御塔，使其法术伤害与触发几率提升25%，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2秒 持续时间
+1% 法术伤害
+1% 触发几率

en: Speed Up
cn: 引擎增压

en: Increases the power level of the engine.
cn: 提升蒸汽机的功率等级。

en: Increases the power level of the engine by 1. Maximum power level is 50.
cn: 将蒸汽机的功率等级提升1级，最高可提升至50级。

en: Speed Down
cn: 引擎减压

en: Decreases the power level of the engine.
cn: 降低蒸汽机的功率等级。

en: Decreases the power level of the engine by 1.
cn: 将蒸汽机的功率等级降低1级。

en: Bloodlust
cn: 嗜血术

en: The Shaman makes a friendly tower lust for blood, increasing its crit damage and attack speed.
cn: 使友方防御塔陷入嗜血状态，提升其暴击伤害与攻击速度。

en:
The Shaman makes a friendly tower lust for blood, increasing its crit damage by x0.45 and attack speed by 15% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+x0.004 crit damage
+0.2% attack speed
+0.12 seconds duration
cn:
使友方防御塔陷入嗜血状态，5秒内暴击伤害提升x0.45，攻击速度提升15%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+0.12秒 持续时间

+x0.006 crit damage
+0.3% attack speed
+0.12 seconds duration
cn:
使友方防御塔陷入嗜血状态，5秒内暴击伤害提升x0.55，攻击速度提升20%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+x0.006倍 暴击伤害
+0.3% 攻击速度
+0.12秒 持续时间

en: Bloodlust
cn: 嗜血术

en: The Shaman makes a friendly tower lust for blood, increasing its crit damage and attack speed.
cn: 使友方防御塔陷入嗜血状态，提升其暴击伤害与攻击速度。

en:
The Shaman makes a friendly tower lust for blood, increasing its crit damage by x0.65 and attack speed by 25% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+x0.008 crit damage
+0.4% attack speed
+0.12 seconds duration
cn:
使友方防御塔陷入嗜血状态，5秒内暴击伤害提升x0.65，攻击速度提升25%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+x0.008倍 暴击伤害
+0.4% 攻击速度
+0.12秒 持续时间

en: Nature's Gift
cn: 自然馈赠

en: Buffs a tower, increasing stats depending on tower's element.
cn: 根据目标防御塔的元素类型施加对应的强化效果。

en:
One of the spirits flies towards a tower in 500 range and buffs it for 5 seconds. The buff has a different effect depending on the tower's element:
+28% experience for [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color]
+16% spell damage for [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color]
+4% crit chance for [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color]
+16% attack damage for [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color]
+20% buff duration for [color=6495edff]Ice[/color]
+8% attack speed for [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color]
+6% item chance for [color=d2b48cff]Iron[/color]
The buffed tower has a 25% chance to receive another random effect in addition to the first one.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% experience
+0.4% spell damage
+0.1% crit chance
+0.4% attack damage
+0.6% buff duration
+0.2% attack speed
+0.14% item chance
cn:
向500范围内一座防御塔释放自然精魄，持续5秒。目标防御塔根据其不同的元素类型获得对应的增益：
[color=66cdaa]星辰[/color]：+28% 经验值获取率
[color=9370db]黑暗[/color]：+16% 法术伤害
[color=32cd32]自然[/color]：+4% 暴击几率
[color=ff4500]火焰[/color]：+16% 攻击力
[color=6495ed]寒冰[/color]：+20% 增益状态持续时间
[color=ffffe0]风暴[/color]：+8% 攻击速度
[color=d2b48c]钢铁[/color]：+6% 物品获取率
受强化防御塔有25%几率额外获得随机一种效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.8% 经验值获取率
+0.4% 法术伤害
+0.1% 暴击几率
+0.4% 攻击力
+0.6% 增益状态持续时间
+0.2% 攻击速度
+0.14% 物品获取率

en: Unleash
cn: 能量倾泻

en: Unleashes built up energy, dealing spell damage to a single creep and increasing the spell crit damage of nearby towers.
cn: 释放积攒的能量，对单个敌方单位造成法术伤害并提升附近防御塔的法术暴击伤害。

en:
Unleashes built up energy, dealing [color=GOLD][400 x wave][/color] spell damage to a single creep and increasing the spell crit damage of nearby towers within 350 range by x0.75 for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+8 spell damage per wave
+x0.03 spell crit damage
cn:
释放能量，对单个敌方单位造成[color=GOLD][400 x 波次][/color]点法术伤害，并使350范围内防御塔的法术暴击伤害提升x0.75倍，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每波次+8 法术伤害
+x0.03倍 法术暴击伤害

en: Targeted Run
cn: 定向突袭

en: Copter #1 will teleport behind the target after a delay.
cn: 1号直升机将传送至目标后方。

en: Copter #1 will teleport behind the target after a delay of 1 second.
cn: 1号直升机将在1秒后传送至目标后方。

en: Soul Storm
cn: 灵魂风暴

en: When this spell is activated 2 souls will be periodically released.
cn: 激活时周期性释放灵魂能量。

en: When this spell is activated 2 souls will be released every 0.3 seconds. When a soul collides with a creep it deals 14000 spell damage. When a soul damages a creep, its damage is reduced by 50%.
cn: 激活后每0.3秒释放2道灵魂能量。灵魂能量命中敌方单位时造成14000点法术伤害，后续命中同一目标的伤害衰减50%。

en: Awaken
cn: 觉醒

en: Increases the attack speed of nearby towers and permanently increases the attack speed of this tower.
cn: 提升附近防御塔攻击速度并永久提升本塔攻速。

en:
Increases the attack speed of towers within 350 range by 50% for 3 seconds and permanently increases the attack speed of this tower by 1%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% attack speed
cn:
使350范围内防御塔攻击速度提升50%持续3秒，并永久提升本塔1%攻击速度。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 攻击速度

en: Intense Heat
cn: 炽热爆发

en: Expends all mana to unleash a wave of heat, dealing spell damage.
cn: 消耗全部法力释放灼热气浪，造成法术伤害。

en:
Expends all mana to unleash a wave of heat, dealing [color=GOLD][mana x 7][/color] spell damage and applying [color=GOLD]Lingering Flame[/color] to all creeps in 1000 range. Increases the attack and spell crit chance of nearby towers within 350 range by [color=GOLD][mana / 300]%[/color] for 4 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2 spell damage per mana
cn:
消耗所有法力值，对1000范围内敌方单位造成[color=GOLD][法力值 x 7][/color]点法术伤害并施加[color=GOLD]余烬灼烧[/color]。同时使350范围内防御塔的攻击暴击几率与法术暴击几率提升[color=GOLD][法力值 / 300]%[/color]，持续4秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每点法力值+0.2 法术伤害

en: Glaivesaw
cn: 回旋刃轮

en: Create a [color=GOLD]Glaivesaw[/color] at the target location.
cn: 在目标位置创造[color=GOLD]回旋刃轮[/color]。

en:
Create a [color=GOLD]Glaivesaw[/color] at the target location. [color=GOLD]Glaivesaws[/color] deal 50% of attack damage as [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage per second to enemies within 150 range. Limited to 3 [color=GOLD]Glaivesaws[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage
cn:
在目标位置创造[color=GOLD]回旋刃轮[/color]，每秒对150范围内敌方单位造成攻击力50%的[color=GOLD]撕裂[/color]伤害。最多同时存在3个刃轮。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 伤害

en: Shattering Barrage
cn: 碎裂弹幕

en: Spends all mana to encase the target in ice.
cn: 消耗全部法力值将目标封入冰中。

en:
Spends all mana to encase the target in ice, stunning it and increasing all damage taken by 100% for up to [color=GOLD][mana / 150][/color] seconds. All icicles are then fired at the target. Duration is reduced by 75% on Bosses, to a minimum of 2 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1 mana divisor
cn:
消耗全部法力值将目标封入冰中，使其昏迷并受到的所有伤害提高100%，持续最多[color=GOLD][法力值 / 150][/color]秒。所有冰刺会立即射向目标。对首领的持续时间减少75%，最低持续2秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1 法力除数

en: Blizzard
cn: 暴风雪

en: Summons a mighty [color=GOLD]Blizzard[/color]. Each wave deals spell damage and has a chance to slow and stun all enemy units in the target area.
cn: 召唤强大的[color=GOLD]暴风雪[/color]。每波都会造成法术伤害并有几率减速和击晕目标区域内所有敌方单位。

en:
Summons 5 waves of icy spikes which fall down to earth. Each wave deals 60 spell damage in an AoE of 200.
 
Each time a creep is damaged by [color=GOLD]Blizzard[/color] there is a 30% chance to slow the creep by 7% for 4 seconds and a 10% chance to stun the creep for 0.25 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+6 spell damage
+0.01% slow
+1% chance for slow
+0.1% chance for stun
cn:
召唤5波从天而降的冰刺。每波对200范围区域造成60点法术伤害。

每次敌方单位受到[color=GOLD]暴风雪[/color]伤害时，有30%几率使其减速7%持续4秒，以及10%几率击晕该单位0.25秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+6 法术伤害
+0.01% 减速效果
+1% 减速几率
+0.1% 击晕几率

en: Adds a buff to the target tower which increases the amount of experience the tower gains.
cn: 为目标防御塔添加增益状态，提高其获得经验值的数量。

en: Increases bounty gain of a nearby tower and gives gold to player.
cn: 提升附近防御塔的赏金获取率并为玩家提供金币。

en:
This tower adds a buff to a tower in 400 range that lasts 10 seconds. The buff increases bounty gain by 40%. Everytime this spell is cast you gain 5 gold.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4 seconds duration
+0.6% bounty gain
cn:
为400范围内防御塔添加持续10秒的增益状态，使其赏金获取率提高40%。每次施放该技能可获得5金币。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4秒 持续时间
+0.6% 赏金获取率

en: Golden Influence
cn: 黄金支配

en: Increases bounty gain of a nearby tower and gives gold to player.
cn: 提升附近防御塔的赏金获取率并为玩家提供金币。

en:
This tower adds a buff to a tower in 400 range that lasts 12 seconds. The buff increases bounty gain by 60%. Everytime this spell is cast you gain 7 gold.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4 seconds duration
+0.6% bounty gain
cn:
为400范围内防御塔添加持续12秒的增益状态，使其赏金获取率提高60%。每次施放该技能可获得7金币。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4秒 持续时间
+0.6% 赏金获取率

en: Extract Experience
cn: 经验萃取

en: Applies a debuff on a creep. Towers that damage this creep have a chance to extract extra experience.
cn: 对一个敌方单位施加负面状态。攻击该单位的防御塔有几率获得额外经验。

en:
Applies a debuff on a creep. Towers that damage this creep have a 33% chance to extract 1 experience. Lasts 10 seconds or until 10 extractions occur.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.05 experience
+1 extraction
cn:
对一个敌方单位施加负面状态。攻击该单位的防御塔有33%几率获得1点经验。持续10秒或触发10次触发次数。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.05 经验
+1次 触发次数

en: Extract Experience
cn: 经验萃取

en: Applies a debuff on a creep. Towers that damage this creep have a chance to extract extra experience.
cn: 对一个敌方单位施加负面状态。攻击该单位的防御塔有几率获得额外经验。

en:
Applies a debuff on a creep. Towers that damage this creep have a 33% chance to extract 2 experience. Lasts 10 seconds or until 10 extractions occur.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 experience
+1 extraction
cn:
对一个敌方单位施加负面状态。攻击该单位的防御塔有33%几率获得2点经验。持续10秒或触发10次触发次数。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.05 经验
+1次 触发次数

en: Attraction
cn: 引力牵引

en: This tower buffs 4 towers in range and gives them a chance to release a meteor when attacking or casting spells.
cn: 强化射程内4座防御塔，使其攻击或施法时有几率召唤陨石。

en:
This tower buffs 4 towers in 500 range and gives them a 35% attack speed adjusted chance on attack to release a meteor dealing 200 spell damage, or a 100% chance to release a meteor on spell cast dealing 500 spell damage. The Meteors fly towards a random target in 1000 range and deal damage in 220 AoE around the main target. The buff lasts until a meteor is released. Meteor damage is dealt by the buffed tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 tower buffed every 5 levels
+8 spell damage on attack
+20 spell damage on cast
cn:
强化500范围内4座防御塔，使其攻击时有35%攻速加权后的几率召唤陨石并造成200点法术伤害，施法时100%几率召唤造成500点法术伤害的陨石。陨石飞向1000范围内随机目标，并对主目标220范围区域造成伤害。该增益在召唤陨石后消失。陨石伤害视作被强化的防御塔造成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每5级+1座 强化防御塔数量
+8 攻击触发陨石的法术伤害
+20 施法触发陨石的法术伤害

en: Magnetic Surge
cn: 磁能涌动

en: This tower creates a [color=GOLD]Magnetic Surge[/color] at its target's current location. Target will take periodic damage.
cn: 在目标当前位置制造[color=GOLD]磁能涌动[/color]。目标将周期性受到伤害。

en:
This tower creates a [color=GOLD]Magnetic Surge[/color] at the target's current location. The creep will suffer spell damage equal to 4 times the distance to the spot where the surge was created every 0.4 seconds. This effect lasts 4 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% spell damage
+0.1 seconds duration
cn:
在目标位置制造[color=GOLD]磁能涌动[/color]。该敌方单位每0.4秒会受到相当于与涌动中心距离4倍的法术伤害，持续4秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 法术伤害
+0.1秒 持续时间

en: Replenish
cn: 回春

en: Restores mana of nearby towers.
cn: 恢复附近防御塔的法力值。

en:
Restores 10% of each towers maximum mana for towers in 500 range. Restores only half the amount for towers of the same family.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% maximum mana
cn:
为500范围内每座防御塔恢复其最大法力值的10%的法力值。对同类型防御塔仅产生一半效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 最大法力值

cn: 回春

en: Restores mana of nearby towers.

en:
Restores 15% of each towers maximum mana for towers in 500 range. Restores only half the amount for towers of the same family.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]

cn:
为500范围内每座防御塔恢复其最大法力值的15%的法力值。对同类型防御塔仅产生一半效果。

en: Dreadlord's Awakening
cn: 夜魔觉醒

en: When activated, Dreadlord empowers himself with darkness.
cn: 激活时，恐惧魔王以黑暗之力强化自身。

en:
When activated, Dreadlord empowers himself with darkness for 10 seconds, increasing own attack speed by 50% and mana regeneration by 20 per second.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% attack speed
+0.8 mana per second
cn:
激活后，恐惧魔王在10秒内被黑暗之力强化，自身攻击速度提高50%，每秒法力回复增加20点。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 攻击速度
+0.8 法力值/秒

en: Astral Eruption
cn: 星界喷涌

en: Releases a huge wave of astral power through the gate. This empowers falcons.
cn: 通过传送门释放巨量星界能量，强化战鹰。

en:
Releases a huge wave of astral power through the gate, weakening the boundary between the planes. This empowers all currently alive falcons and any that are created during the next 6 seconds, allowing them to deal double damage and partially shift their targets into the astral plane, increasing the damage they take from [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color] towers by 1% of the falcon's current damage ratio.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.18 seconds
cn:
释放巨量星界能量穿透传送门，削弱位面边界。强化当前存活及未来6秒内生成的所有战鹰，使其造成双倍伤害，并将目标部分拖入星界位面，使目标受到来自[color=66cdaaff]星辰系[/color]防御塔的伤害提高战鹰当前伤害系数的1%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.18秒 持续时间

en: Eden's Wrath
cn: 伊甸之怒

en: Create a huge explosion.
cn: 自然大爆发。

en: The garden uses half of the stored lifeforce to create a huge explosion, dealing [color=gold][current wave level x 15][/color] spell damage in 1600 AoE for each lifeforce stored.
cn: 消耗半数储存的生命能量创造巨型爆炸，每点储存能量对1600范围区域造成[color=gold][当前波次等级×15][/color]点法术伤害。

en: For the God
cn: 众神之力

en: This tower casts a buff on a tower that increases attack damage and experience gain.
cn: 这座防御塔对一座友方防御塔施加增益效果，提升攻击伤害与经验获取率。

en:
This tower casts a buff on a friendly tower that increases attack damage and experience gain by 40%. The buff lasts 8 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 seconds duration
+1% attack damage and experience gain
cn:
这座防御塔对一座友方防御塔施加增益效果，提升40%攻击伤害与经验获取率。该增益持续8秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间
+1% 攻击伤害与经验获取率

en: Unstable Energies
cn: 不稳定的能量

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to release a powerful energy blast at the cost of some mana, dealing [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage.
cn: 每当这座防御塔击中敌方单位时，有几率消耗部分法力值释放强力能量冲击，造成[color=6495edff]元素[/color]伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 28% chance to release a powerful energy blast, dealing [color=GOLD][current mana x 8][/color] [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage to the target, but consuming 75% of its own current mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.48% chance
-1% current mana consumed
cn:
每当这座防御塔击中敌方单位时，有28%几率释放强力能量冲击，对目标造成[color=GOLD][当前法力值 x 8][/color]点[color=6495edff]元素[/color]伤害，但会消耗自身75%当前法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.48% 触发几率
-1% 法力值消耗

en: Future Knowledge
cn: 未来预知

en: Every 10 seconds, the Manipulator travels into the future to learn more and gain experience, then returns to where he left.
cn: 每10秒，操纵者将穿越至未来学习知识并获得经验，随后返回原处。

en: Every 10 seconds, the Manipulator travels into the future to learn more and gains 2 experience, then returns to where he left. If he has 700 or more exp then he will exchange 50 experience for 5% extra spell damage. If the Manipulator is replaced by another tower, this process is reversed and all experience refunded.
cn: 每10秒，操纵者将穿越至未来学习知识并获得2点经验值，随后返回原处。当经验值达到700点以上时，每50点经验值可转换为5%额外法术伤害。若该防御塔被其他防御塔替换，此过程将逆转并返还所有经验值。

en: Swarm of Bugs
cn: 虫群侵袭

en: On kill, produces bugs that increase the base damage of this tower.
cn: 消灭敌人时产生甲虫，提升该防御塔的基础攻击力。

en:
On kill, produces bugs that increase the base damage of this tower by 6. The damage gain decreases by 1 for every 12 productions, down to a minimum of 1.
 
Number of produced bugs is retained through upgrade and applied with the upgrade's values. Replacing a tower from a different family will produce bugs from 60% of its total kills.
cn:
消灭敌人时产生甲虫，每只甲虫提升该防御塔6点基础攻击力。每累计产生12只甲虫后，每只甲虫能提供的基础攻击力降低1点，最低降至1点。

甲虫数量在升阶时保留并应用新阶数值。替换为不同类型的防御塔时，将基于原防御塔总杀敌数的60%生成甲虫并保留。

en: Ice Nova
cn: 冰霜新星

en: Chance to blast hit creeps target with an [color=GOLD]Ice Nova[/color], dealing AoE spell damage and slowing all affected creeps.
cn: 攻击时有几率对命中的敌方单位施放[color=GOLD]寒冰新星[/color]，造成范围法术伤害并减速所有受影响目标。

en:
20% chance to blast hit creeps with an [color=GOLD]Ice Nova[/color], dealing 150 spell damage in 250 range and slowing all affected creeps by 7.5% for 2 seconds. Has a 30% bonus chance to crit.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+7.5 spell damage
cn:
20%几率对命中的敌方单位施放[color=GOLD]寒冰新星[/color]，对250范围内敌军造成150点法术伤害，并使所有受影响的敌方单位减速7.5%，持续2秒。此效果获得30%额外暴击几率加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+7.5 法术伤害

en: Alert
cn: 警戒

en: Nearby towers get alerted of trespassers.
cn: 附近防御塔会进入警戒状态。

en:
Towers in 500 range get alerted whenever a creep of size air, champion or boss enters the sentry's attack range. They have their base damage increased by 7.5% for 5 seconds. Does not stack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% base damage bonus
cn:
当飞行单位、精英或首领进入此防御塔500范围内防御塔的攻击范围时，范围内防御塔基础攻击力提升7.5%，持续5秒。此效果无法叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 基础攻击力加成

en: Trespasser Awareness
cn: 入侵感知

en: This tower strengthens its defenses when uninvited units enter its territory. There is also a chance that the trespassing creep will permanently have its armor reduced.
cn: 当非友方单位进入领地时，该防御塔会强化防御。入侵单位还有几率永久降低护甲。

en:
This tower strengthens its defenses when uninvited units enter its territory. It gains bonus [color=GOLD]5%-40%[/color] base percent damage with each creep entering its attack range, based on the creep's size. Bonus damage lasts 5 seconds and new stacks of damage do not refresh duration of old ones. There is also a 40% chance that the trespassing creep will permanently have its armor reduced by 3, which stacks up to 5 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 armor reduction
+[color=GOLD]0.1%-0.8%[/color] bonus base percent damage
cn:
当非友方单位进入攻击范围时，该防御塔会根据目标体型大小而获得[color=GOLD]5%~40%[/color]基础攻击力加成，持续5秒。新层数不会刷新旧层数持续时间。入侵单位有40%几率永久降低3点护甲值，此效果最多叠加5层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1 护甲降低
+[color=GOLD]0.1%~0.8%[/color] 基础攻击力加成

en: Grapple
cn: 捕获

en: Chance to grab the attacked creep, holding it in place for 2.5 seconds.
cn: 攻击时有几率捕获目标敌方单位，使其定身2.5秒。

en:
8% chance to grab the attacked creep, holding it in place for 2.5 seconds. The duration is reduced to 0.9 seconds for champions and bosses.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.32% chance
cn:
8%几率捕获被攻击的敌方单位，使其定身2.5秒。对精英和首领单位的效果持续时间缩短至0.9秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.32% 触发几率

en: Chaos
cn: 混沌领域

en: All creeps that come in range have a chance to lose their armor.
cn: 进入范围的敌方单位有几率失去全部护甲。

en:
All creeps that come in 750 range around this tower have a 45% chance to lose 100% of their armor for 3 seconds. The armor reduction is halved for Bosses and Challenges.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 seconds
+0.4% chance
cn:
进入该防御塔750范围内的所有敌方单位有45%几率在3秒内失去100%护甲。对首领单位的减少护甲效果减半。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间
+0.4% 触发几率

en: Time Travel
cn: 时间回溯

en: Transports hit creeps back in time after a delay. Has a lower chance for bosses.
cn: 将命中的敌方单位送回过去。对首领单位触发几率较低。

en:
Transports hit creeps 3 seconds back in time after a 3 second delay. Has a 20% chance to transport bosses, other creeps will be always teleported.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% chance for bosses
cn:
攻击命中3秒后将被击中的敌方单位送回3秒前的位置。对首领单位有20%触发几率，其他单位必定触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 首领触发几率

en: Transmute
cn: 点金术

en: Chance to turn hit creeps into gold. Doesn't work on bosses and champions.
cn: 攻击时有几率将敌方单位转化为金币。对首领和精英无效。

en:
3.5% chance to turn hit creeps into 6 additional gold immediately. Doesn't work on bosses and champions.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.04% chance
cn:
3.5%几率立即将被击中的敌方单位转化为6点额外金币。对首领和精英单位无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.04% 触发几率

en: Gold Gree
cn: 贪婪

en: Deals additional spell damage to hit creeps. Damage scales with current player gold.
cn: 基于玩家当前金币数量对命中的敌方单位造成法术伤害。

en: Deals [color=GOLD][16 x squareroot (current gold)][/color] additional spell damage to hit creeps.
cn: 造成[color=GOLD][16 x √(当前金币)][/color]点额外法术伤害。

en: Spacial Rift
cn: 裂隙位移

en: Chance to teleport hit creeps backwards.
cn: 攻击时有几率将命中的敌方单位向后传送。

en:
10% chance to teleport hit creeps backwards by 175 units. Upon triggering there is a further 15% chance that all creeps in 175 AoE of the target will also be moved back 175 units. Costs 30 mana. Chance is halved for bosses. The original target and creeps around it will get startled and become slowed by 30% for 2 seconds in a 250 AoE.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance to move creep
+1 units moved
+1 units moved
+1 slow and unit move AoE
+1% slow
cn:
10%几率将被击中的敌方单位向后传送175距离。触发后还有15%几率使目标175范围内的所有敌方单位同样后移175距离。消耗30点法力值。对首领单位触发几率减半。原目标及其周围250距离内的单位会陷入惊慌，移动速度降低30%，持续2秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 传送几率
+1 传送距离
+1 群体传送距离
+1 减速范围
+1% 减速效果

en: Ground Smash
cn: 裂地重击

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it deals AoE [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage and slows them. This damage is improved by the spell damage dealt stat.
cn: 攻击时对范围内所有敌方单位造成[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]伤害并减速。此伤害受法术伤害属性加成。

Whenever this tower hits a creep, it deals 4300 [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage to all creeps in 750 range and slows them by 60% for 0.5 seconds.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] The damage of this ability is improved by the spell damage dealt stat.

+230 damage
+0.012 seconds slow duration
+50 range at level 25.

[color=GOLD]提示：[/color]此技能的伤害受法术伤害属性加成。

+0.012秒 减速持续时间

en: Magic Split
cn: 魔法分裂

en: Deals additional spell damage to hit creeps, equal to 100% of this tower's attack damage.
cn: 攻击命中敌方单位时附加相当于该防御塔100%攻击力的法术伤害。

en:
Deals additional spell damage to hit creeps, equal to 100% of this tower's attack damage. If the creep is immune the damage is dealt as [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage equal to 80% of tower's attack damage, not affected by level bonus.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage
cn:
攻击命中敌方单位时附加相当于该防御塔100%攻击力的法术伤害。若敌方单位具有魔免，则改为造成相当于防御塔80%攻击力的[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]类型伤害，该伤害不受等级加成影响。

en: Electric Field
cn: 电能力场

en: On attack, this tower shocks a random creep in range. This shock deals spell damage and stuns the creep.
cn: 攻击时有几率电击范围内的随机敌方单位，造成法术伤害并使其眩晕。

en:
On attack, this tower shocks a random creep in 1000 range. This shock deals 1000 spell damage and stuns for 0.2 seconds, the spell damage has 20% bonus chance to crit. The stun does not work on bosses!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+40 spell damage
+0.4% bonus crit chance
cn:
攻击时，此防御塔会电击1000范围内的随机敌方单位。电击造成1000点法术伤害并眩晕0.2秒，该法术伤害有20%额外暴击几率。眩晕效果对首领无效！

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+40 法术伤害
+0.4% 额外暴击几率

[color=ORANGE]霜冻新星：[/color] 33%几率，250范围，125点法术伤害，10%减速持续3秒

10% chance to turn the flesh of the hit creep into bronze for 5 seconds. The creep is slowed by 50%, loses 50% of its health regeneration, has a 25% higher item quality and has 50% more armor.

-1% hp regen
-0.8% armor
+1% item quality
+0.4% chance

cn: 萨满图腾

+0.2% crit chance
+2% crit damage

Each time [color=GOLD]Ice Claw[/color] is cast, attack speed is increased by 0.5% permanently. This has a maximum of 100% attack speed increase.
 
The stacks are lost if this tower is transformed into a tower of another family.

每次施放[color=GOLD]冰霜之爪[/color]时，攻击速度永久提升0.5%，最多提升100%。

叠加的层数会在该防御塔转换为其它种类的防御塔时消失。

en: Glaives of Wisdom
cn: 智慧之刃

en: Every attack an extra glaive is shot out at the cost of mana. The glaive deals [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage.
cn: 每次攻击消耗法力值发射额外飞刃，造成[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]类型伤害。

en: Every attack an extra glaive is shot out at the cost of 40 mana. This glaive deals [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage equal to Nortrom's attack damage and targets the creep with the least health in Nortrom's attack range.
cn: 每次攻击消耗40法力值发射额外飞刃，该飞刃造成与本防御塔攻击力相等的[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]类型伤害。优先攻击射程内生命值最低的敌方单位。

Whenever Nortrom hits a creep, he deals 20% more damage if the creep is silenced. This affects [color=GOLD]Glaives of Wisdom[/color] as well.

+3.2% damage

cn: 周期性沉默范围内的敌方单位。

Every 7 seconds creeps within 800 range of Nortrom are silenced for 2 seconds.

en: Poisonous Spittle
cn: 剧毒喷吐

en: Infects hit creeps, dealing spell damage over time.
cn: 感染被击中的敌方单位，对其持续造成法术伤害。

en:
Infects hit creeps, dealing 30 spell damage per second for 5 seconds. Further attacks on the same creep will increase the potency of the infection, stacking the damage and refreshing duration. Limit of 5 stacks.
 
If there are multiple towers of this family, then [color=GOLD]Poisonous Spittle[/color] damage at 5 stacks will be equal to damage of the most powerful tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.5 damage per second
+0.05 second duration
+1 stack every 5 levels
cn:
感染被击中的敌方单位，每秒造成30点法术伤害，持续5秒。后续攻击同一单位会强化感染效果，叠加伤害并刷新持续时间，最多5层。

若存在多座同种类防御塔，则5层[color=GOLD]剧毒喷吐[/color]的伤害以最高伤害的防御塔为准。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.5 每秒伤害
+0.05秒 持续时间
每5级+1层 叠加上限

en:
Infects hit creeps, dealing 750 spell damage per second for 5 seconds. Further attacks on the same creep will increase the potency of the infection, stacking the damage and refreshing duration. Limit of 5 stacks.
 
If there are multiple towers of this family, then [color=GOLD]Poisonous Spittle[/color] damage at 5 stacks will be equal to damage of the most powerful tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+37.5 damage per second
+0.05 second duration
+1 stack every 5 levels
cn:
感染被击中的敌方单位，每秒造成750点法术伤害，持续5秒。后续攻击同一单位会强化感染效果，叠加伤害并刷新持续时间，最多5层。

若存在多座同种类防御塔，则5层[color=GOLD]剧毒喷吐[/color]的伤害以最高伤害的防御塔为准。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+37.5 每秒伤害
+0.05秒 持续时间
每5级+1层 叠加上限

en: Steal
cn: 窃取

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to steal gold.
cn: 每当该防御塔击中敌方单位时，有几率窃取金币。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 10% chance to steal 0.3 gold.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.012 gold
+0.4% chance
cn:
每当该防御塔击中敌方单位时，有10%几率窃取0.3金币。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.012 金币
+0.4% 触发几率

en: Spring Tide
cn: 浪潮

en: Whenever this tower attacks it has chance to launch a wave which deals spell damage to each creep it hits.
cn: 攻击时有几率释放浪潮，对命中的每个敌方单位造成法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks it has a 15% chance to launch a wave. The wave travels 1200 units and has a 200 AoE. It deals 2200 spell damage to each creep it hits. Every 0.4 seconds the wave has a 35% chance to drag a stone with it. The stone travels 500 units, deals 2200 spell damage on collision and stuns for 0.65 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+88 spell damage
+0.6% chance to launch a wave
cn:
攻击时有15%几率释放浪潮。浪潮行进1200距离并对200范围区域内每个命中的敌方单位造成2200点法术伤害。每0.4秒浪潮有35%几率牵引巨石，巨石行进500距离，碰撞时造成2200点法术伤害并眩晕0.65秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+88 法术伤害
+0.6% 浪潮触发几率

en: Splash
cn: 溅射

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to deal spell damage in AoE around the creep and increase spell damage taken of all affected creeps.
cn: 击中敌方单位时有几率对周围造成范围法术伤害，并提高受影响单位受到的法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 20% chance to deal 4000 spell damage in 175 AoE around the creep. Also increases spell damage taken by all affected creeps by 12.5% for 6 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+160 spell damage
+0.5% more spell damage taken
cn:
攻击命中时有20%几率对175范围内敌方单位造成4000点法术伤害，并使所有受影响敌方单位在6秒内多承受12.5%法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+160 法术伤害
+0.5% 额外法术易伤

en: Serpent Ward
cn: 毒蛇守卫

en: Whenever Witch Doctor attacks, he has a chance to summon 1 of 2 [color=GOLD]Serpent Wards[/color] to assist him. Each [color=GOLD]Serpent Ward[/color] attacks a random target in range, dealing attack damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率召唤[color=GOLD]毒蛇守卫[/color]助战。每个毒蛇守卫会攻击范围内随机目标，造成攻击伤害。

en:
Whenever Witch Doctor attacks, he has a 18% chance to summon 1 of 2 [color=GOLD]Serpent Wards[/color] to assist him. Each [color=GOLD]Serpent Ward[/color] lasts 6 seconds modified by this tower's buff duration stat, deals 20% of Witch Doctor's attack damage and has Witch Doctor's current attack speed at cast. Each [color=GOLD]Serpent Ward[/color] attacks a random target in 800 range and has a 35% chance to stack [color=GOLD]Maledict[/color] on attack targets. Wards can not be resummoned and their duration cannot be refreshed.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% attack damage
+0.1 seconds duration
+0.28% chance to summon a ward
+1 maximum ward at level 15 and 25
cn:
攻击时有18%几率召唤两种[color=GOLD]毒蛇守卫[/color]中的一种。每个毒蛇守卫持续6秒（受增益状态持续时间影响），造成本防御塔20%攻击力的攻击伤害并继承当前攻速，攻击800范围内随机目标并有35%几率对攻击目标叠加[color=GOLD]巫毒诅咒[/color]。毒蛇守卫不可重复召唤且持续时间不可刷新。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 攻击伤害
+0.1秒 持续时间
+0.28% 召唤几率
15级和25级时+1最大守卫数量

en: Purify
cn: 净化

en: Whenever Witch Doctor hits a creep, it purges all buffs and debuffs and deals bonus attack damage based on the purge count. This ability has a 4 second cooldown
cn: 攻击敌方单位时，会净化目标所有增益和减益状态，并根据被净化状态的数量造成额外攻击伤害。该技能有4秒冷却。

en:
Whenever Witch Doctor hits a creep, it purges all buffs and debuffs and deals bonus 12% attack damage for each purged effect. This ability has a 4 second cooldown.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-0.04 seconds cooldown
+0.16% damage per purged effect
cn:
巫医攻击敌方单位时，会净化目标所有增益和减益状态，每净化一个状态将额外造成12%攻击伤害。该技能有4秒冷却。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.04秒 冷却时间
+0.16% 每个净化数量的伤害加成

en: Magical Barrage
cn: 魔法弹幕

en: Attacks have a chance to launch magical missiles at the main target, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向主目标发射魔法飞弹，造成法术伤害。

en:
Attacks have a 20% chance to launch magical missiles at the main target. The Spell Collector can shoot up to 10 missiles per attack. Each missile deals 2000 spell damage. Each additional missile has 5% higher crit chance and 10% higher crit damage than the previous one.
 
The amount of magical missiles is affected by [color=GOLD]Spell Absorb[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% chance
+80 spell damage
+0.2% spell crit chance
+0.4% spell crit damage
+1 max missiles every 5 levels
cn:
攻击有20%几率向主目标发射魔法飞弹。每次攻击最多可发射10枚飞弹，每枚飞弹造成2000点法术伤害。每枚后续飞弹的暴击几率比前一枚高5%，暴击伤害比前一枚高10%。

魔法飞弹数量受[color=GOLD]法术汲取[/color]效果影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.8% 触发几率
+80 法术伤害
+0.2% 法术暴击几率
+0.4% 法术暴击伤害
每5级 +1 最大飞弹数量

+160 spell damage

+2 max missiles every 5 levels

魔法飞弹数量受[color=GOLD]法术汲取[/color]效果影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+160 法术伤害
+0.3% 法术暴击几率
+0.6% 法术暴击伤害
每5级 +2 最大飞弹数量

en: Slumbering Parasite
cn: 蛰伏寄生虫

en: Injects a parasite into hit creeps. The parasite increases creep's vulnerability to [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] towers and causes [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage after a delay.
cn: 向命中的敌方单位注入寄生虫，提高其受[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔的伤害，并造成[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]类型伤害。

en:
Injects a parasite into hit creeps. The parasite increases creep's vulnerability to [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] towers by 2.5% and deals this tower's attack damage as [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage after a delay of 3 seconds. Vulnerability stacks with multiple Parasites.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.05% [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] vulnerability
cn:
向命中的敌方单位注入寄生虫，使其受到[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔的伤害提高2.5%，并在3秒延迟后造成等同于该防御塔攻击力的[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]类型伤害。易伤效果可叠加多层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.05% [color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]易伤

en: Energetic Weapon
cn: 能量武器

en: The Accelerator attacks with energetic missiles, which deal AoE spell damage scaled with tower's current mana. Additionally, the missile slows hit creeps.
cn: 发射充能飞弹，造成基于当前法力值的范围法术伤害，并附带减速效果。

en:
The Accelerator attacks with energetic missiles, which deal 500 plus 3 times the current mana as spell damage to all units in 250 range of the missile. Additionally, the missile slows all units by 1% for each 4000 damage it deals to a creep for 1.5 seconds. Cannot slow by more than 20%. Each attack consumes 20% of this tower's current mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+25 spell damage
+5% mana converted to damage
+0.04 seconds slow duration
cn:
发射充能飞弹，对250范围内所有单位造成500+3倍当前法力值的法术伤害。每对敌方单位造成4000点伤害施加1%减速（最高20%），持续1.5秒。每次攻击消耗当前20%法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+25 法术伤害
+5% 法力转化伤害比例
+0.04秒 减速持续时间

en: Speed Cast
cn: 速射

en: Whenever Genis uses one of his abilities, he has a chance to increase trigger chances and attack speed.
cn: 施放技能时有几率提升自身触发几率和攻击速度。

en:
Whenever Genis uses one of his abilities, he has a 15% chance to increase his trigger chances and his attack speed by 25% for 3.5 seconds. This ability does not stack, but can be retriggered.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% trigger chance
+1% attack speed
+0.1 seconds
cn:
施放技能时有15%几率使自身的触发几率和攻击速度提升25%，持续3.5秒。效果不可叠加但可刷新持续时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 触发几率
+1% 攻击速度
+0.1秒 持续时间

en: Aqua Edge
cn: 水刃

en: Each attack has a chance to launch 3 blades of water at target, which deal spell damage.
cn: 每次攻击有几率发射3道水刃，造成法术伤害。

en:
Each attack Genis has a 20% chance to launch 3 blades of water in front of him at different angles. Each blade deals 1500 spell damage to each creep it passes through. Costs 15 mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+150 spell damage
cn:
攻击时有20%几率向前方不同角度发射3道水刃，每道水刃对穿透的敌方单位造成1500点法术伤害。消耗15法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+150 法术伤害

en: Spread
cn: 扩散

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to lift up creeps near the main target and deal spell damage to affected creeps.
cn: 击中敌方单位时有几率抬升目标周围单位并造成法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 10% chance to lift up creeps in 250 AoE around the main target for 0.8 seconds. Each creep is also dealt 3000 spell damage. Costs 40 mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% chance
+200 spell damage
cn:
击中敌方单位时有10%几率抬升主目标250范围内的敌方单位0.8秒，并造成3000点法术伤害。消耗40法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 触发几率
+200 法术伤害

en: Magic Boost
cn: 魔能增幅

en: Chance to increase spell damage of nearby towers.
cn: 有几率提升附近防御塔的法术伤害。

en:
Every 7 seconds Genis has a 30% chance to increase the spell damage of all towers within 350 range of him by 20% for 3 seconds. Costs 10 mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% spell damage
cn:
每7秒有30%几率使350范围内所有防御塔法术伤害提升20%，持续3秒。消耗10法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 法术伤害

en: Shadowbolt Wave
cn: 暗影箭雨

en: Every autocast has a chance to release a wave of shadowbolts. Shadowbolts deal spell damage.
cn: 自动施法时有几率释放暗影箭雨，造成法术伤害。

en:
Every autocast of this tower has a 20% chance to release 10 shadowbolts. Every shadowbolt flies towards a random target in 1000 range and deals 1050 spell damage. This spell has a 40% chance to trigger if the last autocast released a shadowbolt wave.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+21 spell damage
cn:
每次自动施法有20%几率释放10支暗影箭，每支箭飞向1000范围内随机目标并造成1050点法术伤害。有40%几率再次触发(This spell has a 40% chance to trigger if the last autocast released a shadowbolt wave)。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+21 法术伤害

en: Shadowbolt Wave
cn: 暗影箭雨

en: Every autocast has a chance to release a wave of shadowbolts. Shadowbolts deal spell damage.
cn: 自动施法时有几率释放暗影箭雨，造成法术伤害。

en:
Every autocast of this tower has a 20% chance to release 12 shadowbolts. Every shadowbolt flies towards a random target in 1000 range and deals 1700 spell damage. This spell has a 40% chance to trigger if the last autocast released a shadowbolt wave.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+34 spell damage
cn:
每次自动施法有20%几率释放12支暗影箭，每支箭飞向1000范围内随机目标并造成1700点法术伤害。有40%几率再次触发(This spell has a 40% chance to trigger if the last autocast released a shadowbolt wave)。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+34 法术伤害

en: Elemental Wrath
cn: 元素之怒

en: The Ghost has a chance on attack to increase its trigger chance temporarily.
cn: 攻击时有几率暂时提升触发几率。

en:
The Elemental Ghost has a 15% chance to unleash it's wrath on attack, increasing its trigger chance by 15% for 5 seconds. Cannot retrigger during Elemental Wrath.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 seconds duration
+0.5% trigger chance increase
cn:
元素幽魂攻击时有15%几率使触发几率提升15%，持续5秒。效果持续期间不可重复触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间
+0.5% 触发几率提升

en: Mimic
cn: 元素拟态

en: The Ghost is able to deal different damage types.
cn: 能按敌方护甲类型造成不同攻击类型的伤害。

en: The Ghost's attacks are varied, and its damage type will either be good or bad against its target. Trigger chance adjusts the good/bad attacks to be better.
cn: 元素幽魂的攻击属性多变，其伤害类型会根据目标护甲不同而改变。根据触发几率改变优势/劣势攻击类型的触发比例

en: Elemental Wrath
cn: 元素之怒

en: The Ghost has a chance on attack to increase its trigger chance temporarily.
cn: 攻击时有几率暂时提升触发几率。

en:
The Elemental Ghost has a 17.5% chance to unleash it's wrath on attack, increasing its trigger chance by 15% for 5 seconds. Cannot retrigger during Elemental Wrath.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 seconds duration
+0.6% trigger chance increase
cn:
元素幽魂攻击时有17.5%几率使触发几率提升15%，持续5秒。效果持续期间不可重复触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间
+0.6% 触发几率提升

en: Flaming Inferno
cn: 烈焰炼狱

en: This tower occasionally releases 3 fireballs at random creeps in range. Fireballs deal AoE spell damage.
cn: 该防御塔周期性向范围内随机敌方单位发射3枚火球，造成范围法术伤害。

en:
Every [color=GOLD]7th-11th[/color] attack, this tower releases 3 fireballs that fly towards random creeps in 950 range, dealing 3750 spell damage in 250 AoE around the target on impact.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+150 spell damage
-1 minimum and maximum attack needed at levels 15 and 25
+1 fireball at level 10
+5% bonus crit chance at levels 5 and 20
cn:
每进行[color=GOLD]第7至11次[/color]攻击后，向950范围内随机敌方单位发射3枚火球，命中时对目标250范围内造成3750点法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+150 法术伤害
15级和25级时减少最低/最高触发次数1次
10级时+1枚火球
5级和20级时+5% 暴击几率加成

en: Dragon's Hoard
cn: 龙族宝库

en: On kill, this tower hoards 75% of the bounty.
cn: 击杀敌方单位时囤积赏金以提升伤害。

en:
On kill, this tower hoards 75% of the bounty. The hoard has a maximum capacity of 90000 gold and grants [color=GOLD][gold hoarded / 50]%[/color] spell damage and base attack damage.
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] [color=GOLD]Dragon's Hoard[/color] is modified by both the creep's and this tower's bounty ratios.
cn:
击杀敌方单位时囤积75%赏金至宝库内。宝库最大容量为90000金币，并根据[color=GOLD][囤积金币/50]%[/color]比例提升法术伤害和基础攻击力。
[color=GOLD]提示：[/color][color=GOLD]龙族宝库[/color]效果受敌方单位和该防御塔的赏金获取率共同影响。

en: Ultimate Fighter
cn: 终极战将

en: Vulshok uses his great power to specialize his attacks. Attacks will sometimes deal bonus attack damage, AoE attack damage or empower Vulshok.
cn: 瓦许克运用神力以强化攻击效果，部分攻击会附加额外攻击伤害、范围伤害或对自身进行永久强化。

en:
Vulshok uses his great power to specialize his attacks:
- Every 3rd attack adds a critical hit
- Every 7th attack deals 3000 bonus attack damage
- Every 12th attack splashes all damage over 200 AoE
- Every 15th attack adds 0.5% attack damage permanently
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+200 attack damage on 7th attack
cn:
瓦许克运用神力以强化攻击效果：

- 每第3次攻击必定暴击
- 每第7次攻击附加3000点额外攻击伤害
- 每第12次攻击对200范围内所有单位造成溅射伤害
- 每第15次攻击永久提升0.5%攻击力

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每第7次攻击+200 攻击伤害

en: Maim
cn: 致残打击

en: Slows hit creeps.
cn: 降低被击中敌方单位的移动速度。

en:
Slows hit creeps for 5 seconds. The slow amount starts at 10% and increases by 5% every second. Lasts for 5 seconds and cannot be refreshed.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% slow 
+0.1% extra slow per second
cn:
降低被击中敌方单位移动速度，初始减速10%并每秒递增5%，持续5秒且不可刷新。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 基础减速
+0.1% 每秒额外减速

en: Rapid Gun Fire
cn: 速射连发

en: Has a chance on attack to shoot an extra projectile which deals attack damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率发射额外弹幕造成攻击伤害。

en:
Has a 65% chance on attack to shoot an extra projectile at the main target. Every extra projectile can be followed up by another projectile, but the chance is reduced by 6% each time. Every extra projectile deals the same amount of damage as a normal attack and has a 10% chance to explode, dealing that damage in 200 AoE around the target. Maximum of 10 extra projectiles per attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+0.3% chance to explode
cn:
攻击时有65%几率向主目标发射额外弹幕，额外的弹幕也可以触发此效果。后续弹幕触发几率每次递减6%，每枚弹幕造成等同于普通攻击的伤害并有10%几率爆炸，对目标200范围内造成等量伤害。每次攻击最多触发10枚弹幕。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+0.3% 爆炸几率

en: Sentry
cn: 警戒哨卫

en: This tower gains attack damage whenever a creep comes within range.
cn: 当敌方单位进入范围时提升攻击力。

en:
This tower gains 15% attack damage whenever a creep comes within 800 range of it. Lasts 3 seconds and stacks up to 20 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% damage
+0.05 seconds duration
cn:
当敌方单位进入800范围时，攻击力提升15%持续3秒，最多叠加20层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 攻击力加成
+0.05秒 持续时间

en: Vicious Snow Ball
cn: 恶毒雪球

en: Hurls a snowball at the attacked creep if it's not facing the tower. Snowball deals spell damage.
cn: 当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球造成法术伤害。

en:
Hurls a snowball at the attacked creep if it's not facing the tower. But the snowball only has a 20% chance to hit, where it hits is decided by the angle of attack.
 
[color=GOLD]Temple Crusher:[/color] If it hits side-on, does 120% of its attack damage as spell damage and a 0.6 second stun.
 
[color=GOLD]Knockdown:[/color] If it hits the back of the head, does 40% of its attack damage as spell damage and a 0.4 second stun.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% chance to hit
cn:
当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球，有20%命中几率，命中部位由攻击角度决定：

[color=GOLD]破颅重击：[/color]侧面命中造成120%攻击力的法术伤害并眩晕0.6秒

[color=GOLD]倒地击：[/color]后脑命中造成40%攻击力的法术伤害并眩晕0.4秒

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 命中几率

en: Vicious Snow Ball
cn: 恶毒雪球

en: Hurls a snowball at the attacked creep if it's not facing the tower. Snowball deals spell damage.
cn: 当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球造成法术伤害。

en:
Hurls a snowball at the attacked creep if it's not facing the tower. But the snowball only has a 20% chance to hit, where it hits is decided by the angle of attack.

[color=GOLD]Knockdown:[/color] If it hits the back of the head, does 40% of its attack damage as spell damage and a 0.6 second stun.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.25% chance to hit
cn:
当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球，有20%命中几率，命中部位由攻击角度决定：

[color=GOLD]倒地击：[/color]后脑命中造成40%攻击力的法术伤害并眩晕0.6秒

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.25% 命中几率

cn: 恶毒雪球

cn: 当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球造成法术伤害。

en:
Hurls a snowball at the attacked creep if it's not facing the tower. But the snowball only has a 20% chance to hit, where it hits is decided by the angle of attack.
 
[color=GOLD]Temple Crusher:[/color] If it hits side-on, does 120% of its attack damage as spell damage and a 1 second stun.
 
[color=GOLD]Knockdown:[/color] If it hits the back of the head, does 40% of its attack damage as spell damage and a 0.8 second stun.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.4% chance to hit
cn:
当敌方单位背对防御塔时投掷雪球，有20%命中几率，命中部位由攻击角度决定：
