[color=GOLD]倒地击：[/color]后脑命中造成40%攻击力的法术伤害并眩晕0.8秒

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.4% 命中几率

en: Twister
cn: 龙卷风暴

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to summon tornadoes towards two random creeps. Tornadoes deal attack damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机目标召唤龙卷风造成攻击伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 8% chance to summon 2 tornadoes towards two random creeps in attack range of the harpy. Upon hit each tornado deals this tower's attack damage to the target and makes it suffer 10% additional damage from [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color] towers for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% chance
+0.4% additional damage taken
cn:
攻击时有8%几率向攻击范围内两个随机目标召唤龙卷风，命中时造成该防御塔攻击力的伤害，并使目标5秒内额外承受10%来自[color=ffffe0ff]风暴系[/color]防御塔的伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 触发几率
+0.4% 额外易伤

en: Twister
cn: 龙卷风暴

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to summon tornadoes towards two random creeps. Tornadoes deal attack damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机目标召唤龙卷风造成攻击伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 12% chance to summon 3 tornadoes towards two random creeps in attack range of the harpy. Upon hit each tornado deals this tower's attack damage to the target and makes it suffer 18% additional damage from [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color] towers for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% chance
+0.7% additional damage taken
cn:
攻击时有12%几率向攻击范围内两个随机目标召唤龙卷风，命中时造成该防御塔攻击力的伤害，并使目标5秒内额外承受18%来自[color=ffffe0ff]风暴系[/color]防御塔的伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 触发几率
+0.7% 额外易伤

en: Twin Attack
cn: 多重打击

en: The Phoenix attacks multiple targets at once.
cn: 可同时攻击多个目标。

en:
The Phoenix attacks up to 2 targets at once. If there are less creeps than attacks, the remaining attacks will hit the main target. Each attack applies [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] these extra attacks are not considered as a 'true multishot' and do not trigger any 'on hit' abilities, other than [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 target at level 15
cn:
可同时攻击最多2个目标，若目标数量不足则剩余攻击均命中主目标。每次攻击对目标施加[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]。

[color=GOLD]注：[/color]额外攻击不视为真实多重射击，除[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]外不触发任何命中效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
15级时+1 攻击目标

en: Phoenixfire
cn: 凤凰之火

en: Reduces armor of hit creeps.
cn: 降低被击中单位的护甲。

en:
Reduces armor of hit creeps by 0.5 for 5 seconds. This effect is stackable.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01 armor reduction
cn:
使被击中单位的护甲降低0.5点，持续5秒，效果可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.01 护甲降低

en: Phoenix Explosion
cn: 凤凰爆燃

en: When [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] expires, it erupts and deals AoE attack damage.
cn: [color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时引发爆炸造成范围攻击伤害。

en:
When [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] expires, it erupts and deals 100 [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage per armor point the creep is missing in 200 range around its target. Additionally the target regains only 70% of its armor. Creeps further away receive less damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1% armor regain
cn:
[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时，根据目标已降低的每点护甲值对200范围内目标造成100点[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害，且目标仅能恢复70%护甲。距离越远伤害越低。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1% 护甲恢复比率

en: Twin Attack
cn: 多重打击

en: The Phoenix attacks multiple targets at once.
cn: 可同时攻击多个目标。

en:
The Phoenix attacks up to 3 targets at once. If there are less creeps than attacks, the remaining attacks will hit the main target. Each attack applies [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] these extra attacks are not considered as a 'true multishot' and do not trigger any 'on hit' abilities, other than [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 target at level 15
cn:
可同时攻击最多3个目标，若目标数量不足则剩余攻击均命中主目标。每次攻击对目标施加[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]。

[color=GOLD]注：[/color]额外攻击不视为真实多重射击，除[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]外不触发任何命中效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
15级时+1 攻击目标

en: Phoenixfire
cn: 凤凰之火

en: Reduces armor of hit creeps.
cn: 降低被击中单位的护甲。

en:
Reduces armor of hit creeps by 0.6 for 5 seconds. This effect is stackable.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.015 armor reduction
cn:
使被击中单位的护甲降低0.6点，持续5秒，效果可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.015 护甲降低

en: Phoenix Explosion
cn: 凤凰爆燃

en: When [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] expires, it erupts and deals AoE attack damage.
cn: [color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时引发爆炸造成范围攻击伤害。

en:
When [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] expires, it erupts and deals 260 [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage per armor point the creep is missing in 200 range around its target. Additionally the target regains only 60% of its armor. Creeps further away receive less damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1.5% armor regain
cn:
[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时，根据目标已降低的每点护甲值对200范围内目标造成260点[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害，且目标仅能恢复60%护甲。距离越远伤害越低。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1.5% 护甲恢复比率

en: Twin Attack
cn: 多重打击

en: The Phoenix attacks multiple targets at once.
cn: 可同时攻击多个目标。

en:
The Phoenix attacks up to 4 targets at once. If there are less creeps than attacks, the remaining attacks will hit the main target. Each attack applies [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] these extra attacks are not considered as a 'true multishot' and do not trigger any 'on hit' abilities, other than [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 target at level 15
cn:
可同时攻击最多4个目标，若目标数量不足则剩余攻击均命中主目标。每次攻击对目标施加[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]。

[color=GOLD]注：[/color]额外攻击不视为真实多重射击，除[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]外不触发任何命中效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
15级时+1 攻击目标

en: Phoenixfire
cn: 凤凰之火

en: Reduces armor of hit creeps.
cn: 降低被击中单位的护甲。

en:
Reduces armor of hit creeps by 0.7 for 5 seconds. This effect is stackable.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02 armor reduction
cn:
使被击中单位的护甲降低0.7点，持续5秒，效果可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02 护甲降低

cn: [color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时引发爆炸造成范围攻击伤害。

en:
When [color=GOLD]Phoenixfire[/color] expires, it erupts and deals 440 [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage per armor point the creep is missing in 200 range around its target. Additionally the target regains only 50% of its armor. Creeps further away receive less damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-2% armor regain
cn:
[color=GOLD]凤凰之火[/color]效果结束时，根据目标已降低的每点护甲值对200范围内目标造成440点[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害，且目标仅能恢复50%护甲。距离越远伤害越低。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-2% 护甲恢复比率

cn: 该防御塔攻击时会丢弃所有非[color=00ff00ff]普通[/color]品质物品。

cn: 该防御塔攻击时会丢弃所有非[color=00ff00ff]传奇[/color]品质物品。

en: Mystical Storm Hammer
cn: 风暴魔锤

en: This tower attacks with a hammer, which deals part of the damage as spell damage and the rest as attack damage.
cn: 该防御塔挥舞战锤发动攻击，将部分伤害转化为法术伤害。

en:
This tower attacks with a hammer, which deals part of the damage as spell damage and the rest as attack damage. The amount of spell damage depends on the spell damage resistance of the target. The higher the resistance, the smaller ratio of spell damage dealt. Deals no spell damage against immune creeps and deals no [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage against ethereal creeps. If this [color=GOLD]Storm Hammer[/color] deals all the damage in one type, it will have 5% increased critchance.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.8% crit chance
cn:
该防御塔挥舞战锤发动攻击，将部分伤害转化为法术伤害。转化比例取决于目标的法术抗性——抗性越高转化法术伤害的比例越低。对法术免疫单位无法造成法术伤害，对虚无单位无法造成[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]类型的伤害。若本次[color=GOLD]风暴魔锤[/color]仅造成单一类型伤害，则暴击几率提高5%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.8% 暴击几率

en: Storm Bolt
cn: 风暴之锤

en: When this tower attacks, it launches a [color=GOLD]Storm Bolt[/color] towards the main target. [color=GOLD]Storm Bolt[/color] deals AoE attack damage.
cn: 攻击时向主目标发射[color=GOLD]风暴之锤[/color]，造成范围攻击伤害。

en:
When this tower attacks, it launches a [color=GOLD]Storm Bolt[/color] towards the main target. Upon collision, [color=GOLD]Storm Bolt[/color] deals the tower's attack damage to the target and creates a trail of 5 storm explosions. The explosions deal the tower's attack damage to every unit in 85 AoE. Each explosion deals 40% less damage than the previous one.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1.2% damage reduction
cn:
攻击时向主目标发射[color=GOLD]风暴之锤[/color]，命中时对目标造成该防御塔攻击力的伤害，并产生5次风暴爆炸。风暴爆炸对85范围内所有单位造成该防御塔攻击力的伤害，每次爆炸伤害递减40%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1.2% 伤害递减率

en: Sample Collection
cn: 样本采集

en: Has a chance to collect a tissue sample from attacked creeps. Once researched, it will provide a bonus vs the race of that creep to nearby towers.
cn: 攻击时有几率从被攻击的敌方单位身上采集组织样本。研究完成后，将为附近防御塔提供针对该单位种族的伤害加成。

en:
Has a 25% chance to collect a tissue sample from attacked creeps. Once researched, it will provide a 5% bonus vs the race of that creep, through the [color=GOLD]Xeno Vulnerability Research Aura[/color]. Maximum bonus per race is 25%. Whenever a different race is attacked, half of the research bonuses against all other races are lost.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% chance to collect sample
+1% maximum bonus per race
cn:
攻击时有25%几率从被攻击的敌方单位身上采集组织样本。研究完成后，通过[color=GOLD]异类弱点研究光环[/color]提供5%针对该单位种族的伤害加成。每个种族的最高加成为25%。当攻击新的种族时，针对所有其他种族的研究加成将立即扣减一半。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 样本采集几率
每个种族 +1% 最大加成

en: Omnislash
cn: 无双剑舞

en: On each attack the Omnislasher moves with insane speed towards the battlefield.
cn: 每次攻击时以极速冲向战场发动多段斩击。

en:
On each attack the Omnislasher moves with insane speed towards the battlefield. There, he deals attack damage up to 10 times before returning to his triumphant pedestal. Each such damage instance deals 10% of this tower's normal attack damage and permanently increases the damage its target takes from [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] type attacks by 4%.
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] Omnislasher won't trigger any 'on hit' abilities from items or other towers.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 slashes every 5 levels
cn:
每次攻击时以极速冲向战场，在返回防御塔基座前最多发动10次斩击。每次斩击造成10%普通攻击伤害，并永久提升目标4%承受[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]类型的伤害。

[color=GOLD]注：[/color]无双剑舞攻击不会触发任何来自物品或技能的命中效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每5级+2次斩击

en: Magic Missile
cn: 魔法飞弹

en: Whenever this tower attacks it launches a [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] in the main target's direction.
cn: 攻击时向主目标方向发射[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks it launches a [color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] in the main target's direction. The missile hits all units in 150 AoE and deals 100% of the tower's attack damage as spell damage to hit units.
 
[color=GOLD]Magic Missile[/color] can also apply debuffs to hit units. You can customize this effect with the [color=GOLD]Choose Modification[/color], [color=GOLD]Apply Modification[/color] and [color=GOLD]Remove Modification[/color] abilities.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% spell damage
cn:
攻击时向主目标方向发射[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]，对150范围内所有单位造成等同于该防御塔攻击力100%的法术伤害。

[color=GOLD]魔法飞弹[/color]可对命中单位施加减益效果，可通过[color=GOLD]切换法球[/color]、[color=GOLD]选定法球[/color]和[color=GOLD]移除法球[/color]能力自定义攻击附带的效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 法术伤害

en: Corpse Explosion
cn: 尸爆术

en: Occasionally explodes a nearby corpse, making nearby enemies more vulnerable to [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color] and slowing them. Doesn't affect Air.
cn: 周期性引爆附近尸体，使周围敌人更易受[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]防御塔的伤害并减速。对空军无效。

en:
Explodes a corpse within 1000 range of the tower, causing enemies in 500 range of the corpse to take 5% more damage from [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color] towers and move 5% slower for 8 seconds. 5 second cooldown. Doesn't affect Air.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% slow and damage taken
+0.25 seconds duration
cn:
引爆防御塔1000范围内的尸体，使500范围内敌人在8秒内提高5%承受[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]防御塔的伤害，且移动速度降低5%，冷却5秒，对空军无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 减速与易伤
+0.25秒 持续时间

en: Critical Mass
cn: 临界质量

en: Attacks have a chance to shoot multiple projectiles at the main target, dealing attack damage.
cn: 攻击有几率发射多枚弹幕造成攻击伤害。

en:
Attacks have a 30% chance to shoot an extra projectile at the main target. Projectiles deal attack damage equal to tower's normal attack damage. For each projectile after the initial one, there is a 30% chance to shoot an extra projectile. There is a maximum of 14 projectiles fired per attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% initial chance
+0.6% extra chance
cn:
攻击时30%几率向主目标发射额外弹幕，每枚弹幕造成与普通攻击相同的伤害。每发弹幕有30%几率重复触发发射，单次攻击最多发射14枚弹幕。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 初始触发几率
+0.6% 后续触发几率

cn: 尸爆术

en:
Explodes a corpse within 1000 range of the tower, causing enemies in 500 range of the corpse to take 8% more damage from [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color] towers and move 8% slower for 8 seconds. 5 second cooldown. Doesn't affect Air.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% slow and damage taken
+0.25 seconds duration
cn:

+0.3% 减速与易伤
+0.25秒 持续时间

cn:
攻击时30%几率向主目标发射额外弹幕，每枚弹幕造成与普通攻击相同的伤害。每发弹幕有36%几率重复触发发射，单次攻击最多发射14枚弹幕。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 初始触发几率
+0.6% 后续触发几率

en: Corpse Explosion
cn: 尸爆术

en: Occasionally explodes a nearby corpse, making nearby enemies more vulnerable to [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color] and slowing them. Doesn't affect Air.
cn: 周期性引爆附近尸体，使周围敌人更易受[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]防御塔的伤害并减速。对空军无效。

en:
Explodes a corpse within 1000 range of the tower, causing enemies in 500 range of the corpse to take 20% more damage from [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color] towers and move 20% slower for 8 seconds. 5 second cooldown. Doesn't affect Air.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% slow and damage taken
+0.25 seconds duration
cn:
引爆防御塔1000范围内的尸体，使500范围内敌人在8秒内提高20%承受[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]防御塔的伤害，且移动速度降低20%，冷却5秒，对空军无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 减速与易伤
+0.25秒 持续时间

en: Critical Mass
cn: 临界质量

en: Attacks have a chance to shoot multiple projectiles at the main target, dealing attack damage.
cn: 攻击有几率发射多枚弹幕造成攻击伤害。

en:
Attacks have a 30% chance to shoot an extra projectile at the main target. Projectiles deal attack damage equal to tower's normal attack damage. For each projectile after the initial one, there is a 39% chance to shoot an extra projectile. There is a maximum of 14 projectiles fired per attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% initial chance
+0.6% extra chance
cn:
攻击时30%几率向主目标发射额外弹幕，每枚弹幕造成与普通攻击相同的伤害。每发弹幕有39%几率重复触发发射，单次攻击最多发射14枚弹幕。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 初始触发几率
+0.6% 后续触发几率

en: Atrophy
cn: 衰弱

en: Chance to slow the attacked creep.
cn: 有几率使被攻击的敌方单位减速。

en:
10% chance to slow the attacked creep by 15% for 5 seconds. Chance is reduced to 6.6% for bosses.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% (0.07% for bosses) chance
cn:
有10%几率使被攻击敌方单位减速15%持续5秒，对首领单位时触发几率为6.6%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

en: Glare
cn: 强光怒视

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it launches a forked lightning, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击时释放叉状闪电造成法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it launches a forked lightning at the cost of 40 mana. The forked lightning deals 500 plus 1.5% of the original target's current health as spell damage. The forked lightning hits up to 3 creeps.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+120 spell damage
cn:
攻击时消耗40法力值释放叉状闪电，造成500点基础法术伤害外加目标当前生命值1.5%的额外伤害，最多命中3个敌方单位。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+120 法术伤害

en: Rend
cn: 撕裂创伤

en: Chance to rend hit creeps, dealing spell damage over time and increasing vulnerability to spell damage.
cn: 有几率撕裂被击中的敌方单位，造成持续法术伤害并提高其法术易伤。

en:
25% chance to rend hit creeps. [color=GOLD]Rend[/color] makes the creep suffer 3% increased spell damage and deals 20 spell damage per second for 6 seconds. Does not stack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% chance
+0.8 spell damage per second
cn:
25%几率撕裂目标，使其6秒内承受法术伤害提高3%并每秒受到20点法术伤害，效果不可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 触发几率
+0.8 每秒伤害

en: Devour
cn: 吞噬撕咬

en: On attack the Warbeast has a chance to take a bite out of the main target, dealing spell damage and increasing effectiveness of [color=GOLD]Beast Dung[/color].
cn: 攻击时有几率撕咬主目标，提升[color=GOLD]野兽遗秽[/color]效果。

en:
On attack the Warbeast has a 6% chance to take a bite out of the main target, dealing 5000 spell damage and increasing the multiplier for bonuses granted by [color=GOLD]Beast Dung[/color] by 1 for 6 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% chance
+400 spell damage
cn:
攻击时有6%几率撕咬主目标，造成5000点法术伤害并使[color=GOLD]野兽遗秽[/color]增益倍数提升1层持续6秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1% 触发几率
+400 法术伤害

en: Soul Split
cn: 灵魂裂解

en: When the Witch hits a creep, it has a chance to deal additional spell damage and to increase the Witch's attack speed.
cn: 攻击时有几率造成额外法术伤害并提升自身攻击速度。

en:
When the Witch hits a creep, it has a 30% chance to deal 50 spell damage to the creep and to increase the Witch's attack speed by 10%. When this ability triggers, the chance to trigger again is decreased by 10%. These effects last 10 seconds and stack. If the target is under the influence of [color=GOLD]Love Potion[/color], the attack speed bonus, the damage and the duration of this spell are doubled.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 spell damage
cn:
攻击时有30%几率对目标造成50点法术伤害并提升10%攻击速度，持续10秒。在增益生效时间内再次触发的几率减少10%，可重复叠加。若目标已受[color=GOLD]爱情药剂[/color]影响，攻速加成、法术伤害和持续时间翻倍。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 法术伤害

en: Energyball
cn: 能量球

en: The Owl of Wisdom has a chance on attack to cast [color=GOLD]Energyball[/color] on the main target. [color=GOLD]Energyball[/color] deals AoE spell damage scales with tower's experience.
cn: 攻击时有几率对主目标释放[color=GOLD]能量球[/color]。

en:
The Owl of Wisdom has a 25% chance on attack to cast [color=GOLD]Energyball[/color] on the main target. The [color=GOLD]Energyball[/color] deals [color=GOLD][4500 + (2.25 x  tower exp)][/color] spell damage in a 100 AoE around the attacked creep. The experience bonus cannot exceed [color=GOLD][150x current wave][/color] damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 AoE range
+0.4% chance
cn:
攻击时有25%几率释放[color=GOLD]能量球[/color]，对目标100范围内造成[color=GOLD][4500+2.25×经验值][/color]点法术伤害。经验加成上限为[color=GOLD][150×当前波次][/color]。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1 伤害范围
+0.4% 触发几率

en: Weak Spots
cn: 弱点洞悉

en: The Owl of Wisdom is able to find weak spots even on magic immune units.
cn: 可发现魔法免疫单位的弱点。

en:
The Owl of Wisdom is able to find weak spots even on magic immune units. It's [color=GOLD]Energyball[/color] deals 10% of its spell damage as [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage to immune units.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% damage
cn:

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 伤害

en: Zeal
cn: 狂热

en: Each attack works the Zealot into a greater frenzy, increasing his attack speed but slowing nearby towers.
cn: 每次攻击提升自身攻击速度但减缓周围防御塔的攻击速度。

en:
Each attack works the Zealot into a greater frenzy, increasing his attack speed by 1% from each tower in 175 range. These towers have their attack speed slowed by 1%. Both effects stack up to 5 times and last 2.5 seconds. The attack speed amount reduces slightly with more towers.
 
Only towers that cost 200 gold or more are affected by this.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 max stack per 5 levels
cn:
每次攻击时，根据175范围内每座造价≥200的防御塔的数量提升1%攻速，同时降低受影响的防御塔1%攻速。此效果最多叠加5层，持续2.5秒，附近有多个防御塔时，加成效果递减。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

cn: 寂静领域

en: Silences hit creeps.
cn: 使被击中的敌方单位沉默。

en: Void
cn: 虚空侵蚀

en: Every second, this unit loses experience. This tower will not lose levels in this way. Replacing a tower with this tower will reset the experience to 0 unless the replaced tower is of this tower's family.
cn: 该单位每秒流失经验值。将非本系防御塔转换为此防御塔时经验重置为0。

en:
Every second, this unit loses 1% of its experience. This tower will not lose levels in this way. Replacing a tower with this tower will reset the experience to 0 unless the replaced tower is of this tower's family.
 
When this tower is upgraded or replaced to Void Dragon, it will lose 50% experience.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02% periodical experience lost
+1% upgrade experience lost
cn:
每秒流失1%经验值，但不会因此降级。将非本系防御塔转换为此防御塔时经验重置为0。

当升阶或其它防御塔被替换为虚空巨龙时，将损失50%经验值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02% 持续经验流失
+1% 升阶经验损失

cn: 充能打击

en: Each attack costs mana. Without mana the tower can't attack.
cn: 每次攻击消耗法力值。法力值不足时无法攻击。

cn: 每次攻击消耗1点法力值。法力值不足时无法攻击。

en: Electrified Attack
cn: 雷霆轰击

en: Zeus's attacks deal additional AoE spell damage.
cn: 攻击附带范围法术伤害。

en:
Zeus's attacks deal additional 500 spell damage in 175 AoE around the main target.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+20 spell damage
cn:
攻击对主目标175范围内造成500点额外法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+20 法术伤害

en: Divine Hammer
cn: 神圣重锤

en: Whenever Zeus kills a creep he restores mana.
cn: 击杀敌方单位时恢复法力值。

en: Whenever Zeus kills a creep he restores 5% of his maximum mana.
cn: 击杀敌方单位时恢复5%最大法力值。

en: Grow!
cn: 成长之力

en: Bonk will periodically grow, gaining experience and bonus attack damage.
cn: 周期性成长，获得经验与攻击加成。

en:
Every 25 seconds Bonk grows, gaining 4 experience and 3% bonus attack damage. Bonk can grow 160 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% bonus attack damage
cn:
每25秒成长一次，获得4点经验值和3%攻击力加成，最多可成长160次。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1% 攻击力加成

en: Landslide!
cn: 山崩地裂

en: Chance to throw rocks at creeps around the main target. These rocks deal spell damage and stun.
cn: 有几率向周围投掷岩石造成法术伤害和眩晕。

en:
This ability works only after Bonk has grown 20 times.
 
25% chance to throw rocks at all creeps in 300 AoE around the main target. These rocks deal 700 spell damage and stun for 0.5 seconds. [color=GOLD]Landslide[/color] deals 15 bonus spell damage per grow.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+50 spell damage
cn:
成长次数达到20次后激活。

25%几率向主目标300范围内投掷岩石，造成700点法术伤害并眩晕0.5秒。每层成长提供15点额外伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+50 法术伤害

en: Crush!
cn: 粉碎重击

en: When hitting stunned creeps, Bonk deals extra spell damage and gives a morale boost to nearby towers.
cn: 攻击眩晕单位时造成额外伤害并对友军提供增益。

en:
This ability works only after Bonk has grown 10 times.
 
When hitting stunned creeps, Bonk deals 5000 extra spell damage. In addition, towers in 500 range will gain 10% attack speed and damage for 10 seconds. [color=GOLD]Crush[/color] deals 50 bonus spell damage per grow.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+250 spell damage
+0.4% attack speed and damage
cn:
成长次数达到10次后激活。

攻击处于眩晕状态下的单位时造成5000点额外法术伤害，并使500范围内防御塔在10秒内攻击速度和伤害提升10%。每层成长提供50点额外法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+250 法术伤害
+0.4% 攻击速度和伤害

en: Frag Grenade
cn: 破片手雷

en: When this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to fire a frag grenade. Grenades deal spell damage.
cn: 击中单位时有几率投掷破片手雷造成法术伤害。

en:
When this tower hits a creep, it has a 20% chance to fire a frag grenade that will split into 6 smaller grenades after a short delay. When a grenade collides with a creep it deals 1200 spell damage and increases the damage the target takes from attacks by 2%, stacking up to a maximum of 50%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% chance
+100 spell damage
+0.1% damage increase

20%几率投掷破片手雷，短暂延迟后分裂为6枚小型手雷。每枚手雷命中造成1200点法术伤害并使目标承受攻击伤害提高2%（最多叠加至50%）。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 触发几率
+100 法术伤害
+0.1% 易伤加成

cn: 成长蜕变

en: This tower gains spell damage, spell crit damage and spell crit chance for each level the player survives.
cn: 每结束一波次，该防御塔获得法术强化。

en: This tower gains 1.66% spell damage, spell crit damage and 0.125% spell crit chance for each level the player survives.
cn: 每结束一波次，该防御塔获得1.66%法术伤害、1.66%法术暴击伤害和0.125%法术暴击几率

en: Electrify
cn: 电流过载

en: Chance to electrify hit creeps. Creeps in range of the electrified creeps will take spell damage.
cn: 有几率使目标带电，持续造成范围伤害。

en:
20% chance to electrify hit creeps for 5 seconds. Each second, all creeps in 225 range of the electrified creep will take 900 spell damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% chance
+36 spell damage per second
cn:
20%几率使被击中的敌方单位带电5秒，每秒对225范围内所有单位造成900点法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.8% 触发几率
+36 每秒伤害

en: I Overcharge
cn: 超载充能

en: Chance to deal additional spell damage to hit creeps. [color=GOLD]Overcharge[/color] can also be triggered by other innate abilities of this tower.
cn: 有几率对敌方单位造成额外法术伤害。此技能也可由该防御塔的其它技能触发。

en:
25% chance to deal 900 additional spell damage to hit creeps. [color=GOLD]Overcharge[/color] can also be triggered by other innate abilities of this tower. [color=GOLD]Overcharge[/color] can trigger itself, but the chance to do so is decreased by 5% for each time it retriggers.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+36 spell damage
+1% chance
cn:
25%几率造成900点额外法术伤害。可被其它技能触发，由此技能本身触发时每次后续触发几率递减5%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+36 法术伤害
+1% 触发几率

en: Fisherman's Net
cn: 渔网缠绕

en: Catches hit creeps in a net, slowing them.
cn: 用渔网困住被击中的敌方单位并减速。

en:
Catches hit creeps in a net, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds. If a creep's movement speed is below 120 when [color=GOLD]Fisherman's Net[/color] expires, it will have failed to free itself and will have a 3% chance of getting strangled in the net and dying. Bosses and immune units receive 400% attack damage from this tower instead of death. The chance to die is adjusted by how long the creep was ensnared: the longer the [color=GOLD]Fisherman's Net[/color] duration, the greater the chance and vice versa. Stunned creeps will also trigger the instant kill chance.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% slow
+2.4 movement speed required
+0.2% chance
cn:
使被击中敌方单位减速25%，持续3秒。若渔网消失时目标移速低于120，则有3%几率直接被绞杀致死（对首领和魔法免疫单位改为造成400%攻击伤害）。绞杀几率与束缚时间正相关，被眩晕单位直接触发斩杀。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 减速
+2.4 移速判定阈值
+0.2% 斩杀几率

en: Fresh Fish!
cn: 鲜鱼盛宴

en: Each time [color=GOLD]Fisherman's Net[/color] strangles a creep, it increases the DPS of nearby towers.
cn: [color=GOLD]渔网缠绕[/color]触发绞杀单位时提升附近防御塔秒伤。

en:
Each time [color=GOLD]Fisherman's Net[/color] strangles a creep, the DPS of towers in 500 range is increased by 15% of this tower's DPS for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 second duration
+0.004 damage per second multipler
cn:
每次[color=GOLD]渔网缠绕[/color]触发绞杀成功时，500范围内防御塔秒伤提升该防御塔秒伤的15%持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间
+0.004 秒伤加成系数

en: Impatient
cn: 耐心缺失

en: After 4 attacks on the same target the Fisherman will attack a different unit.
cn: 连续攻击同一目标4次后切换攻击对象。

en: After 4 attacks on the same target the Fisherman will attack a different unit. Favoring creeps that are not suffering the effect of [color=GOLD]Fisherman's Net[/color].
cn: 连续攻击同一目标4次后切换攻击对象，优先攻击未受[color=GOLD]渔网缠绕[/color]影响的单位。

en: Twin Flames
cn: 双生烈焰

en: On each attack, this tower has a chance equal to launch a green flame or a red flame. Flames can deal [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage or spell damage
cn: 攻击时根据暴击几率发射不同属性的火焰。

en:
On each attack, this tower has a chance equal to its crit chance to launch a green flame, dealing 65% of tower's attack damage as spell damage, and a chance equal to its spell crit chance to launch a red flame, dealing 65% of tower's attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% damage
cn:
攻击时以暴击几率发射绿色烈焰，造成65%攻击力的法术伤害；以法术暴击几率发射红色烈焰，造成65%攻击力的[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 伤害

en: Twin Pulses
cn: 双生脉冲

en: Every time this tower has launched a lot of flames, it releases a pulse, dealing [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage or spell damage to creeps in range.
cn: 累计发射足量双生烈焰后释放范围脉冲伤害。

en:
Every time this tower has launched 8 red flames, it releases a green pulse, dealing 55% of its attack damage as spell damage in 900 AoE and every time it has launched 8 green flames, it releases a red pulse, dealing 55% of its attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage in 900 AoE.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% damage
-1 flame needed at level 15 and 25
cn:
累计发射8道红色烈焰后释放绿色脉冲，对900范围内敌方单位造成55%攻击力的法术伤害，累计发射8道绿色烈焰后释放红色脉冲，对900范围内敌方单位造成55%攻击力[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]类型的伤害）。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 伤害
15级和25级时-1火焰需求

en: Twin Disciplines
cn: 双生戒律

en: Whenever this tower deals a critical hit to a creep, it gains bonus crit chance or spell crit chance.
cn: 暴击时提升攻击暴击或法术暴击几率。

en: Whenever this tower deals a critical hit to a creep, it gains 1% bonus critical chance or spell critical chance, both stacking up to 10 times, for 7 seconds. The lower chance will always be prioritized.

cn: 触发暴击时获得2%攻击暴击或法术暴击几率，持续7秒，最多叠加10层。优先补足较低几率的属性。

en: Icy Touch
cn: 寒霜之触

en: Slows hit creeps.
cn: 降低被击中敌方单位的移动速度。

en:
Slows hit creeps by 10% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. This tower deals additional 10% attack damage for every stack of [color=GOLD]Icy Touch[/color] the target has.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% damage per stack
cn:
使目标的移动速度减少10%，持续5秒，最多叠加6层，每层使该防御塔对其攻击伤害提高10%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 每层伤害加成

en: Frost Bolt
cn: 寒冰箭

en: Attacks have a chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Frost Bolt[/color] at the main target, dealing AoE attack damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向主目标发射[color=GOLD]寒冰箭[/color]，造成范围攻击伤害。

en:
Attacks have a chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Frost Bolt[/color] at the main target. The chance is equal to the percentage of movement speed the main target is missing. [color=GOLD]Frost Bolt[/color] deals 20% of the tower's attack damage as [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage in 200 AoE around the creep for each stack of [color=GOLD]Icy Touch[/color] the creep has. This spell deals double damage to stunned targets.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% damage per stack
cn:
攻击时有几率向主目标发射[color=GOLD]寒冰箭[/color]。该几率等于目标已损失的移动速度百分比。[color=GOLD]寒冰箭[/color]会根据敌方单位身上的[color=GOLD]寒霜之触[/color]层数，在200范围内造成相当于防御塔20%攻击力的[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害。此法术对被眩晕目标造成双倍伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每层+0.4% 伤害

en: Cold Blood
cn: 冷血

en: Every time this tower kills a creep, it temporarily gains attack speed.
cn: 每次击杀敌方单位后，该防御塔暂时获得攻击速度提升。

en:
Every time this tower kills a creep, it gains 50% attack speed for 3 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% attack speed
cn:
每次击杀敌方单位后，该防御塔获得50%攻击速度，持续3秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 攻击速度

en: Dark Ritual
cn: 黑暗仪式

en: When this tower attacks, it awakens powerful dark magic and transports all creeps from [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] to [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color]. The tower will also deal spell damage to creeps standing in one of the [color=GOLD]Fields[/color].
cn: 攻击时会唤醒强大的黑暗魔法，将[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]内的所有敌方单位传送至[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]，并对区域内单位造成法术伤害。

en:
When this tower attacks, it awakens powerful dark magic and transports all creeps from [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color] to [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color]. This ability works only once per creep and doesn't affect bosses.
 
This tower will also deal 3000 spell damage to all creeps unfortunate enough to be standing in the [color=GOLD]Recreation Field[/color] and [color=GOLD]Corruption Field[/color].
 
1 sec cooldown.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+100 spell damage
cn:
攻击时会唤醒强大的黑暗魔法，将[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]内的所有敌方单位传送至[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]。此效果对每个单位仅生效一次，且无法影响首领。

该防御塔会对身处[color=GOLD]重塑区域[/color]或[color=GOLD]腐化区域[/color]的敌方单位造成3000点法术伤害。

1秒冷却。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+100 法术伤害

en: It Hunger
cn: 噬魂饥渴

en: Every time a creep is transported by [color=GOLD]Dark Ritual[/color] or killed by this tower, It permanently gains spell damage.
cn: 每当敌方单位被[color=GOLD]黑暗仪式[/color]传送或遭该防御塔击杀时，永久提升法术伤害。

en:
Every time a creep is transported by [color=GOLD]Dark Ritual[/color] or killed by this tower, It permanently gains 0.1% spell damage. There is a maximum of 700% bonus spell damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01% spell damage
cn:
每当敌方单位被[color=GOLD]黑暗仪式[/color]传送或遭该防御塔击杀时，永久获得0.1%法术伤害。最多可叠加700%额外法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.01% 法术伤害

cn: 法力燃烧

cn: 暗影威慑

en: Chance to debuff hit creeps, increasing damage received from all sources.
cn: 有几率使被击中的敌方单位进入易伤状态，提升其受到的所有伤害。

+0.12秒 持续时间
+4% 攻击速度
15级和25级时各+1 多重暴击

en: Spellfire
cn: 法术烈焰

en: This tower treats all spell modifiers as attack bonuses.
cn: 该防御塔将所有法术修正视为攻击加成。

en:
This tower treats all spell modifiers as attack bonuses, with 84% bonus gain of stated effect. This is recalculated before every attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+3.36% bonus gain
cn:
该防御塔以84%的增益系数将法术修正转化为攻击加成，每次攻击前重新计算。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+3.36% 增益系数

en: Spellfire Projectiles
cn: 法术飞弹

en: If this tower has enough mana, it will spend all its mana to make the next attack critical.
cn: 当法力值充足时，该防御塔将消耗全部法力使下次攻击必定暴击。

en:
If this tower has at least 20 mana, it will spend all its mana to make the next attack critical. 20 mana is used to grant the critical strike and every further point of mana spent grants 8% more critical damage to that attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-0.2 Mana needed
cn:
若该防御塔拥有至少20点法力值，将消耗所有法力使下次攻击必定暴击。初始消耗20点法力用于触发暴击，每额外消耗1点法力值可使该次暴击伤害提升8%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.2 法力需求

en: Thunderous Roar
cn: 雷霆怒吼

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to release a [color=GOLD]Thunderous Roar[/color], increasing attack speed of nearby towers.
cn: 攻击命中敌方单位时，有几率释放[color=GOLD]雷霆怒吼[/color]，提升附近防御塔攻速。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 30% chance to release a [color=GOLD]Thunderous Roar[/color]. [color=GOLD]Thunderous Roar[/color] increases attack speed of all towers in 420 range by 5% for 5 seconds. If a tower already has [color=GOLD]Thunderous Roar[/color], then attack speed is increased by 0.3% and duration is refreshed. Stacks up to 100 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% attack speed
cn:
攻击命中敌方单位时，有30%几率释放[color=GOLD]雷霆怒吼[/color]，使420范围内所有防御塔攻击速度提升5%，持续5秒。若目标防御塔已受[color=GOLD]雷霆怒吼[/color]影响，则攻速额外提升0.3%并刷新持续时间。最多叠加100层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 攻击速度

en: Ice Smashing Axe
cn: 碎冰战斧

en: Whenever the Troll attacks, he has a chance to throw [color=GOLD]Ice Smashing Axe[/color] at the main target. [color=GOLD]Ice Smashing Axe[/color] shatters all the buffs and debuffs from the creep and deals [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向目标投掷[color=GOLD]碎冰战斧[/color]，粉碎其增益与减益并造成[color=6495edff]元素[/color]伤害。

en:
Whenever the Troll attacks, he has a 15% chance to throw [color=GOLD]Ice Smashing Axe[/color] at the main target. [color=GOLD]Ice Smashing Axe[/color] shatters all the buffs and debuffs from its target and deals 20% of the tower's attack damage as [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage for each buff purged. If more than 5 buffs are removed the target is also stunned for 1.5 seconds (0.75 on bosses). The axe is so heavy that its wielder's attack speed is slowed by 30% for 3 seconds after throwing it.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% damage per buff
-0.4% attack speed reduction
cn:
攻击时有15%几率向目标投掷[color=GOLD]碎冰战斧[/color]。该战斧会粉碎目标所有增益与减益状态，每移除1个状态效果即造成防御塔20%攻击力的[color=6495edff]元素[/color]伤害。若移除超过5个状态，目标还将被眩晕1.5秒（对首领为0.75秒）。投掷后自身攻击速度降低30%，持续3秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每个状态+0.4% 伤害
-0.4% 攻速惩罚

en: Ice Coated Axes
cn: 冰覆战斧

en: Whenever the Troll hits a slowed creep, it deals bonus damage.
cn: 攻击减速单位时根据移速缺失比例造成额外伤害。

en:
Whenever the Troll hits a slowed creep, it deals 0.6% bonus damage for every 1% movement speed the creep is missing.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02% damage
cn:
攻击移动速度被降低的敌方单位时，目标每损失1%移动速度可造成0.6%额外伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.02% 伤害

+0.03% damage

+0.03% 伤害

en: Leaf Storm
cn: 叶刃风暴

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to summon a [color=GOLD]Leaf Storm[/color] at the creep's position. [color=GOLD]Leaf Storm[/color] slows creeps inside it and deals spell damage over time.
cn: 攻击命中敌方单位时，有几率在其位置召唤[color=GOLD]叶刃风暴[/color]造成持续法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 15% chance to summon a 200 AoE [color=GOLD]Leaf Storm[/color] at the creep's position. [color=GOLD]Leaf Storm[/color] slows creeps inside it by 30% for 1 second and deals 2100 spell damage over time.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+90 spell damage
+0.6% slow
+0.04 seconds slow duration
cn:
攻击命中敌方单位时有15%几率在其位置召唤200范围的[color=GOLD]叶刃风暴[/color]。使范围内单位移速降低30%持续1秒，并持续造成2100点法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+90 法术伤害
+0.6% 减速效果
+0.04秒 减速持续时间

en: Thorned!
cn: 荆棘印记

en: When a unit comes in range it receives the [color=GOLD]Thorned[/color] debuff. The debuff increases damage taken from [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] towers.
cn: 进入范围的敌方单位会获得[color=GOLD]荆棘印记[/color]，使其更易受[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔伤害。

en:
When a unit comes in 950 range to this tower it receives the [color=GOLD]Thorned[/color] debuff. The debuff lasts 3 seconds and increases damage taken from [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] towers by 30%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.06 seconds duration
+0.6% damage taken
cn:
进入该防御塔950范围的单位会获得持续3秒的[color=GOLD]荆棘印记[/color]，使其受到[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔的伤害提高30%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.06秒 持续时间
+0.6% 易伤效果

en: Valor's Light
cn: 勇气之光

en: Deals spell damage and slows creeps coming in range of this tower.
cn: 对进入范围的单位造成法术伤害与减速。

en:
Whenever a creep comes within 800 range of this tower it takes an initial 2000 spell damage per second and its movement speed is decreased by 30%. The damage and slow of this ability decay by 50% every second. Lasts 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+80 spell damage
+1.2% slow
cn:
敌方单位进入800范围时，每秒受到2000点法术伤害并降低30%移动速度。伤害与减速效果每秒衰减50%，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+80 法术伤害
+1.2% 减速强度

en: Last Line of Defense
cn: 最终防线

en: Any creep passing this tower twice will take more spell and attack damage.
cn: 重复经过的敌方单位将根据周边防御塔数量承受更多伤害。

en:
Any creep passing this tower twice will take 1% more spell and attack damage for each tower within 400 range of this tower. This effect is goldcost adjusted, towers with a goldcost of 2500 provide the full bonus.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08% spell and attack damage taken per tower
cn:
任何两次经过该防御塔的敌方单位，将根据400范围内防御塔数量使其额外承受1%法术与攻击伤害。此伤害按防御塔的价格加权计算，价格≥2500的防御塔能提供全额加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每塔+0.08% 承受伤害

en: Dark Orbs
cn: 暗影法球

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to spawn orbs that fire off dark rays at enemies in range, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率生成法球，向范围内敌人发射暗影射线造成法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 20% chance to spawn 3 orbs that travel outwards in all directions from Shadow. Orbs travel for 8 seconds, firing off dark rays at enemies within 450 range, which deal 15% of this tower's attack damage as spell damage per second.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 orb every 5 levels
+0.6% damage per second
cn:
攻击时有20%几率生成3颗向四周扩散的暗影法球。法球持续8秒，向450范围内的敌人发射暗影射线，每秒造成该防御塔15%攻击力的法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每5级+1 法球
+0.6% 每秒伤害

en: Soul Conversion
cn: 灵魂转化

en: On kill a lesser orb is spawned where the creep died.
cn: 击杀敌方单位时在死亡位置生成次级法球。

en:
On kill a lesser orb is spawned where the creep died. Lesser orbs last for 3 seconds, firing off lesser dark rays at enemies within 450 range, which deal 9% of this tower's attack damage as spell damage per second.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.36% damage per second
cn:
击杀敌方单位时在死亡位置生成持续3秒的次级法球，次级法球会向450范围内的敌人发射暗影射线，每秒造成该防御塔9%攻击力的法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.36% 每秒伤害

en: Arcane Orb
cn: 奥术法球

en: Infuses Harby's attacks with arcane energy at the cost of mana, dealing bonus spell damage.
cn: 将奥术能量注入黑曜毁灭者的攻击中，消耗法力值以造成额外法术伤害。

en:
Infuses Harby's attacks with arcane energy at the cost of 100 mana per attack. Deals [color=GOLD][6 x Current Mana][/color] as bonus spell damage. This ability also passively grants 1 bonus maximum mana for each creep Harby kills.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
[color=GOLD]+[0.1 x Current Mana][/color] as bonus spell damage
cn:
每次攻击消耗100点法力值，造成[color=GOLD][6 x 当前法力值][/color]点额外法术伤害。

被动效果：每击杀一名敌方单位，永久增加1点最大法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
[color=GOLD]+[0.1 x 当前法力值][/color]点 额外法术伤害

en: Grotesque Awakening
cn: 畸变觉醒

en: Whenever this tower is hit by a spell, it comes to life.
cn: 受到技能命中时，此防御塔才会激活。

en: Whenever this tower is hit by a spell, it comes to life for 5 seconds, enabling it to attack. This ability is affected by buff duration.
cn: 受到技能命中时，此防御塔会进入激活状态5秒，期间可进行攻击行为。此效果受增益状态持续时间影响。

+5 伤害

cn: 攻击时造成等同于当前法力值的[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]类型伤害。

When this tower hits a creep, it deals [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage equal to its current mana.
 
This damage is not affected by bonuses to attack damage but is affected by attack crit bonuses.

cn: 冷血

en: Every second this tower loses mana.

cn: 每秒损失最大法力值的1.75%。

en: Splash
cn: 法力激荡

en: Restores mana after every attack.
cn: 每次攻击后恢复法力值。

en: Maledict
cn: 灾祸诅咒

en: Chance to increase spell vulnerability of hit creeps. Every time the affected creep is targeted by a spell, this tower deals additional spell damage equal to 3 times the goldcost of the caster.
cn: 有几率使被击中的敌方单位更易受法术伤害，并触发连锁伤害。

en:
20% chance to increase spell vulnerability of hit creeps by 20% for 5 seconds. Every time the affected creep is targeted by a spell, this tower deals additional spell damage equal to 3 times the goldcost of the caster.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+0.6% spell damage received
cn:
20%几率使被击中的敌方单位在5秒内受到的法术伤害提高20%。每当受影响单位被指向性技能命中时，该防御塔将造成相当于施法者价格3倍的法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+0.6% 法术易伤效果

en: Rampage of Pigs
cn: 群猪狂袭

en: Attacks with a rampage of 2 exploding pigs that deal attack damage to a single target and AoE spell damage.
cn: 攻击时会释放2头爆炸的魔猪，对单体目标造成攻击伤害并附加范围法术伤害。

en:
Attacks with a rampage of 2 pigs from hell. Pigs will home in on creeps and explode upon contact, dealing the tower's attack damage to the main target and splashing an extra 15% of the tower's attack damage in 375 AoE as spell damage, divided by the number of creeps hit.
 
Pigs move at 380 speed and home in on targets from 275 range.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 homing range
+0.4% splash damage
+1 pig at levels 5 and 15
2 pig speed per level
cn:
攻击时召唤2头来自地狱的狂暴魔猪发动突袭。魔猪会锁定敌方单位，在接触时爆炸，对主目标造成此防御塔的攻击伤害，并在375范围内溅射额外15%攻击伤害的法术伤害，该伤害由波及的敌方单位数量均分。

魔猪移动速度为380，可在275范围内锁定目标。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 锁定范围
+0.4% 溅射伤害
5级和15级时各+1 魔猪数量
每级提升2点魔猪移动速度

en: Initiative
cn: 主动突袭

en: The portal will occasionally release an extra [color=GOLD]Rampage of Pigs[/color].
cn: 猪圈有几率额外释放一次[color=GOLD]群猪狂袭[/color]。

en: The portal will occasionally release an extra [color=GOLD]Rampage of Pigs[/color]. The cooldown for [color=GOLD]Initiative[/color] is reduced every time a creep comes within 900 range of this tower and also whenever this tower kills a creep. [color=GOLD]Initiative[/color] will trigger every 16th mass creep and more often for larger creeps.
cn: 猪圈有几率额外释放一次[color=GOLD]群猪狂袭[/color]。每当敌方单位进入防御塔900范围或被防御塔击杀时，[color=GOLD]主动突袭[/color]的冷却时间会缩短。[color=GOLD]主动突袭[/color]会在每第16个杂兵经过时触发，且大型敌方单位会加速该进程。

en: The portal will occasionally release an extra [color=GOLD]Rampage of Pigs[/color].
cn: 猪圈有几率额外释放一次[color=GOLD]群猪狂袭[/color]。

en: The portal will occasionally release an extra [color=GOLD]Rampage of Pigs[/color]. The cooldown for [color=GOLD]Initiative[/color] is reduced every time a creep comes within 1400 range of this tower and also whenever this tower kills a creep. [color=GOLD]Initiative[/color] will trigger every 16th mass creep and more often for larger creeps.
cn: 猪圈有几率额外释放一次[color=GOLD]群猪狂袭[/color]。每当敌方单位进入防御塔1400范围或被防御塔击杀时，[color=GOLD]主动突袭[/color]的冷却时间会缩短。[color=GOLD]主动突袭[/color]会在每第16个杂兵经过时触发，且大型敌方单位会加速该进程。

en: Storm Power
cn: 风暴之力

en: If a creep dies while under the effect of [color=GOLD]Strong Wind[/color] its living energy is converted into mana and boosts this tower's abilities.
cn: 若敌方单位在[color=GOLD]强风[/color]效果中死亡，其属性将转化为法力值并强化此防御塔的能力。

en: If a creep dies while under the effect of [color=GOLD]Strong Wind[/color] its living energy is converted in +35 mana and boost this tower's abilities. Each death increases the triggerchance for this [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] tower by 0.02% (75% max) and also increase the damage dealt with [color=GOLD]Strong Winds[/color] by 0.05 damage per 1% slow.
cn: 若敌方单位在[color=GOLD]强风[/color]效果中死亡，将转化为+35法力值并强化此防御塔能力。每个死亡的单位使[color=GOLD]连锁风暴[/color]触发几率提升0.02%（上限75%），且每1%减速效果会使[color=GOLD]强风[/color]伤害增加0.05点。

en: Chaining Storm
cn: 连锁风暴

en: Chance to cast [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] at the attacked creep. All creeps in range of the [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] suffer spell damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率对目标施放[color=GOLD]连锁风暴[/color]，对范围内所有敌方单位造成法术伤害。

en:
25% chance to cast [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] at the attacked creep for the cost of 100 mana. All creeps in 350 range of the [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] suffer 200 spell damage multiplied by the number of creeps hit. They are also weakened to receive [color=GOLD][2 x creep count]%[/color] more damage from [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color], [color=6495edff]Ice[/color] and [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color] towers. All effects of this [color=GOLD]Chaining Storm[/color] tower are doubled and a 25% higher spell critical chance is applied whenever the main target is an air unit.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.25% trigger chance
+65 damage
+0.12% received damage
cn:
25%几率消耗100法力值对攻击目标施放[color=GOLD]连锁风暴[/color]。对350范围内的敌方单位造成命中目标数乘以200点法术伤害。被波及单位额外承受[color=GOLD][2×目标数]%[/color]来自[color=ffffe0ff]风暴系[/color]、[color=6495edff]寒冰系[/color]和[color=66cdaaff]星辰系[/color]的防御塔的伤害。当主目标为空中单位时，所有效果翻倍且法术暴击几率提升25%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.25% 触发几率
+65 伤害
+0.12% 承受伤害

en: Cold
cn: 寒霜

en: Chance to freeze hit creeps and reduce health regeneration.
cn: 攻击有几率冻结敌方单位并降低生命恢复。

en:
20% chance to freeze hit creeps and reduce health regeneration by 20%. The freeze lasts for 1 second and cannot be reapplied on already frozen creeps. Chance to proc, health regeneration reduction and freeze duration are halved for bosses. Does not affect immune creeps.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+0.05 seconds duration
-0.6% hp regen
cn:
命中时20%几率冻结目标1秒，使其生命恢复降低20%。对首领的触发几率、减疗效果和持续时间减半。无法对魔免单位生效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+0.05秒 持续时间
-0.6% 生命恢复

+0.05 seconds duration
-0.8% hp regen

命中时25%几率冻结目标1.2秒，使其生命恢复降低30%。对首领的触发几率、减疗效果和持续时间减半。无法对魔免单位生效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 触发几率
+0.05秒 持续时间
-0.8% 生命恢复

en: Dimensional Distortion Field
cn: 次元扭曲力场

en: Each second this tower attacks a creep in range, dealing [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage based on linked tower's spell damage per second.
cn: 每秒攻击范围内一个敌方单位，造成基于链接中的防御塔法术伤害的[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]伤害。

en:
Each second this tower attacks a creep within 800 range, dealing 25% of the linked tower's spell damage per second as [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage to the target creep. This tower can only attack if a link exists for at least 10 seconds. Benefits from attack speed bonuses.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% of spell DPS as damage
cn:
每秒攻击800范围内一个敌方单位，造成在链接中的防御塔25%法术秒伤的[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]伤害。链接需至少维持10秒后方可生效，受攻击速度加成影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 法术伤害转化率

en: Wind of Death
cn: 死亡旋风

en: On attack, this tower has a chance to catch the target in a cyclone. When the caught creep falls down, this tower deals [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage to all creeps near the target. Doesn't work on bosses and air creeps.
cn: 攻击有几率将目标卷入旋风，坠落时对周围造成[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]伤害，对首领和空中单位无效。

en:
On attack, this tower has a 20% chance to catch the target in a cyclone for 0.5 seconds. When the caught creep falls down, this tower deals [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] 20 damage to creeps in 300 AoE around the target. AoE damage is increased by 25% if the target is a champion. Doesn't work on bosses and air creeps.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 damage
+0.3% chance to catch
cn:
攻击时有20%几率将目标卷入旋风0.5秒。坠落时对300范围内敌方单位造成20点[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]伤害，若目标是精英则伤害提升25%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 伤害
+0.3% 触发几率

en: Insatiable Hunger
cn: 无尽饥渴

en: Deals additional attack damage to hit creeps based on missing mana and replenishes mana when attacking.
cn: 根据缺失的法力值对敌方单位造成额外攻击伤害，攻击时恢复法力值。

en:
Deals 0.25% additional attack damage to hit creeps for each mana point the Death Knight is currently missing and replenishes 1% of his maximum mana. He replenishes 5% of his maximum mana for each unit he kills.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01% damage per mana point
cn:
死亡骑士每缺失1点法力值，对击中的敌方单位造成额外0.25%攻击伤害，并恢复自身1%最大法力值。击杀单位时恢复5%最大法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.01% 伤害每点法力值

en: Withering Presence
cn: 凋零威压

en: Chance to steal health of nearby creeps.
cn: 有几率窃取附近敌方单位的生命值。

en:
Whenever a unit comes in 900 range of the Death Knight, it has a 15% chance to have its health regeneration reduced by 50% and to lose 5% of its current health every second for 4 seconds. Units affected by this spell grant 50% less experience and bounty on death.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+1% health regen reduction
-1% experience and bounty reduction
cn:
敌方单位进入死亡骑士900范围时，有15%几率使其生命恢复降低50%，并在4秒内每秒流失5%当前生命值。受影响的单位死亡时提供的经验和赏金减少50%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+1% 生命恢复降低
-1% 经验和赏金减少

en: Morphling Strike
cn: 变体打击

en: Every time this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to launch 3 projectiles to random creeps, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机目标发射3枚能量弹，造成法术伤害。

en:
Every time this tower hits a creep, if it has at least 25 stacks of [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color] or [color=GOLD]Morph: Swiftness[/color], there is a 20% chance to launch 3 projectiles to random creeps in 900 range, dealing 2000 spell damage to them. On impact, if [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color] has at least 25 stacks, the projectiles deal additional spell damage equal to 25% of the tower's damage per second for 5 seconds; if [color=GOLD]Morph: Swiftness[/color] has at least 25 stacks, they slow the targets by 20% and increase the damage they receive from [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color] by 15% for 8 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+60 damage
+0.8% damage per second
+0.4% slow
+0.2% damage from [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color]
+0.6% chance
cn:
当此塔拥有至少25层[color=GOLD]属性变换：力量[/color]或[color=GOLD]属性变换：敏捷[/color]时，每次攻击有20%几率向900范围内3个随机目标发射能量弹，造成2000点法术伤害。若[color=GOLD]属性变换：力量[/color]层数≥25，能量弹将附加相当于防御塔5秒内25%秒伤的法术伤害；若[color=GOLD]属性变换：敏捷[/color]层数≥25，则使目标减速20%并提升[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔对其伤害15%，持续8秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+60 伤害
+0.8% 秒伤转化率
+0.4% 减速效果
+0.2% [color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]易伤
+0.6% 触发几率

en: Evolve
cn: 变体进化

en: Every time this tower uses [color=GOLD]Morphling Strike[/color], it permanently gains power, depending on current [color=GOLD]Morph[/color] stacks.
cn: 每次施放[color=GOLD]变体打击[/color]时，根据当前[color=GOLD]属性变换[/color]层数永久提升属性。

en: Every time this tower uses [color=GOLD]Morphling Strike[/color], it permanently gains 0.2% base damage and 0.1% attack speed if [color=GOLD]Morph: Might[/color] has at least 25 stacks, or 0.2% attack speed and 0.1% base damage if [color=GOLD]Morph: Swiftness[/color] has at least 25 stacks.  Can evolve a maximum of 500 times.
cn: 每次释放[color=GOLD]变体打击[/color]，若[color=GOLD]属性变换：力量[/color]层数≥25，永久提升0.2%基础攻击力和0.1%攻击速度；若[color=GOLD]属性变换：敏捷[/color]层数≥25，则提升0.2%攻击速度和0.1%基础攻击力。最多可进化500次。

en: Frost
cn: 寒霜

en: Slows hit creeps.
cn: 减速被击中的敌方单位。

en:
Slows hit creeps by 10% for 9 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% slow
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
使被击中的敌方单位减速10%，持续9秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.3% 减速效果
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Activate Trap
cn: 激活陷阱

en: Periodically traps random 3 creeps in range, dealing spell damage and stunning them.
cn: 周期性禁锢范围内随机3名敌方单位，造成法术伤害并令其眩晕。

en:
Every 15 seconds this tower traps 3 creeps in 950 range, dealing 70 spell damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+3 spell damage
-0.2 seconds cooldown
cn:
每15秒禁锢950范围内3名敌方单位，造成70点法术伤害并令其眩晕0.5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+3 法术伤害
-0.2秒 冷却时间

en: Mana Feed
cn: 法力给养

en: Attacks restore mana to the tower and increase spell crit chance.
cn: 攻击为防御塔恢复法力值并提升法术暴击几率。

en:
Attacks restore 4 mana to the tower and increase spell crit chance by 5%.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Mana regeneration increases mana gained.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% spell crit chance
cn:
每次攻击恢复4点法力值，并使法术暴击几率提升5%。

[color=GOLD]提示：[/color]法力回复属性可提升法力获取量。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1% 法术暴击几率

en: Lightning Burst
cn: 闪电迸发

en: Chance to deal additional spell damage to hit creeps. This ability resets spell crit bonus of [color=GOLD]Mana Feed[/color].
cn: 有几率对敌方单位造成基于当前法力值的额外法术伤害，并重置[color=GOLD]法力供养[/color]的暴击加成。

en:
12.5% chance to deal 15 times current mana as spell damage to hit creeps. This ability resets spell crit bonus of [color=GOLD]Mana Feed[/color].
 
Resets the bonus spell crit of [color=GOLD]Mana Feed[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% chance
cn:
命中时有12.5%几率造成当前法力值15倍的额外法术伤害，此效果会重置[color=GOLD]法力给养[/color]的暴击加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 触发几率

cn: 精灵之火

en: Debuffs hit creeps, making them more vulnerable to spells and debuffs.

+0.6% extra debuff duration
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+0.6% 负面状态持续时间
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Blood Spill
cn: 血溅八方

en: On attack, this tower has a chance to lose attack speed and boost the attack speed of nearby towers.
cn: 攻击时有几率降低自身攻击速度，并提升附近防御塔的攻击速度。

en:
On attack, this tower has a 15% chance to lose 100% attack speed and boost the attack speed of all towers in 200 range by 50%, equally divided among them, for 6 seconds. Every time it casts [color=GOLD]Blood Spill[/color], the tower gains 0.25 experience for every other tower affected. Cannot retrigger while active.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% attack speed
+0.2% chance
cn:
攻击时有15%几率使自身攻击速度降低100%，并为200范围内所有防御塔提升50%攻击速度，加成效果将均分至个目标，持续6秒。技能每次施放时，每影响一座其它防御塔可获得0.25经验。效果持续期间无法重复触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 攻击速度
+0.2% 触发几率

en: Shadow Glaive

cn: 攻击时有几率发动一次必定暴击的急速连击。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 20% chance to gain 200% attack speed until the next attack. The next attack will also crit for sure and deal 25% more crit damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% crit damage
+8% attack speed
+0.8% chance
cn:
20%几率使攻击速度提升200%，直至下一次攻击。该次攻击必定暴击，且暴击伤害额外提升25%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 暴击伤害
+8% 攻击速度
+0.8% 触发几率

en: Corrupts hit creeps, increasing damage received from attacks and spells.
cn: 侵蚀被击中的敌方单位，使其承受更多攻击和法术伤害。

en:
Corrupts hit creeps, increasing damage received from attacks by 30% and damage received from spells by 15% for 9 seconds
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1.2% damage from attacks
+0.6% damage from spells
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
使被击中的敌方单位在9秒内承受的物理伤害增加30%，法术伤害增加15%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1.2% 物理易伤
+0.6% 法术易伤
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Poison
cn: 剧毒

en: Poisons hit creeps, causing spell damage over time and slowing.
cn: 使目标中毒，持续造成法术伤害并减速。

en:
Poisons hit creeps, causing 100 spell damage every second and slowing the creep by 5% for 9 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+3 poison damage
+0.12% slow
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
每秒造成100点法术伤害，并使目标减速5%，持续9秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+3 毒素伤害
+0.12% 减速效果
+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Incinerate
cn: 焚化

en: Incinerates hit creeps. An incinerated creep takes more damage from [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers and suffers spell damage over time
cn: 点燃目标单位，持续对目标造成法术伤害，并使其更易受[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]防御塔的伤害。

Incinerates hit creeps. An incinerated creep takes 5% more damage from [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers and suffers 120 spell damage every second for 9 seconds.

+0.3 seconds duration

en: Electrify
cn: 感电

en: Electrifies hit creeps, causing them to occasionally take extra damage.
cn: 使目标带电，承受攻击时有几率承受额外伤害。

en:
Electrifies hit creeps for 9 seconds. Everytime an electrified creep is damaged by an attack or spell it has a 20% chance to take 40% extra damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.3% chance
+0.8% damage
+0.3 seconds duration
cn:
使命中目标带电，带电单位在9秒内每次受到攻击或法术伤害时，有20%几率额外承受40%伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+0.3秒 持续时间

en: Wrath of Ymir
cn: 伊米尔之怒

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to deal portion of attack damage as spell damage and slow the creep.
cn: 每当该防御塔击中敌方单位时，有一定几率将部分攻击伤害转化为法术伤害并减速目标。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 20% chance to deal additional 10% of tower's attack damage as spell damage and slow the creep by an amount equal to the percent of its remaining hitpoints for 2 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+0.6% damage
cn:
每当该防御塔击中敌方单位时，有20%几率附加相当于其攻击力10%的法术伤害，并根据目标剩余生命值百分比造成减速效果，持续2秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+0.6% 伤害

en: Blood of Ymir
cn: 伊米尔之血

en: Creeps that come into range of Ymir temporarily take extra damage from [color=6495edff]Ice[/color] towers.
cn: 进入伊米尔射程的敌方单位会暂时受到来自[color=6495edff]寒冰系[/color]防御塔的额外伤害。

en:
When a creep comes in 900 range of Ymir, he debuffs the creep for 6 seconds, increasing vulnerability to [color=6495edff]Ice[/color] towers by 25%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08 seconds duration
+0.4% vulnerability
cn:
当敌方单位进入900范围时，会被施加持续6秒的负面状态，增加其25%受到[color=6495edff]寒冰系[/color]防御塔的伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.08秒 持续时间
+0.4% 易伤效果

en: Reimbursement
cn: 资源返现

en: Reimburses gold when no ability is used.
cn: 未触发技能时返还金币。

en: Whenever this tower attacks and doesn't trigger any of it's abilities, the player is reimbursed 5 gold.
cn: 每当该防御塔攻击且未触发任何技能时，玩家将获得5金币。

en: Probability Field Emitter
cn: 概率力场发射器

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Probability Field Emitter[/color] at a random tower, increasing trigger chances.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机防御塔发射[color=GOLD]概率力场[/color]，提升触发几率。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 20% chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Probability Field Emitter[/color] at a random tower within 500 range, increasing trigger chances by [color=GOLD]30%-60%[/color] for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+0.6% trigger chances
cn:
攻击时有20%几率向500范围内随机防御塔发射[color=GOLD]概率力场发射器[/color]，使其触发几率提升[color=GOLD]30%~60%[/color]，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+0.6% 触发几率增幅

en: Clockwork Engineer
cn: 发条工程师

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Clockwork Engineer[/color] at a random tower, increasing attack speed and damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机防御塔派遣[color=GOLD]发条工程师[/color]，提升攻速和伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 20% chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Clockwork Engineer[/color] at a random tower within 500 range, increasing attack speed and attack damage by [color=GOLD]10%-40%[/color] for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+0.6% attack speed and damage
cn:
攻击时有20%几率向500范围内随机防御塔派遣[color=GOLD]发条工程师[/color]，使其攻击速度和攻击伤害提升[color=GOLD]10%~40%[/color]，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+0.6% 攻速与伤害增幅

en: Goblin Sapper
cn: 地精爆破兵

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Goblin Sapper[/color] at the main target, dealing AoE spell damage and slowing creeps in an AoE.
cn: 攻击时有几率向主目标投掷[color=GOLD]地精爆破兵[/color]，造成范围法术伤害并减速区域内敌方单位。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 20% chance to launch a [color=GOLD]Goblin Sapper[/color] at the main target. On contact [color=GOLD]Goblin Sapper[/color] deals [color=GOLD]1350-7650[/color] spell damage to the main target and all creeps within 250 range. Also slows all affected creeps by [color=GOLD]25%-45%[/color] for 3 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+180 spell damage
+0.6% slow
cn:
攻击时有20%几率向主目标投掷[color=GOLD]地精爆破兵[/color]，接触时对主目标及250区域内所有敌方单位造成[color=GOLD]1350-7650[/color]点法术伤害，并使其移动速度降低[color=GOLD]25%~45%[/color]，持续3秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率
+180 法术伤害
+0.6% 减速效果

en: Burn!
cn: 灼烧

en: Ignites hit creeps, dealing attack damage over time and slowing the creep.
cn: 点燃被击中的敌方单位，造成持续伤害并减速。

en:
Ignites hit creeps, dealing attack damage every 2 seconds. Ignite damage is equal to this tower's current attack damage. Ignite slows movement speed by 5%, lasts 2.5 seconds and stacks. Each stack increases the damage by 5% and the slow by 1%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+4% initial damage
+0.2% damage per stack
cn:
点燃被击中的敌方单位，每2秒造成等同于该防御塔当前攻击力的伤害。点燃效果初始造成5%减速，持续2.5秒且可叠加。每层叠加使伤害提高5%，减速效果提高1%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+4% 基础伤害
+0.2% 每层伤害增幅

en: Double the Trouble
cn: 双重灾祸

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to launch an additional projectile which deals the same damage as a normal attack.
cn: 攻击命中时有几率发射额外飞弹，造成等同于普通攻击的伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 12.5% chance to launch an additional projectile that deals the same damage as a normal attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% chance
cn:

+0.5% 触发几率

en: Soul Scattering
cn: 灵魂散射

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to reduce its own attack speed and make the main target more vulnerable to spells.
cn: 攻击时有几率降低自身攻速并使主目标更易受法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to reduce its own attack speed by 60% and make the main target receive 40% more spell damage. Both effects last 2.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% attack speed
+0.32% spell damage received
cn:
攻击时有10%几率使自身攻击速度降低60%，同时使主目标受到的法术伤害提高40%。两项效果均持续2.5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 攻击速度
+0.32% 法术伤害

cn: 暗影突袭

en: Fungus Strike
cn: 真菌打击

en: After casting [color=GOLD]Mystical Trance[/color] the Mushroom's next attack will be a [color=GOLD]Fungus Strike[/color]. [color=GOLD]Fungus Strike[/color] deals 100% of its damage as spell damage, has extra 20% chance to crit and makes the target creep receive more damage from spells.
cn: 施放[color=GOLD]神秘冥想[/color]后，下次攻击将变为[color=GOLD]真菌打击[/color]。该攻击造成全额法术伤害，获得额外暴击几率并使目标更易受到法术伤害。

en:
After casting [color=GOLD]Mystical Trance[/color] the Mushroom's next attack will be a [color=GOLD]Fungus Strike[/color]. [color=GOLD]Fungus Strike[/color] deals 100% of its damage as spell damage, has extra 20% chance to crit and makes the target creep receive 10% more damage from spells. This effect is permanent and stacks.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% spell damage
+0.8% spell crit chance
cn:
施放[color=GOLD]神秘冥想[/color]后，下次攻击将变为[color=GOLD]真菌打击[/color]，造成100%法术伤害，获得20%额外暴击几率。使目标受到的法术伤害提高10%，该效果永久存在且可叠加。

cn: 急速生长

en: Chance to grow, permanently gaining bonus spell damage.
cn: 定期获得永久法术伤害加成。

Every 20 seconds the Mushroom has a 40% chance to grow, permanently gaining 3% bonus spell damage. Maximum of 40 succesful growths.

+0.12% bonus spell damage

+0.12% 法术伤害加成

cn: 攻击时，该防御塔有几率释放[color=GOLD]连锁闪电[/color]，造成法术伤害。

en:
On attack, this tower has a 19.5% chance to release a [color=GOLD]Chain Lightning[/color] that does 150 spell damage and hits up to 3 units.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]

en: Protectress's Wrath
cn: 守护者之怒

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to deal additional attack damage to all units in range around the target. Slows all damaged units.
cn: 每次击中敌方单位时，有几率对目标周围范围内所有单位造成额外攻击伤害，并减缓所有命中单位的移动速度。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a [color=GOLD][seconds since last attack x 5]%[/color] chance to deal 50% additional attack damage to all creeps in 250 range around the main target. The maximum chance is 75%. Slows all affected creeps by 50% for 1.5 seconds. Tower's attack speed affects time needed to gain a charge.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% damage
+0.04 seconds
cn:
每次攻击敌方单位时，有[color=GOLD][上次攻击间隔秒数 x 5]%[/color]几率对主目标250范围内所有敌方单位造成50%额外攻击伤害，最高触发几率75%。所有受影响单位移动速度降低50%，持续1.5秒。防御塔的攻击速度会影响充能时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 伤害
+0.04秒 持续时间

en: Meld with the Forest
cn: 林间匿踪

en: The Protectress gains additional attack damage for each second she doesn't attack.
cn: 每秒未攻击时会获得额外攻击伤害。

en:
The Protectress gains 18% additional attack damage for each second she doesn't attack. There is a maximum of 12 seconds. On attack the bonus disappears. Increased attack speed decreases the time needed to gain a charge.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage per second
cn:
每秒未攻击可获得18%额外攻击伤害，最多累积12秒。发动攻击后加成消失。提升攻击速度会缩短充能所需时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 每秒伤害

en: Power Surge
cn: 能量过载

en: Towers under the effect of [color=GOLD]Steam Power[/color] have a chance to cause a surge in the Steam Engine, generating exp.
cn: 受[color=GOLD]蒸汽动力[/color]影响的防御塔有几率触发蒸汽引擎过载，产生经验值。

en:
Towers under the effect of [color=GOLD]Steam Power[/color] have a 1% base attack speed adjusted chance to cause a surge in the Steam Engine, granting it 1 exp.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.04 exp
cn:
受[color=GOLD]蒸汽动力[/color]影响的防御塔有1%基础攻速加权的几率触发蒸汽引擎过载，使其获得1点经验值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.04 经验值

en: Absorb Energy
cn: 能量吸收

en: Attacks do no damage but every hit has a chance to restore mana and steal mana from the target.
cn: 攻击不造成伤害，但每次命中都有几率恢复法力值并窃取目标法力。

en:
Attacks do no damage. There is a 10% chance per hit to gather energy, restoring 50 mana to the tower and the target will lose 50 mana if it has mana.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 mana
+0.2% chance
cn:
攻击不造成伤害。每次命中10%几率汲取能量，为防御塔恢复50点法力值，若目标拥有法力值则额外流失50点。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1 法力值
+0.2% 几率

cn: 能量加速

en: Every attack increases attack speed and attack damage.
cn: 每次攻击提升攻击速度与攻击伤害。

Every attack increases attack speed and attack damage by 2%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% attack speed and attack damage
cn:
每次攻击提升2%攻击速度与攻击伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1% 攻击速度与攻击伤害

en: Errant Tachyons
cn: 迷途快子

en: On kill, this tower is stunned and the bonus from [color=GOLD]Energy Acceleration[/color] is lost.
cn: 击杀单位时该防御塔将被击晕，并失去[color=GOLD]能量加速[/color]的加成效果。

en: On kill, this tower is stunned for 2 seconds and the bonus from [color=GOLD]Energy Acceleration[/color] is lost.
cn: 击杀单位时该防御塔将被击晕2秒，并失去[color=GOLD]能量加速[/color]的加成效果。

en: Special Training
cn: 特训协议

en: On higher levels, copters gain special abilities.
cn: 防御塔在提升等级时获得特殊能力。

en:
On higher levels the copters specialize.
On level 7: Copter #1 has its damage type changed to [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color], each rocket's AoE is increased by 25% and the attacks gain a napalm modifier. Napalm causes a 20% slow and 50% of the tower's attack damage as [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage per second for 5 seconds.
 
On level 15: Copter #2 will change its machine-gun-missiles to a long ranged tesla coil, changing the damage type to [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] and increasing attack range to 210. Furthermore its armor reduction base effect is increased to 50%, but the slow is decreased to 10%.
 
On level 25: Copter #3 will become a legendary Ghost Warrior. Ghost Warriors have an on-board teleportation device, allowing them to teleport behind targets every 5 seconds. Shooting delays the charging of the teleportation device.
cn:
提升等级时获得特殊能力：
7级：1号直升机伤害类型转变为[color=6495edff]元素[/color]，火箭爆炸范围扩大25%，攻击附加凝固汽油效果。凝固汽油造成20%减速，并在5秒内每秒造成相当于防御塔50%攻击力的[color=6495edff]元素[/color]伤害。

15级：2号直升机将机枪导弹替换为长程电枪，伤害类型转变为[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]，射程提升至210范围。基础破甲效果增强至50%，但减速效果降低至10%。

25级：3号直升机进化为传奇幽灵战士。幽灵战士搭载瞬移装置，每5秒可瞬移至目标身后。发动攻击会延迟瞬移装置充能。"

en: Helicopter Zone
cn: 直升机领域

en: 3 helicopters circle around the tower trying to stay within 1000 range of it. The helicopters attack creeps in front of them, dealing the tower's attack damage. Helicopters also reduce movement speed and armor of hit creeps. These helicopters are not affected by attack speed.
cn: 3架直升机环绕防御塔（最大半径1000范围），自动攻击前方敌方单位。直升机攻击造成防御塔攻击力的[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]伤害，并降低目标移速与护甲。直升机攻击不受攻速影响。

en:
3 helicopters circle around the tower trying to stay within 1000 range of it. If there are creeps in front of a helicopter, it will attack them dealing the tower's attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage.
 
Helicopters attack every 0.25 seconds with a barrage of 3 missiles spaced 250 range apart and exploding in 140 AoE. Hit creeps are slowed by 50% and their armor is reduced by 30% for 0.8 seconds. Not affected by attack speed.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% armor reduction
cn:
3架直升机环绕防御塔（最大半径1000范围）自动攻击前方敌方单位，造成等同于防御塔攻击力的[color=d2b48cff]物理[/color]伤害。

直升机每隔0.25秒发射3枚间隔250范围的导弹，在140范围内爆炸。被击中的敌方单位移速降低50%，护甲减少30%，持续0.8秒。不受攻击速度影响。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 破甲效果

en: Fireblossom
cn: 火花绽放

en: Every few attacks this tower deals some bonus damage.
cn: 每数次攻击触发额外伤害。

en:
Every 7th attack deals 10% bonus damage.
Every 8th attack deals 20% bonus damage.
Every 9th attack deals 30% bonus damage.
Every 10th attack deals 40% bonus damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% bonus damage every 7th attack.
+0.4% bonus damage every 8th attack.
+0.6% bonus damage every 9th attack.
+0.8% bonus damage every 10th attack.

第7次攻击造成10%额外伤害
第8次攻击造成20%额外伤害
第9次攻击造成30%额外伤害
第10次攻击造成40%额外伤害

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
第7次攻击+0.2% 额外伤害
第8次攻击+0.4% 额外伤害
第9次攻击+0.6% 额外伤害

en: Moths of Prey
cn: 掠食飞蛾

en: This tower controls 6 magical moths which deal spell damage.
cn: 该防御塔操控6只造成法术伤害的魔法飞蛾。

en:
This tower controls 6 magical moths.
 
Each moth deals 50 spell damage every 0.5 seconds to a random creep within 375 range of the moth. The moths also burn 2 mana on damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08 mana burned
cn:
该防御塔操控6只魔法飞蛾。

每只飞蛾每隔0.5秒对自身375范围内随机敌方单位造成50点法术伤害，并燃烧目标2点法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.08 法力燃烧

en: Rare Breed
cn: 稀有血统

en: [color=GOLD]Moths of Prey[/color] will change their abilities depending on sum of gold costs of nearby towers.
cn: [color=GOLD]掠食飞蛾[/color]会根据附近防御塔总造价改变能力。

en:
[color=GOLD]Moths of Prey[/color] will change their abilities depending on the sum of gold costs of towers in 110 range. This also includes the gold cost of this tower. The ability is picked based on the element of the biggest gold cost sum.
 
[color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color]: increases damage to 75.
[color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color]: increases mana burn amount by 2.
[color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color]: increases speed of the moths.
cn:
color=GOLD]掠食飞蛾[/color]将根据110范围内防御塔（包含自身）造价总和切换能力，优先选择元素类型总最高造价对应的元素属性：

[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]：伤害提升至75点
[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]：法力燃烧量+2
[color=ffffe0ff]风暴系[/color]：提升飞蛾攻击速度

en: Cannon
cn: 加农炮

en: The Dutchman attacks a random creep in range, dealing AoE attack damage.
cn: 攻击范围内随机敌方单位，造成范围攻击伤害。

en: The Dutchman attacks a random creep in 800 range, dealing the tower's attack damage in 250 AoE around the target on hit. Uses the tower's attack speed.
cn: 攻击800范围内随机敌方单位，命中时对目标250范围造成等同于防御塔攻击力的伤害，此技能的攻击速度与防御塔自身相同。

en: Soul Attack
cn: 灵魂打击

en: Every 5 seconds the Dutchman attacks a random creep in range with a collected soul, dealing spell damage.
cn: 每5秒用收集的灵魂攻击目标，造成法术伤害。

en:
Every 5 seconds the Dutchman attacks a random creep in 1200 range with a collected soul. Deals 14000 spell damage to the target.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1400 spell damage
cn:
每5秒对1200范围内随机敌方单位发动灵魂打击，造成14000点法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1400 法术伤害

en: Panic
cn: 恐慌蔓延

en: Whenever the Dutchman kills a creep, it collects its soul. Reduces armor of other creeps near the killed creep but also causes them to move faster.
cn: 击杀单位时收集灵魂，降低周围敌方护甲但提升其移速。

en:
Whenever the Dutchman kills a creep, it collects its soul. All creeps in a range of 300 around the killed creep start to panic. They have only one thing in mind: RUN!. They don't care about their defense and their armor is reduced by 25, but they run 20% faster. This effect lasts 10 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1 armor
-0.2% movement speed
cn:
击杀敌方单位时收集其灵魂，使目标300范围内所有单位进入恐慌状态：护甲降低25点，移速提升20%，持续10秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1 护甲
-0.2% 移动速度

15% chance to strike hit creeps with a lightning bolt, dealing 2000 spell damage.

+100 spell damage
+0.4% chance

+100 法术伤害
+0.4% 几率

en: Hail of Axes
cn: 斧刃风暴

en: Militia guardians throw axes to up to 3 enemies at once, but each axe has a chance to miss.
cn: 同时用斧头攻击3个目标，但每把斧头可能攻击落空。

en:
Militia guardians throw axes to up to 3 enemies at once, but each axe has 33% chance to miss. If there are less creeps than axes, the remaining axes will hit the main target.
 
[color=GOLD]Note:[/color] these extra axes will not trigger any 'on hit' abilities.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1% chance to miss
+1 target at levels 15 and 25
cn:
同时向3个目标投掷斧头，每把斧头有33%未命中几率。当目标数量不足时，剩余斧头将攻击主目标。

[color=GOLD]注：[/color]额外斧头不会触发击中时效果。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1% 未命中几率
15级和25级时+1 目标数量

en: Firestorm
cn: 烈焰风暴

en: Attacks have a chance to cause repeating AoE spell damage around the main target.
cn: 攻击有几率对目标施加持续范围法术伤害。

en:
Attacks have a 12% chance to apply 3 charges of [color=GOLD]Firestorm[/color] to the target. Each second, a charge will be spent, dealing 100 spell damage to enemies in 300 range. If the target already has charges, the charges will accumulate and a charge will be consumed instantly. On death all remaining [color=GOLD]Firestorm[/color] charges get consumed at once.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+3 damage
cn:
攻击时有12%几率对目标施加3层[color=GOLD]烈焰风暴[/color]，每秒消耗1层对300范围造成100点法术伤害。对已有层数的敌方单位，此效果会叠加并立即消耗1层。目标死亡时剩余层数全部立即爆发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 几率
+3 伤害

en: Versatile
cn: 万用增幅

en: Every time this tower deals spell damage through its abilities, it increases its DPS.
cn: 技能造成法术伤害时，按比例提升攻击秒伤。

en:
Every time this tower deals spell damage through its abilities, it increases its DPS by 1.5% of the spell damage dealt. Lasts 2.5 seconds and stacks. Maximum bonus of [color=GOLD][200 x (current wave)][/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.04% damage
cn:
每次通过技能造成法术伤害时，按伤害值的1.5%提升秒伤，持续2.5秒可叠加。最大加成值为[color=GOLD][200 x 当前波次][/color]。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.04% 伤害加成

en: Unleash
cn: 巨龙召唤

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to unleash a bronze drake towards the main target.
cn: 攻击时有几率向主目标召唤青铜龙。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 12.5% chance to unleash a bronze drake towards the main target. The bronze drake deals 1250 spell damage to a random creep in front of itself in 600 range every 0.2 seconds. Lasts 2 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+40 spell damage
+0.3% chance
cn:
攻击时有12.5%几率向主目标召唤青铜龙。青铜龙每0.2秒对前方600范围内一个随机敌方单位造成1250点法术伤害，持续2秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+40 法术伤害
+0.3% 几率

en: Feed the Drakes
cn: 饲龙仪式

en: The Drake Whisperer feeds a nearby corpse to one of his drakes and unleashes it on a random target.
cn: 用附近尸体喂养巨龙并随机释放。

en:
Every 1.5 seconds, the Drake Whisperer feeds a nearby corpse to one of his drakes and unleashes it on a random target in 1000 range. If there is no target, the drake will attack on the next feeding, with a maximum of 5 fed drakes. Each corpse has a 15% chance to feed 2 drakes.
 
[color=BLUE]Blue[/color] Drake deals 6000 spell damage in 125 AoE and slows by 25% for 3 seconds.
[color=RED]Red[/color] Drake deals 200% of the tower's attack damage and stuns for 3 seconds.
[color=GREEN]Green[/color] Drake deals 5000 spell damage and spreads [color=GOLD]Versatile's[/color] current DPS bonus to towers in 175 range for 2.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% double feed chance
[color=BLUE]Blue[/color] Drake : +150 spell damage
[color=RED]Red[/color] Drake : +8% damage
[color=GREEN]Green[/color] Drake : +0.04 seconds duration
cn:
每1.5秒用附近尸体喂养一条龙，技能将对1000范围内随机目标尸体释放。若无目标则累计喂养机会至最多5次，每次喂养有15%几率释放两次龙。

[color=BLUE]蓝龙[/color]：对125范围造成6000点法术伤害并在3秒内减速25%。
[color=RED]红龙[/color]：造成200%防御塔攻击力的伤害并造成3秒晕眩
[color=GREEN]绿龙[/color]：造成5000点法术伤害，并将[color=GOLD]万用增幅[/color]当前秒伤加成至175范围内防御塔，持续2.5秒

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 双重释放几率
[color=BLUE]蓝龙[/color]：+150 法术伤害
[color=RED]红龙[/color]：+8% 伤害
[color=GREEN]绿龙[/color]：+0.04秒 持续时间

en: Knowledge
cn: 智慧启迪

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to grant experience to a random nearby tower.
cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 1 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
cn:
攻击时有10%几率赋予600范围内随机一座防御塔1点经验值

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 几率

cn: 智慧启迪

cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 1.3 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
cn:
攻击时有10%几率赋予600范围内随机一座防御塔1.3点经验值

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 几率

cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 1.5 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]

cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 1.8 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance

cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 2 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
cn:
攻击时有10%几率赋予600范围内随机一座防御塔2点经验值

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
