cn: 智慧启迪

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to grant experience to a random nearby tower.
cn: 攻击时有几率赋予附近随机防御塔经验值。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to grant 2.2 experience to a random tower in 600 range
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
cn:
攻击时有10%几率赋予600范围内随机一座防御塔2.2点经验值

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 几率

en: Soulfire
cn: 魂火灼烧

en: Chance to burn hit creeps, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击有几率引燃目标造成持续法术伤害。

en:
20% chance to burn hit creeps, dealing 1000 spell damage per second for 5 seconds. This effect stacks.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+40 spell damage
cn:
20%几率灼烧命中的敌方单位，每秒造成1000点法术伤害,持续5秒，效果可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 几率
+40 法术伤害

en: Soul Consumption
cn: 灵魂吞噬

en: When a creep dies under the effect of [color=GOLD]Soulfire[/color], [color=GOLD]Soulfire[/color] spreads to nearby creeps.
cn: 被[color=GOLD]魂火灼烧[/color]杀死的单位会扩散效果。

en: When a creep dies under the effect of [color=GOLD]Soulfire[/color], [color=GOLD]Soulfire[/color] spreads to nearby creeps within 200 range. The creep is consumed by the tower, restoring 5 mana.
cn: 被[color=GOLD]魂火灼烧[/color]杀死的敌方单位会将该效果扩散至200范围内其他单位，同时防御塔恢复5点法力值。

en: Uncontrollable Flames
cn: 失控烈焰

en: The tower attacks a random creep in range with each attack.
cn: 每次攻击随机选择范围内敌方单位。

en: The tower attacks a random creep in range with each attack.
cn: 该防御塔每次攻击都会选择范围内随机敌方单位作为目标。

en: Lingering Flame
cn: 余烬灼烧

en: Inflicts hit creeps with [color=GOLD]Lingering Flame[/color], dealing spell damage over time.
cn: 使被击中的敌方单位感染[color=GOLD]余烬灼烧[/color]，持续造成法术伤害。

en:
Inflicts hit creeps with [color=GOLD]Lingering Flame[/color], dealing 100 spell damage per second for 10 seconds. This effect stacks.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 spell damage
cn:
使被击中的敌方单位感染[color=GOLD]余烬灼烧[/color]，每秒造成100点法术伤害，持续10秒。该效果可叠加。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 法术伤害

en: Feed the Flames
cn: 焰能补给

en: This tower fuels itself in various ways, restoring mana and raising maximum mana.
cn: 该防御塔通过多种方式自我充能，恢复法力值并提升最大法力值。

en:
This tower fuels itself in various ways. Gains 1% of maximum mana on attack. Whenever [color=GOLD]Lingering Flame[/color] deals damage, there is a 20% chance to gain 0.5% of maximum mana per stack. On kill, gains 4% of total mana and maximum mana is increased by 10.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
cn:
该防御塔通过多种方式自我充能。攻击时恢复1% 最大法力值；当[color=GOLD]余烬灼烧[/color]造成伤害时，每层效果有20% 几率额外恢复0.5% 最大法力值。击杀时，恢复4% 总法力值，并永久增加10点最大法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率

en: Lacerate
cn: 撕裂

en: This tower's attacks and abilities deal [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage. [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] splits normal damage into [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] and [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage over time.
cn: 该防御塔的攻击与技能造成[color=GOLD]撕裂[/color]伤害，将常规伤害分割为[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]与[color=9370db]腐化[/color]持续伤害。

en:
This tower's attacks and abilities deal [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage. 50% of [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage is dealt immediately as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage. 100% of the remaining damage is dealt as [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] damage over 5 seconds. If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new duration. Damage over time is based on the target's movement speed, with faster movement increasing the damage dealt.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage over time
cn:
该防御塔的攻击与技能造成[color=GOLD]撕裂[/color]伤害，其中50%立即转化为[color=d2b48c]物理[/color]伤害，剩余伤害的100%在5秒内持续转化为[color=9370db]腐化[/color]伤害。重复施加时将剩余伤害在新的持续时间内继续叠加。持续伤害将基于目标单位的移动速度加权计算，速度越快伤害越高。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 持续伤害

en: Glaive Storm
cn: 刃轮风暴

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to throw an additional bouncing glaive at the target.
cn: 攻击时有几率向目标投掷额外弹射刃轮。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a 5% chance to throw an additional bouncing glaive at the target, dealing 50% of attack damage as [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage before returning to the tower. When the glaive returns, it bounces to a new random target within attack range. Maximum of 20 hits.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% chance
+2% damage
cn:
攻击命中敌方单位时5%几率投掷额外刃轮，造成攻击力50%的[color=GOLD]撕裂[/color]伤害后返回。返回时将弹射至攻击范围内新目标，最多弹射20次。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 触发几率
+2% 伤害

en: Bounder
cn: 刃轮共振

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to throw a glaive at one of the [color=GOLD]Glaivesaws[/color].
cn: 攻击时有几率向[color=GOLD]回旋刃轮[/color]发射共振刃轮。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 15% chance to throw a glaive towards one of the [color=GOLD]Glaivesaws[/color]. The glaive will bounce to another [color=GOLD]Glaivesaw[/color], dealing 250% of attack damage as [color=GOLD]Lacerate[/color] damage to enemies it passes through.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+6% damage
cn:
攻击时15%几率向[color=GOLD]回旋刃轮[/color]发射刃轮，弹射期间对路径敌人造成攻击力250%的[color=GOLD]撕裂[/color]伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+6% 伤害

en: Arcane Attraction
cn: 奥术牵引

en: Applies [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] to hit creeps. After applying [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color], the tower also and regenerates mana.
cn: 对命中的敌方单位施加[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]并回复法力值。

en:
Applies [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] to hit creeps. After applying [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color], the tower also generates 1 mana for each stack of [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] on all creeps. When a creep dies, all stacks of [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] on it will distribute evenly to nearby targets within 500 range and deal 20% attack damage per stack transferred. [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] lasts indefinitely.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+10 range
+0.4% attack damage per stack
cn:
攻击命中时施加[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]。每层[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]使防御塔每秒回复1点法力值。敌方单位死亡时，其[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]层数将平均分配给500范围内目标，每转移1层数造成20%攻击力伤害。[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]永久持续。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+10 作用范围
每层+0.4% 攻击力伤害

en: Surge
cn: 能量涌动

en: Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to send a surge of energy, dealing attack damage and jumping to nearby creeps.
cn: 攻击时有几率释放能量涌动，造成攻击伤害并弹射。

en:
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to send a surge of energy, which deals 200% of this tower's attack damage. The chance of the surge is equal to 1% per [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] stack on the hit creep. The surge also attempts to jump to another creep within 750 range. At each jump, the chance to jump is calculated based on the next target's [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] stacks. Can only hit each target once and benefits from [color=GOLD]Mana Storm's[/color] damage bonus.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.02% chance per stack
+4% attack damage
cn:
攻击命中时，根据目标[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]层数获得等同层数百分比的触发几率（每层+1%）。能量涌动造成200%攻击力伤害，并可在750范围内弹射，每次弹射基于新目标的[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]层数计算触发几率。单个目标仅受1次伤害，且受[color=GOLD]法力风暴[/color]加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每层+0.02% 触发几率
+4% 攻击伤害

en: Mana Storm
cn: 法力风暴

en: Attacks hit up to 2 additional enemies within attack range.
cn: 攻击额外命中范围内2个目标并消耗法力强化伤害。

en:
Attacks hit up to 2 additional enemies within attack range and consume all mana to deal [color=GOLD][mana consumed]%[/color] increased attack damage. [color=GOLD]Mana Storm[/color] gains an additional attack for every 75 mana consumed. If at least 100 mana is consumed, the tower's multicrit is increased by 3 for 2 seconds. If there are less creeps than attacks, the remaining attacks will hit the main target.
 
Note that extra hits from [color=GOLD]Mana Storm[/color] do not trigger [color=GOLD]Attraction[/color] or [color=GOLD]Surge[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1 mana per extra attack
cn:
攻击额外命中2个目标，消耗全部法力值提升[color=GOLD][消耗法力值]%[/color]攻击伤害。每消耗75法力获得1次额外攻击。消耗超过100法力时，2秒内多重暴击+3。目标不足时将剩余攻击作用于主目标。

注：额外攻击不触发[color=GOLD]牵引[/color]与[color=GOLD]能量涌动[/color]。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每次额外攻击-1 法力消耗

en: Icicles
cn: 冰锥

en: Chance to create [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] when hitting creeps. [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] increase tower's attack damage and mana regen. When [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] are fired they deal [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage.
cn: 攻击敌方单位时有几率生成[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]。[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]可提升防御塔的攻击力与法力回复。发射[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]时会造成[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害。

en:
15% chance to create an [color=GOLD]Icicle[/color] when hitting a creep. [color=GOLD]Icy Bombardments[/color] also has a 5% chance to create an [color=GOLD]Icicle[/color]. [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] are stored and passively increase attack damage by 5% and mana regen by 0.5 mana per second each. Maximum of 5 [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color]. At maximum [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color], any extra [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] created are instantly fired at the target. Each [color=GOLD]Icicle[/color] deals 3000 [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage and permanently increases the damage dealt by future [color=GOLD]Icicles[/color] from this tower by 2%.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance on attack
+0.1% chance on Icy Bombardment
+80 damage
+1 max icicle every 5 levels
cn:
攻击敌方单位时有15%几率生成一枚[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]。[color=GOLD]寒冰轰击[/color]有5%额外几率生成[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]。每枚[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]可被动提升5%攻击力与0.5点/秒法力回复，最多储存5枚。当[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]达到上限时，新生成的[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]将立即射向目标，每枚造成3000点[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害，并永久提升该防御塔后续生成的[color=GOLD]冰锥[/color]2%伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 攻击触发几率
+0.1% 寒冰轰击触发几率
+80 伤害
每5级 +1 最大冰锥数

en: Icy Bombardment
cn: 寒冰轰击

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to fire a projectile at a random point which deals AoE [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向随机位置发射轰击，造成范围[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 15% chance to fire a projectile at a random point within 150 range of the attacked creep that deals 25% of current attack damage as [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage in 200 AoE splash. Each additional projectile has a 30% chance to fire another, up to a maximum of 4 per attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% initial chance
+0.4% additional chance
+0.6% damage
cn:
攻击时有15%几率向被攻击敌方单位周围150范围内随机位置发射轰击，对200范围的敌人造成当前防御塔25%攻击力的[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害。每发轰击有30%几率触发新的轰击，单次攻击最多触发4次。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 基础触发几率
+0.4% 连击触发几率
+0.6% 伤害

en: Frostburn
cn: 霜燃

en: This tower's attacks and abilities deal [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage. The damage is split into attack damage and spell damage over time.
cn: 该防御塔的攻击与技能会造成[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害，该伤害由瞬时攻击伤害与持续法术伤害组成。

en:
This tower's attacks and abilities deal [color=GOLD]Frostburn[/color] damage. 50% of the damage is dealt immediately as attack damage. 100% of the remaining damage is dealt as spell damage over 5 seconds. If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new duration.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage over time
cn:
该防御塔的攻击与技能会造成[color=GOLD]霜燃[/color]伤害。50%伤害作为瞬时攻击伤害生效，剩余伤害的100%转化为持续5秒的法术伤害。若效果重复施加，剩余伤害将累加至新的持续时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 持续伤害

en: Eat the Dead
cn: 吞噬亡者

en: Kraken gains a permanent increase in base attack damage on kill.
cn: 克拉肯消灭敌人时永久提升基础攻击力。

en:
Kraken gains a permanent increase in base attack damage on kill:
+0.5% for mass creeps
+1% for normal creeps
+2% for champions
+2% for air creeps

cn: 周期性攻击附近地面单位并造成眩晕。

Every 4 seconds, the Kraken attacks random ground creeps with 6 tentacles. Each tentacle deals 15% of Kraken's current attack damage as [color=d2b48cff]Physical[/color] damage and stuns for 0.4 seconds.

en: Acid Skull
cn: 酸蚀颅骨

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to throw an [color=GOLD]Acid Skull[/color] onto the main target and nearby units, dealing spell damage.
cn: 攻击时有几率向主目标及周围单位投掷[color=GOLD]酸蚀颅骨[/color]，造成法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 25% chance to throw an [color=GOLD]Acid Skull[/color] onto the main target, dealing 1800 spell damage to the main target and 1440 spell damage to targets in 225 range and reducing their armor by 5 over 4.5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+5% spell damage
+0.4% chance

+0.4% 触发几率

cn: 有几率在命中单位上方砸下椰子，造成范围法术伤害与眩晕。

en: Channel Energy
cn: 能量引导

en: Whenever this tower is hit by a friendly spell, the caster of that spell will receive experience and this tower will gain bonus attack damage.
cn: 每当本防御塔受到友方技能命中时，该技能释放者将获得经验值，且本防御塔获得额外攻击力。

en:
Whenever this tower is hit by a friendly spell, the caster of that spell will be granted 1 experience and this tower will gain 15% bonus attack damage for 10 seconds. This effect stacks up to 15 times, but new stacks will not refresh the duration of old ones.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% attack damage
+0.1 seconds duration
cn:
每当该防御塔受到友方技能命中时，施法者将获得1点经验值，且本防御塔获得15%攻击力加成持续10秒。此效果最多叠加15层，新叠加层数不会刷新旧层数持续时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 攻击力
+0.1 秒 持续时间

en: Channel Energy
cn: 能量引导

en:
Whenever this tower is hit by a friendly spell, the caster of that spell will be granted 2 experience and this tower will gain 20% bonus attack damage for 12 seconds. This effect stacks up to 15 times, but new stacks will not refresh the duration of old ones.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% attack damage
+0.1 seconds duration

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 攻击力
+0.1 秒 持续时间

en: Cursed Attack
cn: 诅咒攻击

en: Chance to deal additional spell damage to hit creeps and weaken them, reducing movement speed and increasing spell damage received.
cn: 命中时有几率对敌方单位造成额外法术伤害并削弱其能力，降低移动速度，并增加其受到的法术伤害。

+10 法术伤害

en: Inject Parasite
cn: 寄生注入

en: Chance to inject hit creeps with parasites. Each second the creep will suffer spell damage and will permanently lose a portion of its armor.
cn: 命中时有几率向敌方单位注入寄生虫。每秒对其造成法术伤害并永久降低其护甲值。

en:
30% chance to inject hit creeps with a parasite that lives for 10 seconds. Each second the creep will suffer 500 spell damage and will permanently lose 2% armor. When an infected creep dies, Spider Queen will gain 0.75% permanent bonus attack damage and the parasite will attempt to jump to another host in 500 range.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance 
+100 spell damage
+0.08% armor reduction
cn:
命中时有30%几率向敌方单位注入存活10秒的寄生虫。每秒对其造成500点法术伤害并永久降低2%护甲值。当被感染的敌方单位死亡时，本防御塔获得0.75%永久攻击力加成，且寄生虫会尝试跳跃至500范围内另一目标。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]

+0.08% 护甲削减

cn: 点燃

en: Debuffs hit creeps. Whenever a debuffed creep takes attack damage it receives additional spell damage.
cn: 对命中的敌方单位施加负面状态。当受负面状态影响的单位受到攻击伤害时，将承受额外法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.05 seconds duration
+0.1% damage as spell damage

cn: 过载

en: Deals [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage and slow hit creeps. Effect is stronger for creeps far away.
cn: 对命中的敌方单位造成[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]类型伤害并减速。目标距离越远效果越强。

en: Deals [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage and slows hit creeps for 1.5 seconds. Damage is equal to [color=GOLD][distance to the target x 12][/color] and is affected by bonuses to tower's attack damage. The further away the target is, the more it will be slowed. The maximum slow value is 30%.
cn: 造成[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]伤害并使命中的敌方单位减速1.5秒。伤害值为[color=GOLD][与目标距离×12][/color]，受防御塔攻击力加成影响。目标距离越远减速效果越强，最大减速幅度为30%。

cn: 命中时降低敌方单位移动速度并有几率使其眩晕。

+26 spell damage
+0.65% slow

en: Goldrush
cn: 黄金狂热

en: The miner has a chance on attack to go into a [color=GOLD]Goldrush[/color]. [color=GOLD]Goldrush[/color] increases attack speed and grants gold whenever this tower hits a creep.
cn: 攻击时有几率进入[color=GOLD]黄金狂热[/color]状态。[color=GOLD]黄金狂热[/color]提升攻击速度并在命中敌方单位时获得金币。

en:
The miner has a 20% chance on attack to go into a [color=GOLD]Goldrush[/color]. [color=GOLD]Goldrush[/color] increases attack speed by more than 20% depending on the player's gold and grants 1 gold whenever this tower hits a creep. Goldrush lasts 5 seconds. Cannot retrigger while active!
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Check multiboard to view exact attack speed bonus
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.04 gold gained
+0.1 seconds duration
cn:
攻击时有20%几率进入[color=GOLD]黄金狂热[/color]状态。该状态根据玩家当前金币数量加权，提升至少20%攻击速度，且每次命中敌方单位时获取1金币，持续5秒。生效期间无法重复触发！

[color=GOLD]提示：[/color]查看防御塔信息面板以确认攻速加成

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.04 金币获取量
+0.1 秒持续时间

cn:

en: Dire Instinct
cn: 致命直觉

en: This tower has extra luck with multicrit compared to other towers. This ability affects only normal attacks.
cn: 该防御塔在多重暴击计算上拥有特殊机制，仅影响普通攻击。

en:
This tower has extra luck with multicrit compared to other towers. This ability affects only normal attacks.
 
[color=ORANGE]Details:[/color]
This tower overrides normal logic for calculating attack criticals. It rolls for every multicrit even if an earlier one fails. In addition, multicrit chance reduction occurs only on successful critical rolls. At starting stats, this tower is more likely to get crits than non-crits!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
At level 25, rolls again for failed multicrits, which boosts multicrits even further.
cn:
相比其他防御塔，该塔在多重暴击计算上拥有特殊机制。仅影响普通攻击。

[color=ORANGE]机制说明：[/color]
攻击时即使前一次暴击未触发仍会持续检定多重暴击。此外，多重暴击率衰减仅在实际触发暴击后生效。根据预估，该塔触发暴击的几率高于未触发几率。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
25级时为未触发的多重暴击进行二次检定，大幅提升多重暴击率。

en: Bone Shatter
cn: 碎骨飞刃

en: Creeps killed by this tower release a number of spiky shards in random directions that deal attack damage.
cn: 被该塔击杀的敌方单位会向随机方向迸发尖刺碎片，造成攻击伤害。

en:
Creeps killed by this tower release a number of spiky shards in random directions that deal 25% of this tower's attack damage to creeps they hit.
 
The number of shards is equivalent to this tower's multicrit count.
 
One shard can hit multiple creeps but will lose a fifth of its current damage after each hit.
cn:
被该塔击杀的敌方单位会迸发等同于多重暴击次数的尖刺碎片，每个碎片对命中的敌方单位造成该塔攻击力25%的伤害。

单枚碎片可命中多个目标，但每次命中后伤害衰减五分之一。

en: Embers
cn: 余烬迸发

en: Every second, causes nearby Common towers to launch embers at random creeps in the attack range of this tower.
cn: 每秒使附近普通防御塔向该塔攻击范围内的随机敌方单位发射余烬。

en:
Every second, causes Common towers in 300 range to launch embers at random creeps in the attack range of this tower. Embers deal 12% of the Common tower's attack damage as [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage.
 
Note that ember damage is dealt by this tower, not the Common tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.48% damage
cn:
每秒使300范围内的普通稀有度的防御塔向该塔攻击范围内的随机敌方单位发射余烬。余烬造成受影响防御塔12%攻击力的[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害。

注：余烬伤害由该塔而非受影响防御塔结算。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.48% 伤害

en: Nova Storm
cn: 冰霜风暴

cn: 攻击时有几率对防御塔塔周敌方单位释放冰霜新星，造成范围法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 25% chance to hit 3 creeps in 900 range around the tower with ice novas. A nova hits all creeps in 200 AoE dealing 350 spell damage at the centre, dropping off to 50% at the sides. Also slows by 12.5% for 4 seconds.

+1 nova at lvl 15 and 25

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+17.5 法术伤害
+0.5% 触发几率
+0.5% 减速效果
15级和25级时+1 冰霜新星数量

en: Plague
cn: 瘟疫感染

en: Infects hit creeps with [color=GOLD]Plague[/color] which deals spell damage over time.
cn: 用[color=GOLD]瘟疫[/color]感染命中的敌方单位，造成持续法术伤害。

en:
Infects hit creeps with [color=GOLD]Plague[/color]. [color=GOLD]Plague[/color] deals 750 spell damage per second and lasts 5 seconds. Every 1.5 seconds [color=GOLD]Plague[/color] can spread to a creep in 250 range around the infected creep. If an infected creep is infected again, the duration will refresh and the damage is increased by 375.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+30 damage
+0.2 seconds duration
+15 damage per rebuff
cn:
用[color=GOLD]瘟疫[/color]感染敌方单位，每秒造成750点法术伤害，持续5秒。每1.5秒[color=GOLD]瘟疫[/color]可向感染体250范围内单位扩散。重复感染会刷新持续时间，并使伤害叠加375点。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+30 法术伤害
+0.2秒 持续时间
每次叠加时+15 法术伤害

en: Army of the Damned
cn: 亡灵军团

en: If there is a corpse in range, this tower will extract its soul increasing its attack speed and attack damage. This will also increase the rate of spread of [color=GOLD]Plague[/color].
cn: 范围内存在尸体时，该塔将汲取灵魂提升攻速与攻击力，并加速[color=GOLD]瘟疫[/color]传播。

en:
Every 3 seconds, if there is a corpse within 1150 range this tower will extract its soul, increasing its attack speed and attack damage by 5%. This will also increase the rate of spread of [color=GOLD]Plague[/color] by 10%. This buff lasts 20 seconds and stacks, but new stacks will not refresh the duration of old ones.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4 seconds duration
cn:
每3秒检测1150范围内的尸体，汲取灵魂使攻击速度与攻击力提高5%，同时使[color=GOLD]瘟疫[/color]传播速率提高10%。该增益持续20秒，可重复叠加，但新层数不会刷新旧层数持续时间。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4秒 持续时间

en: Dreadlord Slash
cn: 恐惧魔王斩击

en: Deals additional spell damage to hit creeps at the cost of some mana.
cn: 消耗法力值对命中的敌方单位造成额外法术伤害。

en:
Deals additional spell damage to hit creeps. The damage is equal to tower's max mana and costs 80 mana on each attack.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+4% spell damage
cn:
造成等同于该塔最大法力值的额外法术伤害，每次攻击消耗80点法力值。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+4% 法术伤害

en: Bloodsucker
cn: 嗜血本能

en: Dreadlord gains extra power with every kill.
cn: 恐惧魔王通过击杀获取额外力量。

en: The Dreadlord is hungry. For every kill he gains 0.5% attack speed and 10 maximum mana. The mana bonus caps at 2000. Both bonuses are permanent.
cn: 恐惧魔王饥渴难耐。每次击杀获得0.5%攻击速度与10点法力上限（法力值上限增益上限2000）。所有增益均为永久效果。

en: Icy Curse
cn: 极寒诅咒

en: Increases debuff duration of hit creeps.
cn: 延长命中的敌方单位所受负面状态持续时间。

en: Increases debuff duration of hit creeps by 30% for 5 seconds.
cn: 命中时使敌方单位所受负面状态持续时间延长30%，持续5秒。

en: Entangle
cn: 缠绕根须

en: Chance to entangle hit creeps. Entangled creeps are immobile and suffer spell damage over time. Cannot entangle air or boss units.
cn: 命中时有几率缠绕敌方单位，使其无法移动并承受持续法术伤害。无法作用于空中单位或首领。

en:
12.5% chance to entangle hit creeps for 1.5 seconds. Entangled creeps are immobile and suffer 120 spell damage per second. Cannot entangle air or boss units.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2% chance to entangle
+6 spell damage per second
cn:
命中时有12.5%几率缠绕敌方单位1.5秒，期间使目标无法移动并每秒受到120点法术伤害。无法作用于空中单位或首领。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2% 触发几率
+6 每秒法术伤害

en: Wrath of the Storm
cn: 风暴之怒

en: The enormous wrath of the dead warrior flows out of this tower undirected. So the tower only hits a random target in range each attack.
cn: 狂暴力量不受控地从身上涌出，每次攻击仅能命中范围内随机目标。

en: The enormous wrath of the dead warrior flows out of this tower undirected. So the tower only hits a random target in range each attack.
cn: 狂暴力量不受控地从身上涌出，每次攻击仅能命中范围内随机目标。

en: Planeshift
cn: 位面跃迁

en: On attack the Gate releases a magical falcon at the main target. The falcon deals [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage and bounces to multiple targets.
cn: 攻击时，向主目标释放魔法猎鹰。猎鹰造成[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]类型伤害并弹射多个目标。

en:
On attack the Gate releases a magical falcon at the main target.
The falcon deals [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color] damage equal to the Gate's current attack damage and bounces until it runs out of damage. Each bounce deals 5% less damage.
There is a maximum of 1 falcon summoned at a time and a 20% chance to ignore the maximum.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-0.1% damage loss per bounce
+1 falcon every 8 levels
cn:
攻击时向主目标释放魔法猎鹰。

猎鹰造成等同于防御塔当前攻击力的[color=1e90ffff]能量[/color]类型伤害，每次弹射伤害衰减5%。
最多同时存在1只猎鹰，有20%几率无视数量限制。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
每次弹射伤害衰减减少0.1%
每8级+1 猎鹰数量

en: Essence of the Mortals
cn: 凡物精魄

en: When the Garden kills a [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color], [color=8fbc8fff]Orc[/color] and [color=d2b48cff]Humanoid[/color] creep, its lifeforce is captured in the fountain. The lifeforce is used to deal extra spell damage.
cn: 当击杀[color=32cd32ff]自然[/color]、[color=8fbc8fff]兽族[/color]和[color=d2b48cff]人族[/color]敌方单位时，其生命精华将被储存，增加额外法术伤害。

en:
When the Garden kills a [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color], [color=8fbc8fff]Orc[/color] and [color=d2b48cff]Humanoid[/color] creep, its lifeforce is captured in the fountain. Whenever the Garden attacks, it deals [color=GOLD][current spawn level x 2][/color] spell damage, for each lifeforce stored in the fountain, to the main target. Maximum of 5 stored lifeforce.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 maximum lifeforce
cn:
当击杀[color=32cd32ff]自然[/color]、[color=8fbc8fff]兽族[/color]和[color=d2b48cff]人族[/color]敌方单位时，其生命精华将被储存。每次攻击时，根据储存的生命精华数量对主目标造成[color=GOLD][当前波次等级×2][/color]点法术伤害。最多储存5份生命精华。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1 最大生命精华

en: Toxic Vapor
cn: 毒雾弥漫

en: On attack, this tower has a chance to apply a debuff to the main target, dealing spell damage over time.
cn: 攻击时有几率对主目标施加负面状态，造成持续法术伤害。

en:
On attack, this tower has a 30% chance to apply a debuff to the the main target that deals 200 spell damage per second. Lasts for 10 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+8 spell damage per second
cn:
攻击时有30%几率对主目标施加负面状态，每秒造成200点法术伤害持续10秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+8 每秒法术伤害

+88 每秒法术伤害

en: Burn
cn: 灼烧烈焰

en: Burns hit creeps. Whenever a [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] tower hits a burning creep, the damage will be increased by a flat amount.
cn: 引燃命中的敌方单位。[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]防御塔攻击燃烧目标时获得固定数值的伤害提升。

en:
Burns hit creeps. Whenever a [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] tower hits a burning creep, the damage will be increased by a flat amount. The amount of bonus damage starts at 0 and increases on every hit. Towers from this family increase the damage by 1, any other [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers by 0.3. If the creep dies, it explodes and deals 49 spell damage to nearby creeps in a range of 200.
 
Lasts 5 seconds after the last attack of a [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 damage gain (Same family towers)
+0.03 damage gain (Other [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color] towers)
+0.12 seconds burn duration
cn:
引燃命中的敌方单位。当[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]防御塔攻击燃烧目标时，伤害值从0开始逐次递增：与本防御塔同类型的塔每次+1，其他火系防御塔每次+0.3。目标死亡时爆炸，对200范围内敌方单位造成49点法术伤害。

效果在[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]防御塔攻击后刷新持续时间，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1 伤害 （同类型塔）
+0.03 伤害 （其他[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]塔）
+0.12秒 燃烧持续时间

en: Rocket Strike
cn: 火箭轰击

en: Whenever this tower attacks, it has a chance to deal AoE spell damage around the main target.
cn: 攻击时有几率对主目标周围造成范围法术伤害。

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 30% chance to fire a rocket towards the main target. On impact it deals 400 spell damage in a 150 AoE. Deals 125% damage to mass creeps.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% chance
+10 damage
cn:
攻击时有30%几率向主目标发射火箭，命中时对150范围内造成400点法术伤害，对杂兵造成125%伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 触发几率
+10 法术伤害

en: Cold Feet
cn: 寒冰足迹

en: On attack this tower decreases its attack speed while increasing its attack damage.
cn: 攻击时降低自身攻速同时提升攻击力。

en:
On attack this tower cools down decreasing its attack speed by 5% while increasing attack damage it deals by 20%. The cold lasts for 6 seconds and stacks up to 10 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1% attack speed reduction at level 15 and 25
cn:
攻击时进入冷却状态，攻击速度降低5%但攻击力提升20%。该状态持续6秒，最多叠加10层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
15级和25级时攻速衰减减少1%

en: Glacial Wrath
cn: 寒霜之怒

en: Slows hit creeps and has a chance to stun.
cn: 命中时降低敌方单位移动速度并有几率使其眩晕。

en:
Slows hit creeps by 7% for 3 seconds. There's also a 2% chance to deal 100 spell damage and stun the creep for 0.8 seconds. Whenever the stun fails to happen, the chance is increased by 2%. Bonus chance resets when stun suceeds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2 spell damage
+0.35% slow
cn:
命中时使敌方单位移动速度降低7%，持续3秒，同时有2%几率对其造成2150点法术伤害并眩晕0.8秒。若眩晕未触发，则下次触发几率提高2%。成功触发眩晕后额外几率重置。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2 法术伤害
+0.35% 减速效果

en: Dire Instinct
cn: 致命直觉

en: This tower has extra luck with multicrit compared to other towers. This ability affects only normal attacks.
cn: 该防御塔在多重暴击计算上拥有特殊机制，仅影响普通攻击。

en:
This tower has extra luck with multicrit compared to other towers. This ability affects only normal attacks.
 
[color=ORANGE]Details:[/color]
This tower overrides normal logic for calculating attack criticals. It rolls for every multicrit even if an earlier one fails. In addition, multicrit chance reduction occurs only on successful critical rolls. At starting stats, this tower is more likely to get crits than non-crits!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
At level 25, rolls again for failed multicrits, which boosts multicrits even further.
cn:
相比其他防御塔，该塔在多重暴击计算上拥有特殊机制。仅影响普通攻击。

[color=ORANGE]机制说明：[/color]
攻击时即使前一次暴击未触发仍会持续检定多重暴击。此外，多重暴击率衰减仅在实际触发暴击后生效。根据预估，该塔触发暴击的几率高于未触发的几率。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
25级时为未触发的多重暴击进行二次检定，大幅提升多重暴击率。

en: Bone Shatter
cn: 碎骨飞刃

en: Creeps killed by this tower release a number of spiky shards in random directions that deal attack damage.
cn: 被该塔击杀的敌方单位会向随机方向迸发尖刺碎片，造成攻击伤害。

en:
Creeps killed by this tower release a number of spiky shards in random directions that deal 25% of this tower's attack damage to creeps they hit.
 
The number of shards is equivalent to this tower's multicrit count.
 
One shard can hit multiple creeps but will lose a fifth of its current damage after each hit.
cn:
被该塔击杀的敌方单位会迸发等同于多重暴击次数的尖刺碎片，每个碎片对命中的敌方单位造成该塔攻击力25%的伤害。

单枚碎片可命中多个目标，但每次命中后伤害衰减五分之一。

en: Embers
cn: 余烬迸发

en: Every second, causes nearby Common towers to launch embers at random creeps in the attack range of this tower.
cn: 每秒使附近普通防御塔向该塔攻击范围内的随机敌方单位发射余烬。

en:
Every second, causes Common towers in 300 range to launch embers at random creeps in the attack range of this tower. Embers deal 8% of the Common tower's attack damage as [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage.
 
Note that ember damage is dealt by this tower, not the Common tower.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.16% damage
cn:
每秒使300范围内的普通稀有度的防御塔向该塔攻击范围内的随机敌方单位发射余烬。余烬造成受影响防御塔8%攻击力的[color=6495edff]元素[/color]类型伤害。

注：余烬伤害由该塔而非受影响防御塔结算。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.16% 伤害

cn: 萨满仪式

en: Performs a shamanistic ritual on a nearby tower, granting it 20% more experience gain and 10% more attack damage for 10 seconds.   [color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color] +0.8% experience +0.2% damage
cn: 对附近的一座防御塔施加萨满的祝福，增加其20%经验值获取率和10%攻击伤害，持续10秒。[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color] +0.8% 经验值 +0.2% 伤害

en: Siphon Knowledge
cn: 知识汲取

en: Removes a flat 15 to 60 exp from a random tower in range and gives it to the caster.
cn: 随机从附近的一座防御塔上扣除15~60经验值并转移至自身。

en: Purchase an Item
cn: 物品采购

en:
Spend a charge to buy a random item for 500 gold. The item will be of level 14-25 and uncommon or higher rarity.
 
Gains a charge every 5th wave, up to a maximum of 5 charges. This ability is not affected by item quality.
cn:
消耗1层物品充能，以500金购买随机物品。该物品等级为14至25级，品质不低于罕见。

每5波获得1层充能，最多储存5层。此技能不受物品品质影响。

en: Transfer Experience
cn: 经验转移

en: Transfers a flat 30 experience from this tower to another one.
cn: 将本防御塔的30点经验值转移至另一防御塔。

en: Strength Boost
cn: 力量增幅

en:
Upon activation, towers in 350 range receive 10% bonus base damage for 4 seconds. Costs 1 charge.
 
Regenerates 3 charges every 40 seconds up to a maximum of 10 charges.
cn:
消耗1层充能，使350范围内的防御塔获得+10%基础攻击力，持续4秒。

每40秒恢复3层充能，最多可拥有10层充能。

en: Speed Boost
cn: 迅捷增幅

en:
Upon activation, towers in 350 range receive 10% bonus attack speed for 4 seconds. Costs 1 charge.
 
Regenerates 3 charges every 40 seconds up to a maximum of 10 charges.
cn:
消耗1层充能，使350范围内的防御塔获得+10%攻击速度，持续4秒。

每40秒恢复3层充能，最多可拥有10层充能。

en: Insane Strength
cn: 狂暴之力

en: When this item is activated the next 12 attacks will deal 200% damage but the user becomes exhausted. When the user is exhausted it deals only 50% attack damage on the next 16 attacks.
cn: 使用后，接下来12次攻击造成200%伤害，随后进入疲乏状态，后续16次攻击仅造成50%伤害。

en: Cripple
cn: 致残

en:
This artifact slows the attacked creep by 10% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% slow
cn:
使被攻击的敌方单位移动速度降低10%，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4%减速效果

en: Activate Trap
cn: 激活陷阱

en:
Every 8 seconds this trap stuns 3 creeps in 1000 range for 0.5 seconds.
 
Level Bonus:
+0.5 seconds stun at level 25
cn:
每8秒使1000范围内的3个敌方单位眩晕0.5秒。

等级加成：
等级25时眩晕时间+0.5秒

en: Pay With Blood
cn: 血偿

en: Every 10 seconds, the user of this item loses 2 experience.
cn: 该物品的持有者每10秒损失2点经验值。

en: Multishot
cn: 多重射击

en: Attacks up to 3 targets at the same time.
cn: 可同时攻击最多3个目标。

en: Crush
cn: 碾压

en: Whenever the carrier hits a stunned creep, it deals 20% of its current attack damage as spell damage in 250 AoE around the target.
cn: 当携带者击中处于眩晕状态的敌方单位时，将对目标周围250范围内造成相当于当前攻击伤害20%的法术伤害。

en: Ancient Rage
cn: 太古狂怒

en: On attack, this tower will enrage for 1.5 seconds gaining 0.5% increased attack speed 1% attack damage and 0.25% spell damage. This effect stacks up to 120 times.
cn: 每次攻击时，该防御塔将进入1.5秒的狂暴状态，获得攻击速度提升0.5%、攻击伤害提高1%以及法术伤害增强0.25%。该效果最多可叠加120层。

en: Power of the Sword
cn: 剑之威能

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it decreases the armor of the target by 5 or 10 for 5 seconds, with equal chances for both values.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.2 armor reduction.
cn:
当携带者击中主要目标时，将使目标的护甲降低5或10点，持续5秒，两种数值触发概率相同。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.2护甲削减。

en: Magic Weapon
cn: 魔能武器

en: Every 5th spell cast will deal critical spell damage. The crit will be applied only to the first instance of spell damage for spells which deal spell damage multiple times.
cn: 每第五次施放的法术将造成暴击法术伤害。对于可造成多段法术伤害的技能，暴击效果仅作用于首段伤害。

en: Blindingly Polished Armor
cn: 耀金战甲

en: This item shines so searingly that it grants [color=GOLD][carrier's goldcost / 100]%[/color] bonus attack damage.
cn: 该物品的炽烈光芒使其获得[color=GOLD][携带者的价格/100]%[/color]额外攻击伤害

en: Rich
cn: 财富

en: Whilst carried by a tower, this item increases the interest rate of the player by [color=GOLD][0.4 x carrier's goldcost / 2500]%[/color].
cn: 当被防御塔携带时，该物品使玩家的利率提升[color=GOLD][0.4 x 携带者的价格 / 2500]%[/color]。

en: Celestial Wisdom
cn: 天界智慧

en: Grants the wielder 3 experience every 15 seconds.
cn: 携带者每15秒获得3点经验值。

en: Enlighten
cn: 启迪

en: Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 20% attack speed adjusted chance to make the target give 5% more experience. This modification is permanent and it stacks.
cn: 每当携带者命中主目标时，有攻速加权后的20%几率使目标永久额外提供5%经验值。该效果可叠加。

en: Spiderling Poison
cn: 蛛毒

en: Whenever the carrier attacks, there is a 25% attack speed adjusted chance to slow the main target by 5% for 4 seconds.
cn: 携带者每次攻击时，有攻速加权后的25%几率使主目标减速5%，持续4秒。

en: Purify
cn: 净化

en: Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 12.5% attack speed adjusted chance to cast a purifying beam of magic on the main target. The beam deals 250 spell damage to the first target and bounces to 2 other targets. Each bounce reduces the damage by 25%. [color=9370dbff]Undead[/color] and [color=8fbc8fff]Orc[/color] creeps also get stunned for 0.5 seconds when hit by this beam.
cn: 携带者每次攻击时，有攻速加权后的12.5%几率向主目标施放净化光束。光束对首个目标造成250法术伤害，并弹射至2个额外目标，每次弹射伤害降低25%。命中[color=9370dbff]亡灵[/color]和[color=8fbc8fff]兽族[/color]单位时还会使其眩晕0.5秒。

en: Greed Is Good
Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 20% attack speed adjusted chance to deal 10% of your current gold as spell damage to the main target.
cn: 携带者每次攻击时，有攻速加权后的20%几率对主目标造成相当于当前持有金币量10%的法术伤害。

en: Piercing Magic
cn: 穿透魔法

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=9370dbff]Sif[/color] armor by 25%. Bonus damage is dealt as spell damage.
cn: 对具有[color=9370dbff]城甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。额外伤害以法术伤害形式生效。

en: Resonance
cn: 共鸣

en: Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 10% attack speed adjusted chance to debuff the main target, increasing all spell damage dealt to it by 15% for 5 seconds
cn: 携带者每次攻击时，有攻速加权后的10%几率为主目标添加减益，使其受到的所有法术伤害提升15%，持续5秒。

en: Earth and Moon
cn: 地月之力

en:
Every 15 seconds, the carrier has its trigger chances increased by 25% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% trigger chance
cn:
每15秒，携带者的触发几率提升25%，持续5秒。
[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 触发几率

en: Hippogryph Young
cn: 幼年角鹰兽

en:
Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 15% attack speed adjusted chance to release a hippogryph that attacks the target, dealing 1250 spell damage in 200 range of the target.
 
Level Bonus:
+50 spell damage
cn:
携带者每次攻击时，有15%攻速加权几率召唤角鹰兽攻击目标，对目标200范围内造成1250法术伤害。
等级加成：
+50 法术伤害

en: Mana Charge
cn: 法力充能

en: On every 3rd attack the carrier regenerates 1% of its maximum mana.
cn: 每第3次攻击后，携带者恢复1%最大法力值。

en: Absorb
cn: 吸收

en: Whenever the carrier kills a creep it regenerates 3% of its maximum mana.
cn: 携带者每击杀一个单位，恢复3%最大法力值。

en: Deadly Poison
cn: 致命毒药

en:
color=GOLD][/color]
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it applies a deadly poison. Each second the poison deals 15% of the tower's base damage as spell damage to the target. The spell damage is always critical. Lasts 4 seconds.
cn: 携带者命中主目标时施加致命毒药，每秒造成相当于防御塔基础攻击力15%的法术伤害。该法术伤害必定暴击，持续4秒。

en: Energy Drainer
cn: 能量榨取者

en: Attacking with super speed comes at a price. The carrier burns 5% of its maximum mana per attack. Without mana it is unable to attack.
cn: 超速攻击需付出代价。携带者每次攻击消耗5%最大法力值。法力耗尽时将无法攻击。

en: Bartuc's Spirit
cn: 巴图克之魂

en:
Every 10th attack will release a burst of magic dealing 2000 spell damage in 300 AoE around the attack target.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+80 spell damage
cn:
每第10次攻击会释放魔法冲击，对攻击目标300范围内造成2000法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+80 法术伤害

en: Fervor
cn: 狂热

en:
Each subsequent attack on the same target increases the carrier's attack speed by 2% up to a maximum of 100%. Whenever the carrier acquires a new target, the bonus is reduced by 50%. The bonus is bound to the item. Works only on main targets.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-1% bonus reduction
cn:
对同一目标的每次后续攻击提升携带者2%攻速，最高叠加至100%。切换目标后加成减少50%。加成绑定于物品，仅对主目标生效。
[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-1% 加成衰减

en: Headhunt
cn: 猎头

en: Gives 2 additional gold for every creep the carrier kills.
cn: 携带者每击杀一个单位额外获得2金币。

en: Play With Me!
cn: 陪我玩！

en: Every 10 seconds the Toy Boy forces the tower to play with him, slowing attack speed of the tower by 50% for 2 seconds.
cn: 每10秒，玩具男孩会强制防御塔与其玩耍，使塔的攻速降低50%，持续2秒。

en: Bloodthirst
cn: 嗜血

en:
When the carrier kills a unit it becomes enraged for 3 seconds. While enraged, it has 20% bonus attack speed. Cannot retrigger while active!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% attack speed
cn:
携带者击杀单位后会狂暴3秒，狂暴期间攻速提升20%。效果生效期间无法重复触发。
 
[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 攻速

en: Learning to Kill
cn: 杀戮学习

en: The tower gains 1 additional experience for each kill.
cn: 每击杀一个单位额外获得1点经验值。

en: Learn
cn: 学习

en: Every 12 seconds the user of this item gains 1 experience.
cn: 每12秒，物品持有者获得1点经验值。

en: Infuse with Regeneration
cn: 灌注再生

en: Every 5th time the carrier deals damage with an attack, the damage is increased by its percentual mana regeneration.
cn: 每第5次攻击造成伤害时，伤害值将增加相当于自身法力回复百分比的数值。

en: Mining
cn: 采矿

en:
Every 15 seconds there is a 40% chance to find 3 gold.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+2% chance
+1 gold at lvl 25
cn:
每15秒有40%几率发现3金币。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+2% 几率
在25级时额外+1金币

en: Power Supply
cn: 能量供应

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it deals 8% of its goldcost as spell damage. This amount is attack speed adjusted.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1% goldcost as spell damage
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，造成相当于自身价格8%的法术伤害。该数值受攻速影响调整。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1% 价格转化为法术伤害

en: Attack!
cn: 进攻！

en:
Every attack there is a 2% attack speed adjusted chance to issue an attack order. When this happens, all towers in 350 range gain +50% attack speed for 4 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01% chance
+0.1 seconds duration
cn: 每次攻击有攻速加权后的2%几率发布进攻指令，触发时350范围内所有防御塔攻速提升50%，持续4秒。  [color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color] +0.01% 触发几率 +0.1 秒持续时间

en: Follow Up
cn: 乘胜追击

en:
Whenever this tower attacks, it has a 10% chance to gain 300% attack speed until next attack. The next attack will crit for sure but deals 50% less crit damage.

[color=GOLD]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
+4% attack speed
+1% crit damage
cn:
每当该塔攻击时，有10%几率获得300%攻击速度直至下次攻击。下次攻击必定暴击，但暴击伤害降低50%。

[color=GOLD]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 几率
+4% 攻击速度
+1% 暴击伤害

en: Mana Zap
cn: 法力抽取

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it zaps away 8 mana from the target. Amount zapped is adjusted by attack speed and range.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6 mana
cn:
携带者命中主目标时抽取8点法力值。抽取量按攻速和射程加权后计算。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6 法力值

en: Drunk!
cn: 醉酒

en: Makes the carrier miss 10% of attacks.
cn: 使携带者10%的攻击落空。

en: Drain Physical Energy
cn: 汲取物理能量

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, the carrier gains 2% attack speed and the target is slowed by 2%. Both effects are attack speed adjusted, last 5 seconds and stack up to 20 times.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.1 second duration
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，自身攻速提升2%且目标减速2%。两效果均受攻速加权后计算，持续5秒，最多叠加20层。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.1秒 持续时间

en: Wheel of Fortune
cn: 命运之轮

en: With every kill there is a 25% chance to spin the wheel. Every spin will either increase (66% fixed chance) or decrease (33% fixed chance) the item chance by 4%. Total range: -24% to +48%. The bonus is bound to the item.
cn: 每次击杀有25%几率转动轮盘。每次转动有66%固定几率提升4%物品获取率，或33%固定几率降低4%物品获取率。总波动范围：-24%至+48%。加成绑定于物品。

en: Silver Threads
cn: 银丝蛛网

en:
Whenever the carrier hits a creep, it has a 15% attack speed adjusted chance to cover the creep in a silvered web, increasing its item quality by 40% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% item quality
+0.1 seconds duration
cn:
携带者命中单位时，有15%攻速加权几率用银网覆盖目标，使其物品品质率提升40%，持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 物品品质率
+0.1 秒持续时间

en: Soul Power
cn: 灵魂之力

en: Each time the user of this cloak kills a unit, its DPS is increased by 10. There is a maximum of 4000 bonus DPS. The extra damage is bound to the item.
cn: 该斗篷持有者每击杀一个单位，秒伤提升10点，最高可累积4000点额外秒伤。此伤害绑定于物品。

en: Hangover
cn: 宿醉

en:
Each attack has a 10% attack speed adjusted chance to give the user a hangover, slowing its attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds and stunning it for 3 seconds when it expires.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% attack speed
-0.1 second stun duration
cn:
每次攻击有10%攻速加权几率使持有者陷入宿醉，攻速降低30%持续8秒，并在效果结束时眩晕3秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 攻速衰减
-0.1 秒眩晕时间

en: Ascension
cn: 浮空

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 8% base attack speed adjusted chance to ascend the target, lifting it up for 2 seconds and making it grant 20% more experience when killed in the air. Only works on normal and mass creeps.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% experience
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，有8%基础攻速加权几率使目标浮空2秒。在空中被击杀时，目标将提供20%额外经验值。仅对杂兵和小兵生效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.8% 经验值

en: Speed Award
cn: 速度獎

en: Any time the carrier manages to attack the next creep wave within 12 seconds of attacking the current one, it receives bonus exp and gold as a [color=GOLD]Speed Award[/color]. The gold award is equal to 12 minus the time interval between attacking the different creep waves. The exp award is half of the gold award.
cn: 每当携带者在攻击当前波次后12秒内攻击下一波次，将作为[color=GOLD]极速奖励[/color]获得额外经验与金币。金币奖励等于12减去两波次攻击间隔时间，经验奖励为金币奖励的一半。

en: Deep Shadows
cn: 幽影突袭

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=ffd700ff]Sol[/color] armor by 25%.
cn: 对具有[color=ffd700ff]布甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。

en: Essence Attack
cn: 精髓攻击

en: Carrier's attacks deal 100% attack damage against all armor types.
cn: 携带者的攻击对所有护甲类型均造成100%伤害。

en: Bones of Essence
cn: 精髓之骨

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=9370dbff]Sif[/color] armor by 25%.
cn: 对具有[color=9370dbff]城甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。

en: Piercing Magic
cn: 穿透魔法

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=6495edff]Myt[/color] armor by 25%.
cn: 对具有[color=6495edff]重甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。

en: Frog Piper
cn: 唤蛙笛

en:
Gives carrier attacks a 20% chance to summon 4 frogs that deal 100% attack damage when they hit an enemy.
 
Frogs cannot hit air.
cn:
携带者攻击有20%几率召唤4只青蛙，命中敌人时造成100%攻击伤害。

青蛙无法攻击空中单位。

en: Cast a Spell
cn: 施放法术

en:
Casts one of these spells on attack:
-Target drops a very high quality item
-Two high quality items
-Three normal quality items
-Two low quality items and spellbook gains +10% item chance and item quality
-Spellbook gains +25% item quality or item chance
 
Cooldown of 15 waves.
cn:
攻击时随机施放以下法术之一：
- 目标掉落一件极高品质物品
- 两件高品质物品
- 三件普通品质物品
- 两件低品质物品且法术书获得+10%物品获取率与品质率
- 法术书获得+25%物品品质率或获取率

冷却时间15波次。

en: Even More Magical Weapon
cn: 愈战愈魔

en: Every 5th instance of spell damage is a critical hit.
cn: 每第5次法术伤害必定暴击。

en: Optimist Hunting Season
cn: 乐观狩猎季

en: Changes attack damage based on the amount of health the creep has left. The range goes from +75% damage when the creep has full health to -50% damage when the creep has no health left.
cn: 根据目标剩余生命值调整攻击伤害：目标满血时伤害提升75%，残血时伤害降低50%。

en: Anti-Immunity Missile
cn: 反免疫飞弹

en:
Fires immune-seeking missiles. The attack range, speed, damage and type is the same as the carrier's, unless the attack type is [color=00bfffff]Arcane[/color], which is dealt as [color=7fffd4ff]Essence[/color] damage. Damage is scaled by 20% of the tower's spell damage.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% scaling
cn:
发射追踪免疫目标的飞弹。射程、速度、伤害及类型与携带者相同，若携带者的攻击类型为[color=00bfffff]奥术[/color]则转化为[color=7fffd4ff]精髓[/color]伤害。伤害受塔法术伤害的20%加成。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.8% 加成比例

en: Fragmentation Round
cn: 碎裂弹

en: Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 40% chance to hit up to 2 other creeps within 500 range of the main target with fragments. Fragments deal 45% of the attack damage and cause creeps to take 40% more damage from further fragments for the next 5 seconds. Fragments also cause creeps to take 40% extra damage from splash attacks for the next 5 seconds.
cn: 携带者命中主目标时，有40%几率用破片攻击主目标500范围内至多2个单位。破片造成45%攻击伤害，并使目标在接下来5秒内承受的破片伤害增加40%。破片还会使目标在接下来5秒内承受的溅射伤害增加40%。

en: Entangling Roots
cn: 缠绕根须

en: Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has an 6% attack speed adjusted chance to create a field of overgrowth in 200 AoE around the target. Creeps entering the overgrowth will become entangled for 1.8 seconds, taking 4500 spell damage per second. Cannot entangle the same creep for 3 seconds afterwards. Bosses can only be hit once.
cn: 携带者命中主目标时，有6%攻速加权几率在目标200范围内生成荆棘领域。进入领域的单位将被缠绕1.8秒，每秒受到4500法术伤害。同一单位3秒内无法重复缠绕。首领仅能被命中一次。

en: Ethereal Knowledge
cn: 虚空学识

en: Grants 50 flat experience to the holder. The experience is bound to the item and lost on drop. If the tower has less than 50 experience when the item is dropped, the item will drain experience from the next tower it is placed in, up to 50 experience.
cn: 持有者获得50点固定经验值。经验绑定于物品，丢弃时扣减经验。若丢弃时塔经验不足50点，物品将从下次放置的塔中汲取经验直至补足50点。

en: Ethereal Knowledge
cn: 虚空学识

en: Grants 100 flat experience to the holder. The experience is bound to the item and lost on drop. If the tower has less than 100 experience when the item is dropped, the item will drain experience from the next tower it is placed in, up to 100 experience.
cn: 持有者获得100点固定经验值。经验绑定于物品，丢弃时扣减经验。若丢弃时塔经验不足100点，物品将从下次放置的塔中汲取经验直至补足100点。

en: Breath of Decay
cn: 腐化吐息

en: On attack, this item can change the carrier's attack type to [color=9370dbff]Decay[/color] at the cost of 100 charges. Regenerates 50 charges per attack. This effect is not visible on the tower itself.   [color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color] +1 charge regenerated
cn: 攻击时可消耗100充能将携带者攻击类型转为[color=9370dbff]腐化[/color]。每次攻击恢复50充能。此效果不在塔面板显示。  [color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color] +1 充能恢复

en: Breath of Fire
cn: 火焰吐息

en:
On attack, this item can change the carrier's attack type to [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] at the cost of 100 charges. Regenerates 50 charges per attack. This effect is not visible on the tower itself.

[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color] +1 charge regenerated
cn:
攻击时可消耗100充能将携带者攻击类型转为[color=6495edff]元素[/color]。每次攻击恢复50充能。此效果不在塔面板显

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color] +1 充能恢复

en: Overcharge Shot
cn: 过载射击

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, the attack continues for 350 units through the main target, dealing 35% of the tower's attack damage to any creep in its path.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% damage
cn:
携带者命中主目标后，攻击会继续穿透主目标350距离，对路径上所有单位造成35%攻击伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 伤害

en: Magical Greed
cn: 魔法贪欲

en:
Whenever the carrier casts a spell, it has a 20% chance to replenish 15% of maximum mana. This ability has 10 seconds cooldown.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% mana replenish
cn:
携带者施放法术时，有20%几率恢复15%最大法力值。该能力有10秒冷却。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 法力恢复

en: Share Knowledge
cn: 知识共享

en: Every 15 seconds this tower loses 10 experience to teach other random towers in 400 range. Up to five towers in range gain an equal split of 8 experience, plus 1 experience for each tower affected. This ability doesn't work if the item carrier is not at least level 2 and is unaffected by tower exp ratios.
cn: 每15秒，该塔消耗10点经验值，为400范围内至多5座随机防御塔分配8点经验值（每影响一座塔额外+1点）。仅当物品携带者达到2级时生效，且不受塔经验比率影响。

en: Blasting Attack
cn: 爆破攻击

en: Every second, the staff launches a magical missile at a random creep, dealing 60 spell damage. The staff has a range of 1000.
cn: 每秒向随机单位发射魔法飞弹，造成60法术伤害。法杖射程1000。

en: Nermind's Eye
cn: 纳尔明之眼

en: Reveals invisible enemies in 750 range.
cn: 揭示750范围内的隐形敌人。

en: True Sight
cn: 真视之眼

en:
Reveals invisible enemies in 900 range.

Increases damage of attacks against invisible creeps by 20%.

[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.8% damage
cn:
揭示900范围内的隐形敌人。

对隐形单位的攻击伤害提升20%。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成： [/color]
+0.8% 伤害

en: High Knowledge
cn: 高阶学识

en: Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it gains 0.2 experience. The amount of experience gained is range and base attack speed adjusted.
cn: 携带者命中主目标时，获得0.2经验值。获得量按射程与基础攻速加权后计算。

en: Unstable Current
cn: 不稳定电流

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=ff4500ff]Hel[/color] armor by 25%.
cn: 对具有[color=ff4500ff]无甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。

en: Sacred Wisdom
cn: 神圣智慧

en: Grants 200 flat experience to the holder. The experience is bound to the item and lost on drop. If the tower has less than 200 experience when the item is dropped, the item will drain experience from the next tower it is placed in, up to 200 experience.
cn: 持有者获得200点固定经验值。经验绑定于物品，丢弃时扣减经验。若丢弃时塔经验不足200点，物品将从下次放置的塔中汲取经验直至补足200点。

en: Exchange
cn: 兑换

en:
Every 15 seconds, the wielder converts a flat 2 experience into 7 gold.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
-0.3 seconds cooldown.
cn:
每15秒，持有者将2点经验值转化为7金币。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
-0.3 秒冷却

en: Duplication
cn: 复制

en: This item duplicates after being carried for 12 waves. The duplicate will be 6 waves slower to duplicate.
cn: 该物品被携带12波次后自我复制。每次复制后，复制周期延长6波次。

en: Rampage
cn: 狂暴

en:
Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 14% attack speed adjusted chance to go into a [color=GOLD]Rampage[/color]. [color=GOLD]Rampage[/color] increases carrier's attack speed by 25%, multicrit count by 1, crit damage by x0.40 and crit chance by 5% for 4 seconds. Can't retrigger during while active.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.08 seconds duration
+0.4% attack speed
cn:
携带者每次攻击时有14%攻速加权几率进入[color=GOLD]狂暴[/color]状态，攻速提升25%，多重暴击次数+1，暴击伤害倍率+0.4，暴击几率+5%，持续4秒。生效期间无法重复触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.08 秒持续时间
+0.4% 攻速

en: Big Badaboom
cn: 大爆炸

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 15% chance to launch a holy missile which deals 75% of the damage the last attack dealt as spell damage in 400 AoE around the main target. Deals 50% more damage against [color=9370dbff]Undead[/color].
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1% damage
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，有15%几率发射圣光飞弹，对主目标400范围内造成上次攻击伤害75%的法术伤害。对[color=9370dbff]亡灵[/color]造成额外50%伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1% 伤害

en: Old Hunter
cn: 老猎人

en: After each kill, the carrier transfers 1 flat experience to up to 5 random towers in 500 range. The carrier must be at least level 5 to trigger this ability.
cn: 每次击杀后，携带者向500范围内至多5座随机防御塔转移1点经验值。仅当携带者达到至少5级时触发。

en: The Customer Is Boss
cn: 首领即顾客

en:
Bosses coming within 600 range of the carrier have a 25% chance to grant [color=GOLD][25 + wave level][/color] gold. Cannot trigger on the same boss twice.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+1 gold
cn:
当首领单位进入600范围时有25%几率掉落[color=GOLD][25 + 当前波次][/color]金币。同一首领无法重复触发。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+1 金币

en: Circle of Power
cn: ]能量循环

en: Every 5 seconds, if the carrier has less mana than it had 5 seconds ago, the carrier has a 25% chance to restore mana to what it was before.
cn: 每5秒，若携带者当前法力值低于5秒前的数值，则有25%几率恢复至5秒前的法力值。

en: Haunted!
cn: 闹鬼

en: This item makes its carrier attack random targets.
cn: 该物品使携带者攻击随机目标。

en: Transform
cn: 形态转换

en:
+100% experience for [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color]
+45% spell damage for [color=9370dbff]Darkness[/color]
+10% crit chance for [color=32cd32ff]Nature[/color]
+40% attack damage for [color=ff4500ff]Fire[/color]
+50% buff duration for [color=6495edff]Ice[/color]
+25% attack speed for [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color]
+30% item chance for [color=d2b48cff]Iron[/color]
cn:
为[color=66cdaaff]星辰系[/color]防御塔提供 +100% 经验
为[color=9370dbff]黑暗系[/color]防御塔提供 +45% 法术伤害
为[color=32cd32ff]自然系[/color]防御塔提供 +10% 暴击几率
为[color=ff4500ff]火焰系[/color]防御塔提供 +40% 攻击伤害
为[color=6495edff]冰霜系[/color]防御塔提供 +50% 增益持续时间
为[color=ffffe0ff]风暴系[/color]防御塔提供 +25% 攻速
为[color=d2b48cff]钢铁系[/color]防御塔提供 +30% 物品获取率

en: Golden Hit
cn: 黄金暴击

en: Grants 2 gold for each multicrit on a critical attack. Gold gain is base attack speed adjusted and scales with bounty received.
cn: 每次触发多重暴击时获得2金币。金币获取量按基础攻速加权后计算，并随赏金获取率提升。

en: Critical Accumulation
cn: 暴击蓄能

en: On attack, increases critical strike chance by 2% up to a maximum of 40%. The bonus is lost when a critical strike is made. The bonus is bound to the item.
cn: 每次攻击提升2%暴击几率，最高累积40%。触发暴击时加成清零。加成绑定于物品。

en: Script Reading
cn: 剧本研读

en: Whenever the carrier casts its own active ability, it gains [color=GOLD][0.2 x ability cooldown][/color] experience and grants [color=GOLD][0.5 x ability cooldown][/color] gold.
cn: 携带者施放自身主动技能时，获得[color=GOLD][0.2×技能冷却][/color]经验值并给予[color=GOLD][0.5×技能冷却][/color]金币。

en: Soul Power
cn: 灵魂之力

en: After each kill, the scythe's critical strike damage is increased by x0.005. Maximum of x3 bonus crit. The bonus is bound to the item.
cn: 每次击杀后，镰刀的暴击伤害倍率增加x0.005。最高可累积x3倍暴击加成。加成绑定于物品。

en: Ensign's Touch
cn: 军旗之触

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it decreases the armor of the target by 10% for 5 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.6% armor decrease
cn:
[color=GOLD][/color]
携带者命中主目标时，降低目标10%护甲持续5秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.6% 护甲降低

en: Imitation
cn: 拟态

en:
On pick up, this item copies effects of other items in tower inventory, except active abilities and other Distorted Idols.

The effects are lost when this item is dropped or the carrier is upgraded or transformed.
cn:
拾取时复制该塔的物品栏中其他物品的效果（主动技能和同名道具除外）。

丢弃物品、升阶或形态转换时效果消失。

en: Restriction
cn: 限制条件

en: This item can only be picked up by a tower in a corner with cliffs on two sides.
cn: 该物品只能被位于两面悬崖角落的防御塔拾取。

en: Ball Lightning
cn: 球状闪电

en: Every 3 seconds this item jumps to another tower in 1500 range. If there's no tower with an empty slot, this item will fly to stash.
cn: 每3秒跳跃至1500范围内其他防御塔。若无空位塔则此物品返回仓库。

en: Shrapnel Munition
cn: 破片弹药

en: Increases attack damage against creeps with [color=32cd32ff]Lua[/color] armor by 25%.
cn: 对具有[color=32cd32ff]轻甲[/color]护甲的单位攻击伤害提升25%。

en: Vampiric Absorption
cn: 吸血汲取

en: The skull's carrier restores 7% of its maximum mana whenever it kills a creep.
cn: 持有者每次击杀单位恢复相当于7%上限的法力值。

en: Heavy Weapon
cn: 重型武器

en: Every 5th attack is a critical hit. Applies only for the main target.
cn: 每第5次攻击必定暴击。仅对主目标生效。

en: Tricky Weapon
cn: 诡诈武器

en: Each attack there is a 15% chance the carrier gets stunned for 1 second.
cn: 每次攻击有15%几率使携带者眩晕1秒。

en: Elune's Grace
cn: 艾露恩之赐

en: Whenever the carrier hits the main target, the damage dealt to the target cannot be reduced below the tower's base damage.
cn: 携带者命中主目标时，造成的伤害不会低于防御塔的基础攻击力。

en: Stunning Souls
cn: 摄魂击

en: Gains 2 charges on kill. Spends 1 charge on attack damage to stun for 1.5 seconds.
cn: 击杀获得2层充能。攻击时消耗1层充能使目标眩晕1.5秒。

en: Stun
cn: 眩晕

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 15% attack speed adjusted chance to stun the target for 1 second. Has only a [color=GOLD]1/3[/color] of the normal chance to trigger on bosses!
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.25% chance
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，有攻速加权后的15%几率眩晕目标1秒。对首领触发几率仅为[color=GOLD]1/3[/color]！

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.25% 触发几率

en: Magic Powers
cn: 魔力增幅

en:
Whenever the carrier attacks, it deals extra 100 spell damage multiplied with the base attack speed of the tower to the main target.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+5 damage
cn:
携带者每次攻击对主目标额外造成100×基础攻速的法术伤害。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+5 法术伤害

en: Curse of the Grave
cn: 墓穴诅咒

en:
Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 0.25% attack speed adjusted chance to instantly kill the main target. Doesn't work on bosses and champions.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.01% chance
cn:
携带者攻击时有攻速加权后的0.25%几率直接击杀主目标。对首领和精英无效。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.01% 触发几率

en: Improve Item
cn: 精进工艺

en: Every kill increases item quality by 0.15%. The quality improvement is bound to the item.
cn: 每次击杀提升0.15%物品品质率。品质提升绑定于物品。

en: Phase Powers
cn: 相位能量

en: The carrier deals 30% of its attack damage as spell damage. This is no bonus damage, the tower will deal less attack damage!
cn: 携带者将30%攻击伤害转化为法术伤害（非额外伤害，实际攻击伤害会降低）。

en: Conduct Magic
cn: 导能体质

en:
Whenever the carrier is targeted by a spell, it gains +20% attack speed for 10 seconds.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.5% attack speed
cn:
被指向性法术命中时，攻速提升20%持续10秒。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.5% 攻速

en: Miss
cn: 失准

en: Makes the carrier miss 10% of attacks.
cn: 使携带者10%的攻击落空

en: Reward the Faithful
cn: 忠信嘉奖

en: Whenever the carrier casts a spell on a friendly tower, both towers gain 1 experience.
cn: 对友方防御塔施法时，双方各获得1点经验值。

en: Luck!
cn: ]好运！

en:
Whenever the carrier hits the main target, it has a 20% attack speed adjusted chance to get a random effect:
 Gain 1 experience
 Gain 10 gold
 Stun for 0.5 seconds
 Slow by 10% for 3 seconds
 Decrease armor by 5 for 3 seconds
cn:
携带者命中主目标时，有攻速加权后的20%几率触发以下随机效果之一：
获得1经验值
获得10金币
眩晕0.5秒
减速10%持续3秒
护甲降低5点持续3秒

en: Launch Glaive
cn: 回旋刃

en:
Whenever the carrier attacks, it has a 40% chance to fire an extra projectile at the target. The projectile deals the same amount of damage as a normal attack and can crit.
 
[color=ORANGE]Level Bonus:[/color]
+0.4% chance
cn:
每次攻击有40%几率发射额外弹道，造成等量攻击伤害并可暴击。

[color=ORANGE]等级加成：[/color]
+0.4% 触发几率

en: This oil also applies to neighbor towers!
cn: 此强化油对相邻防御塔同样生效！

en: This oil also applies to neighbor towers!
cn: 此强化油对相邻防御塔同样生效！

en: Adds 60 flat exp to tower.
cn: 为防御塔添加60点固定经验值。

en: Adds 120 flat exp to tower.
cn: 为防御塔添加120点固定经验值。
